1a1(mdo sde): /mdo sde sa bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi niSh+k+ra maN sU tra/ bod skad du/ mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig nyid kyi
1b2(mdo sde): dbu ni rin chen 'od ldan dang / /btsun mo pad ma kha bye ma rnyis mdangs ldan pas/ /slong ba dga' mdzad sangs rgyas go 'phang brnyes gyur cing / /chos rnams ston mdzad zhi ba de la
1b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rnyed pas ngan 'gro'i 'jigs las 'das gyur cing / /srid pa'i 'ching ba thams cad zad byed zhir gyur la/ /sdug bsngal mtha' med 'khor ba'i rgya
1b4(mdo sde): mtsho las rgal ba'i/ /zam pa gcig pu bde gshegs chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la yon tan phul byung la gnas sbyin pa'i gnas/ /mchod pa cung zad byas kyang rgya che nyid
1b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba/ /bde bar gshegs pas rab bsngags gang zag mchog brgyad kyis/ /rab brgyan 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub gsung rnam par brtags na
2a1(mdo sde): dad pa mi skyed pa'am/ /phan pa mi 'byung gang de ci yang yod min la/ /tshig btu ba dang 'dzin pa'i nus dang rnam bral ba/ /rnam par g.yengs phyir 'bras rtsol 'di bdag nyung zad cig /ji ltar pad ma kha bye'i dbus gnas bung ba ni/ /'khor zhing pad
2a2(mdo sde): ma la ni sogs par byed/ /de bzhin thub pa'i zhal gyi pad ma'i tshal nang nas/ /rang yid rab tu dga' byed bsdu bar bya/ /thub pa'i gsung ni ma lus shin tu rtogs dka' ba/ /dad ldan mi la nyin re'ang rgyas par nyer 'gro ste/ /rnam par dpyad
2a3(mdo sde): na tshigs bcad phyed mtha'ang mi dpogs na/ /rin chen mdo brgya bsdu ba 'di ni smos ci dgos/ /phyogs go rnams su snyan dang grags pa'i snang bas khyab/ /rab gsal zhes bya sa yi bdag por gyur pa na/ /bsod nams stobs kyis dgra las rgyal bas rgyal phran gyis/ /
2a4(mdo sde): btud pas nor bu'i cod pan 'od kyis zhal gtsang byas/ /glang po'i dbang po rgyags 'khrig 'dod chags kyis chags pa/ /'phral du bcos pa'i thabs med nyon mongs skabs gyur la/ /gzigs nas 'gro ba'i chags sogs nyes pa zhi bzhed pas/ /thugs brtan
2a5(mdo sde): thub dbang gyur par des ni smon lam btab/ /de nas brtsams te sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan mi g.yo blo gros rnon po rnams/ /nyid bde'i ltos med shin tu yun ring yang dag spel/ /'gro la phan phyir shin tu dka' ba brgya phrag
2a6(mdo sde): mdzad/ /thugs rje cher ldan drang srong mchog 'di tshe gzhan du/ /nyid kyis 'gro phan don mdzad mi skyo ji snyed de/ /brjod par 'di na shA ri'i bus kyang mi nus na'ang / /gang dag phyir ni yongs su brjod par bya/ /stag mo shi bi glang po spre'u dka' thub
2b1(mdo sde): dbang / /tshangs sogs sku tshe brgya phrag du mar dge mdzad nas/ /don kun sgrub brtson bdag nyid chen po tshe gcig thogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas su skye ba bzhes/ /der bzhugs nas ni 'gro ba kun la legs gzigs nas/ /skyabs med g.yo zhing
2b2(mdo sde): phongs pa du mas yongs khyab la/ /thugs rje chen pos thugs ni spro ba bskyed gyur te/ /gzhan gyi don mdzad thugs dam nyid kyi rgyud dgongs gyur/ /de bas 'di ni ji ltar mi yul nyer gshegs te/ /skye dang rga shi na ba'i 'jigs pa gzigs nas ni/ /rab byung blo gros des mdzad
2b3(mdo sde): byang chub yang dag brnyes/ /de bzhin chos ston mdzad pa bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /de nas dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa mang por bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa rnam pa du mar nye bar bsags pas byang chub
2b4(mdo sde): kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/ nyon mongs pa'i chu bo stobs dang ldan pas shin tu chod pa rnams la thugs rjes yongs su bskul ba/ gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir rtag tu brtson par mdzad pa de thugs la dgongs pa 'di lta bu mngon sum du mdzad de/ gang ngas skye ba mang por
2b5(mdo sde): yongs su 'khor ba na rang gi sha dang khrag dang mgo dang mig dang bu dang chung ma rnams gtong ba dang shin tu gtong bas yongs su btang ba dang / dka' ba'i tshul khrims la gnas pa dang / gzhan gyis sbyar ba'i bsnyen bkur ma yin pa sna tshogs pa bzod par byas pa dang / rtag tu lhod pa med
2b6(mdo sde): pa'i spro ba dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba la ma chags pa dang / yod pa dang med pa'i don la rnam par dpyod pa dang ldan pas gzhan gyi don la brtson pa'i blo gros kyis shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnam pa mang pos sems la gdungs pa'i sdug phongs
2b7(mdo sde): pa'i srog chags rnams la mchog tu snying rje bskyed nas byams pa'i stobs dang / zla 'od dang shi bi dang glang po dang thams cad sgrol dang bzod par smra ba dang spre'u'i bdag po dang mig dang sman chen po la sogs pa skyes pa'i rabs stong phrag snyed tu smon lam byas shing bsags pa/ e ma'o kye
3a1(mdo sde): ma bdag gis 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/ yongs su 'dren pa med pa/ chos ma yin pa/ 'dod chags kyi dbang du 'gro ba/ log pa'i chos kyis yongs su khyab pa/ sems la mi bzad pa'i chags pas zil gyis non pa/ khro ba mang ba/ lta ba ngan pa'i
3a2(mdo sde): tshang tshing gis rnam par brlag pa/ phrag dog dang ser snas kun tu bcings pa/ legs par spyod pa la 'jug pa la rgyab kyis phyogs shing nyes par spyod pa la kun tu gzhol bar gyur pa rnams la bdag sangs rgyas su gyur nas sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bya'o/ /ma grol
3a3(mdo sde): ba rnams ni dgrol bar bya'o/ /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung bar bya'o/ /yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes ngas yun ring du mngon par 'dod pa yin nad ni don de bya ba'i dus la bab pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis
3a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi gnas skabs ci zhig yin pa bltas na gdul bar nus so/ /gdul bar nus so zhes de ltar rnam par dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad la gzigs pa 'jug ste/ su ni 'grib/ su ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyis 'phel/ su ni gnod par gyur/ su ni
3a5(mdo sde): nyam thag par gyur/ su ni sdug bsngal bar gyur/ gang la ni ngas ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig ces mi 'jigs pa sbyin pas dbugs dbyung bar bya/ su ni ngan song la gzhol/ su ni ngan song la 'bab/ su ni ngan song la bab/ su ni ngas ngan song las bton te/
3a6(mdo sde): mtho ris dang thar pa'i 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba la lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba rnams la 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug gi bdag po la gzhag par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed par bya/ gang gi dge
3a7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag ni yongs su smin par bya/ gang gi yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'jug par mdzad pa na srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa la la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed par bskyed par 'os pa dang / la la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma smin pa
3b1(mdo sde): yongs su smin par nus pa dang / la la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa bde 'gror 'gro bar gzhol ba dang / la la 'bras bu dang po thob par gzhol ba dang / la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub 'thob par gzhol ba dang / la la
3b2(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang / la la ni sngon gyi smon lam rnams nye bar bsags pas rkyen la rag las pa gang zhig ma thos pas dam pa'i chos las yongs su nyams par gyur par gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/
3b3(mdo sde): kye ma'o bdag gis yun ring po nas yang dag par rtogs pa rdzogs par gyur cing nga'i ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par gyur to zhes dgyes shing ngas bya ba ni byas so/ /ngas khur bskur bar dka' ba ni mthar phyin te/ gang nga'i yongs su dag pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa'i zhing du gyur cing gdul bya'i skye
3b4(mdo sde): bo rnams yun ring por mi thogs par pad ma'i tshal yongs su smin cing kha bye la ma reg pa'i nyi ma shar bas rgyas par 'gyur ba lta bur gyur gyis phyi bshol mi bya'o/ /'dir gnas bzhin du yang dngos po thams cad rdzogs par bya bar nus pa ma yin pas na gzhes pa'i dus ni ma yin gyis ma
3b5(mdo sde): la bdag mi'i 'jig rten du song la der phyin nas brtson 'grus kyi grogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par byas te/ 'di rnams skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'di rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su smin la rnam par grol bar bya zhing skye ba dang rga ba
3b6(mdo sde): dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba/ skyabs med pa/ yongs su skyob pa med pa'i srog chags rnams dam pa'i chos bstan pa'i lag pa brkyang bas gdon par bya'o/ /thog ma med pa'i dus nas rjes su
3b7(mdo sde): 'brel ba'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gi mes kun tu gdungs pa rnams la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chu'i rgyun blugs pas sdug bsngal ma lus pa bsal bar bya'o zhes de lta bu'i thugs la dgongs pa nges par bskyed nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling du 'jug par
4a1(mdo sde): mdzad pa na rigs dang yul dang dus dang rgyud dang bud med de gzigs pa rnam pa lngas gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du
4a2(mdo sde): dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs su yin la/ de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur/ res 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/ da lta na ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur
4a3(mdo sde): bar gzigs nas/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/ /zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i
4a4(mdo sde): dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la
4a5(mdo sde): gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slongs mo
4a6(mdo sde): pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa gang du skye bo gcig btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i yul gang yin pa gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram
4a7(mdo sde): shing gi phreng ba dang 'bras dang ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slongs mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa/ gang du skye bo gcig btul bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po btul bar 'gyur ba yin gyis/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag
4b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas yul mtha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las
4b2(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' yul la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis na dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa'
4b3(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ji lta bu zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo yar skye ba na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len la/ /mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa
4b4(mdo sde): na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi mdzad ce na/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la blun zhing dbang po rtul
4b5(mdo sde): ba dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bas bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyigs ma dang / dus kyi
4b6(mdo sde): snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing
4b7(mdo sde): bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga'
5a1(mdo sde): ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon med par gzigs
5a2(mdo sde): nas/ de 'di snyam du dgongs te shAkya'i rigs rgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas rgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi
5a3(mdo sde): 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo snyam mo/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas
5a4(mdo sde): rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rgyud la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi
5a5(mdo sde): rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba/ khro bag can ma yin pa/ phra ma can ma yin pa/ ngag rtsub pa ma yin pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ rang bzhin
5a6(mdo sde): bzang ba/ bsam pa dge ba/ rgyud phun sum tshogs pa/ rigs mtho ba/ nye du'i rigs dang ldan pa/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/ gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/ mtshan nyid mi g.yo ba/ rang bzhin brtan la rgod bag can ma yin pa khengs pa med pa/ byams pa'i
5a7(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa/ sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad la chos dang ldan pa/ bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la e ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu rum
5b1(mdo sde): du 'dzin nus pa dang rang gi don yang nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang pha mes zung bdun gyi bar du spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rigs dang ldan pa dang / tshul
5b2(mdo sde): dang ldan zhes bya ba nas bud med thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ khro bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul
5b3(mdo sde): chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpas mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /'di
5b4(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' bud med rnams la gzigs par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
5b5(mdo sde): gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas dga' ldan na spyod pa'i lha'i ris rnams la gsungs pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig /nga 'dzam bu'i gling du babs nas yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor ba len gyis khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbus kyi grong khyer
5b6(mdo sde): chen po drug po 'di lta ste/ mnyan yod dang sA ke ta dang yangs pa can dang tsam pa dang rgyal po'i khab dang bA rA Na sIr nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /byang chub
5b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod cig / da ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu ni ma rungs pa'i bsam pa can/ 'dzam bu'i gling na rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug gis dkrugs pa lags so/ /de la rtog ge pa drug gang
6a1(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smrang 'don gyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi 'pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka t+yA'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o/ /rjes su sgrogs pa drug
6a2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bram ze sgyus rgal dang / bram ze rnas rdeg dang / bram ze bzang ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad ma'i snying po dang / bram ze dmar po'o/ /snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod
6a3(mdo sde): dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur dang / kun tu rgyu rab bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang / drang srong nyon mongs med pa dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can no/ /'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' khyed kyi gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa
6a4(mdo sde): bsham pa bgyi zhing bdag cag 'di snyam du bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de chos de bdag cag gis thos nas ci nas kyang bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bsgrub par bgyid
6a5(mdo sde): par sems lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /grogs po dag de'i phyir rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad rdungs shig /dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis rol mo'i cha spyad
6a6(mdo sde): thams cad brdungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te gsungs pa/ grogs po dag 'di la lhag par sgra gang che/ bcom ldan 'das dung gi sgra lags so/ /grogs po dag ji ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad zil gyis mnan te gnas pa de bzhin du
6a7(mdo sde): ngas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ste/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o/ /mi rtag pa'i dung bud par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o/ /bdag
6b1(mdo sde): med pa'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o zhes gsungs nas tshigs su bcad de yang gsungs pa/ seng ge gcig gis gcan gzan tshogs ni du ma 'joms/ /rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig /brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'joms/ /nyi ma
6b2(mdo sde): gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel/ /grogs po dag khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni btsun mo sgyu
6b3(mdo sde): 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba len par bzhed kyis ma la de la bdag gis gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/ lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o snyam nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing lhums kyang gtsang mar byas so/ /
6b4(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa rigs dang / yul dang / dus dang / rgyud dang / bud med la gzigs pa ste/ gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas nam gyi gung la glang po cher bstan te dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums
6b5(mdo sde): su zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag
6b6(mdo sde): smag tu gyur pa/ gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che bdag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba mi mthong ba las/ de rnams snang ba
6b7(mdo sde): des gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so/ /ji ltar sprin ni rgya chen legs 'dus pa/ /chu mang bsags pa rlung gis bskyod pa ltar/ /de bzhin blo ldan de ni
7a1(mdo sde): lhums 'dug pa/ /ston ka'i sprin rum zla rgyas ji bzhin no/ /gang tshe rtsal ldan mnyam med nyer gshegs la/ /de tshe 'jig rten so so'i gling bar na/ /mun gyis khebs bsal phyogs kun shin tu ni/ /gsal snang byung gyur 'di 'dir chos nyid do/ /
7a2(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums su zhugs par mdzad pa de nyid kyi mtshan mo btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos rmi lam bzhi mthong ste glang po che'i phru gu dkar po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa dang / steng gi nam mkha' la
7a3(mdo sde): skyil mo krung gis 'chag pa dang / seng ge'i gdan la 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag byed pa'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas btsun mo las de thos pa dang / mtshan mkhan rnams la rmi lam 'di
7a4(mdo sde): ji ltar ston pa yin dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzod cig /gang btsun mos rmi lam du mthong ba glang po che'i phru gu dkar po zhig bdag gi rum g.yas pa dral nas zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i sras bltam par 'gyur ro/ /steng
7a5(mdo sde): gi nam mkha' la 'chag go zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che bar 'gyur ro/ /seng ge'i gdan la 'dug ste chos ston to zhes bya ba ni de yang seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs te 'khor bzhi la chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdag la phyag
7a6(mdo sde): byed do zhes bya ba nas gal te de rab tu byung bar gyur na lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod cing rjed la mngon par bstod par 'gyur ro/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na zhugs pa de'i
7a7(mdo sde): tshe/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de la mi'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar/ lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srungs mar 'jog pa ni lag na ral gri dang / lag na mdung dang / lag na mdung thung dang / lag na mda' bo che'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
7b1(mdo sde): lha mchog bzhi la brgya byin gyis smras pa/ /khyed rnams song la lha mi rnams kyi ni/ /shin tu mchog gyur yum de ji ltar su'ang / /gnod mi byed par gus pas yongs su srungs/ /de rnams shin tu 'bad byas dga' ba dang / /brgya byin lung ni spyi bos mnos nas
7b2(mdo sde): su/ /rnam kun mda' mdung ral gri lag na thogs/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni srung bar byed/ /g.yul du rgyal gyur lha bzhis sbas pa dang / /de ni nyin mtshan sna tshogs rgyan 'chang zhing / /lha mo rang khyim nang nas rnam rol pa/ /dga' ba'i tshal na spyod pa
7b3(mdo sde): lta bur spyod/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes te/ kye ma'o lha btson thams cad thar bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang btsun mo'i tshig mnyan nas btson thams cad thar bar byas so/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na
7b4(mdo sde): btsun mo 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma'o lhas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi dbus su dman pa dang / long ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slongs mo pa rnams la sbyin pa byin la bsod nams dag byas pa dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / sum
7b5(mdo sde): mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang / long ba dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slongs mo pa rnams la sbyin pa byin/ bsod nams ni bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis btsun mo'i tshig mnyan nas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su dman pa dang / long ba dang /
7b6(mdo sde): bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slongs mo pa rnams la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa dang / ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin du sbyin pa ni byin/ bsod nams ni byas pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / sum mdo'i dbus su dman pa dang / long ba dang /
7b7(mdo sde): bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / slongs mo pa rnams gang mngon par 'dod pa dang / ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin du sbyin pa ni byin bsod nams ni byas so/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na bzhugs
8a1(mdo sde): pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/ /dper na nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi gos pa dang / ka shi'i ras kyang
8a2(mdo sde): nor bu rin po ches mi gos pa de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/ /
8a3(mdo sde): ji ltar nor bu tshon shel 'od gsal dang / /rab gtsang ka shi'i ras kyang gos pa med/ /de bzhin thub chen lhums na bzhugs pa na/ /mngal gyi dri ma cis kyang gos pa med/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs
8a4(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /dper na nor bu bai dUr+ya zur brgyad pa bzang po/ rigs dang ldan pa/ dang ba gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ tshon skud sna lnga sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le
8a5(mdo sde): brgan la brgyus la de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na 'di ni skud pa'o/ /'di ni nor bu'o/ /skud pa 'di la nor bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos te yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i
8a6(mdo sde): tshe/ de'i yum gyi lhums na rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par lhums kyi nang na bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /ji ltar dri med nor bu bai dUr+ya/ /'od gsal lag par bzhag pa snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin thub chen yum gyi lhums bzhugs pa/ /shes shing sems pas yum
8a7(mdo sde): ni yang dag lta/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ de'i yum 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas lus ngal ba 'am lus dub par 'gyur ba med do/ /las kyi rnam smin zad pas mtho ris
8b1(mdo sde): 'phos/ /gang tshe 'di ni lhums zhugs bzhugs pa na/ /de'i yum ngal bas 'dzin par mi byed par/ /de tshe gyur pa 'dir de chos nyid do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe
8b2(mdo sde): yum de phan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar ldog go/ /ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs pa spyod pa dang / du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang
8b3(mdo sde): myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ 'bru'i chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byed do/ /srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang / /mi smra dang chang la mi brkam dang / /'khrig pa'i mi tshangs spyod pa spong ba
8b4(mdo sde): 'di/ /'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos nas yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i yum 'di lta ste/ skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtod pa med do/ /nyon mongs
8b5(mdo sde): rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing / /de ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la/ /de yum 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi/ /skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtod pa med/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa skyes pa kye ma bdag gis rgya mtsho
8b6(mdo sde): chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo snyam nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lha btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
8b7(mdo sde): kyis sku brgyan pa zhig bltam par 'gyur te de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i rgya mtsho mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blud na cir 'gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ sras yan lag ma tshang ba
9a1(mdo sde): zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ nga'i ming zas gtsang zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag ma tshang bar bya'am/ de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na kun tu rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhig 'dug pa de rgyal pos bkug nas rgya mtsho chen po las
9a2(mdo sde): chu myur bar khug shig ces bsgo ba dang / des de nyid na 'dug bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu drangs te de rnams la btsun mo 'thung du bcug pa dang / de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo tshul 'di lta bu'i
9a3(mdo sde): 'dod pa skyes te/ kye ma'o bdag lus lum bi nI'i tshal du zhugs la shing gi rtsar yal ga'i mthar 'dug par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo tshul de lta bu'i 'dod pa skyes par rig nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs bshams te
9a4(mdo sde): glang po'i tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs te dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang lhan cig tu chas nas lum bi nI'i tshal du phyin to/ /
9a5(mdo sde): de nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos lum bi ni'i tshal mthong ba na sems rtse gcig par gyur pa dang / de khyogs las babs te/ shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog yang dag par rgyas pa mthong bas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te de der song nas me tog dang / 'dab ma'i g.yur gyis
9a6(mdo sde): dud pa'i yal ga la 'jus te/ bud med rgan pas bskor nas gnas so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo sras bltam par nye bar gnas kyis ma la bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang po bltam pa na blang bar bya'o/ /
9a7(mdo sde): de nas yang bsams pa/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo ni ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa yin pas bdag gi mdun du bltam mi phod kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bud med rgan mo zhig gi cha byad du sprul te/ des gang gis bud med rgan mo de rnams phyogs
9b1(mdo sde): bcur 'bros par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rlung dang char drag po zhig sprul nas de rnams bros pa dang / bdag nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du 'dug go/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' ni mkhyen bzhin du yum gyi lhums
9b2(mdo sde): su 'jug pa dang / mkhyen bzhin du gnas pa dang / mkhyen bzhin du 'byung ba yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du dgongs te gang bdag skyes bu tha mal pa bzhin du mngal gyi sgo nas 'byung ba ni tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis ma la bdag gis yum gyi
9b3(mdo sde): dku g.yas pa brtol la 'byung bar bya'o zhes de nas byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi dku g.yas pa brtol te byung ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te brgya byin 'di bdag gis byang chub sems
9b4(mdo sde): dpa' 'di blangs so zhes dregs pa skye bar 'gyur bar mkhyen nas ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje'i snying po can gyi skur byin gyis brlabs te lhums su ni yum 'dzin pas nyon mongs par ma gyur cig snyam du dgongs nas yang bar mdzad de bzhugs pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
9b5(mdo sde): gyis 'dzin par ma nus pa dang 'dar bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka thong thong / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa la bzhag go/ /bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la sus kyang ma
9b6(mdo sde): bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gom pa bdun bdun bor zhing tshig tu yang gsung ba/ kau shi ka phyogs 'di gang yin/ byang chub sems dpa' shar phyogs lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka sems can thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro
9b7(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ /phyogs 'di gang yin/ lho phyogs lags so/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o/ /phyogs 'di gang yin/ byang phyogs lags so/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho las brgal bar bya'o/ /phyogs 'di gang yin/ nub phyogs lags so/ /
10a1(mdo sde): nga'i skye ba tha ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro/ /skye 'chi mthar byed de ni bltams pa na/ /sa la gom pa bdun ni bzhud nas su/ /'di nga'i skye ba tha mar gyur yin zhes/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma gcig pus gsungs/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems
10a2(mdo sde): dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas byung ba de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag smag tu gyur pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di
10a3(mdo sde): ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba las de rnams snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag
10a4(mdo sde): sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes so/ /gang tshe rnam 'dren bltam par gyur pa na/ /de tshe sa ni rir bcas shin tu g.yos/ /gang gis 'jig rten par yang skad cig gis/ /snang byed 'od gsal
10a5(mdo sde): de yang byung bar gyur/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas sa g.yos pa chen po dang snang ba rgya chen po mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byas te zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul che ba dang mthu che ba'i bu skyes pa ni
10a6(mdo sde): bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa na ral gri shubs nas phyung ba bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan sna
10a7(mdo sde): tshogs kyis ma gos so/ /ji ltar 'od gsal tshon shel bzang po dang / /ka shi ras gtsang phan tshun gos mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin thub de lhums nas byung ba na/ /gser sbyangs me chen nang nas bton pa 'dra/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa
10b1(mdo sde): yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa de'i tshe de'i yum mi 'dug mi nyal te 'greng bzhin du rgyal rigs ma des rgyal rigs bltam par byed do/ /de ni mi 'dug nyal ba'ang ma yin te/ /yan lag lnga ldan tshul khrims kyis brgyan pas/ /de ni 'greng bzhin shin tu dge ba
10b2(mdo sde): yi/ /gzhon nu de 'dir brgya byin dag gis blangs/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa yum gyi lhums nas bltam pa de'i tshe de'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to/ /dri med zla ba'i dkyil
10b3(mdo sde): 'khor 'od 'dra'i gdugs/ /lha yi gtso bos dbu yi steng nas 'dzin/ /gdub 'khrol 'od zer gyis 'bar lag pa dang / /rnga yab bzang gis 'di la g.yob par byed/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam pa'i mod la
10b4(mdo sde): bar snang las chu bsil ba gcig dang / chu dron mo gcig ste/ chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing des byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad do/ /dri med rab dag bsil dang de bzhin dro'i/ /chu yis rkang gnyis gtso bo khrus mdzad de/ /rigs
10b5(mdo sde): rgyud gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs/ /klu rnams de la'ang mchod pa byed par gyur/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la skrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung nas 'babs par gyur te de la de'i yum khrus chu'i bya ba byed do/ /rkang gnyis
10b6(mdo sde): gtso bo gzhon nu bltam pa na/ /lha de rnams ni shin tu yid dga' bas/ /der ni chu bzang phyung bar gyur pa la/ /de yum der ni chu yis bya ba byed/ /lha yi rol mo shin tu sgra snyan rnams/ /shin tu dga' ba mchog tu rdung bar byed/ /de rnams gos dang phreng ba 'thor byed
10b7(mdo sde): cing / /gzhan dag rab tu 'dud cing de bzhin bstod/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la lhas bar snang las lha'i ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /
11a1(mdo sde): ta ma la'i 'dab mas 'thor ro/ /lha'i me tog man dA ra bas kyang 'thor ro/ /lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin to/ /gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do/ /mkhas pas btud pa'i sangs rgyas bltam pa na/ /dri zhim dri mchog char ni phab pa dang / /de
11a2(mdo sde): dang des na rang spobs tshul 'thun pa'i/ /rab dga'i sems kyis bstod pa rjod par byed/ /'dis ni byang chub mchog dag thob 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal zad pa'i 'gro phan mdzad gyur la/ /'gro ba mi shes rab rib mig ldongs la/ /sman pa mchog 'di mig ni rab stsol
11a3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /'di ni rmongs pas mig khebs long ba yi/ /'gro ba'i sgron ma chen po nyid du 'gyur/ /lta ngan gyis brlag log pa'i lam zhugs la/ /ma 'tshol drang ba'i lam ni ston par 'gyur/ /ngan 'gro'i lam ni ma lus 'gog 'gyur zhing / /lha yi gnas kyis ni
11a4(mdo sde): 'byed 'gyur zhes/ /'og min bar na gnas pa'i lha rnams ni/ /lha yi gnas su yang yang sgrogs par byed/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi tshe mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs byin bu btsas pa na tshangs byin 'di snyam du sems
11a5(mdo sde): te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas de bas na 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po pad ma chen po bu btsas pa na pad ma chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu
11a6(mdo sde): btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing gzugs can ma'i bu yin pas 'di'i ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /ko'u shAm bi na rgyal po dmag brgya pa bu btsas pa na dmag brgya pa 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi
11a7(mdo sde): bu btsas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas 'di'i ming shar ba zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas bu btsas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'jig rten sgron mas snang ba
11b1(mdo sde): lta bur gyur pas 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so zhes btags te/ de ni de lta ma yin no/ /'on kyang de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi tshe dga' bo la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon
11b2(mdo sde): nu lnga brgya btsas pa dang / grags 'dzin ma la sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu ma lnga brgya btsas pa dang / 'dun pa la sogs pa rim gro pa lnga brgya btsas pa dang / bsngags ldan la sogs pa rta lnga brgya 'brangs so/ /lha rnams kyis gter lnga'i kha yang nye bar bstan to/ /
11b3(mdo sde): khams kyi rgyal phran rnams dang / mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams kyis rab tu btud cing thams cad kyis kyang dpya phul lo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na 'dod pa thams cad grub pas na gzhon nu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes
11b4(mdo sde): bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' la thog mar mtshan btags so/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam pa'i mod la yab yum gyis mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas/ shes ldan dag cig gzhon nu gang dag dang
11b5(mdo sde): ldan na 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung
11b6(mdo sde): ste/ /'di lta ste/ /'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni blon po rin po che'o/ /bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan
11b7(mdo sde): pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong 'byung ba de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa med pa/ chos dang 'thun pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha
12a1(mdo sde): spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen
12a2(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan nas lha mad lags te/ gzhon nu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ni 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du gdags par 'gyur
12a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ snga ma bzhin du 'di ni 'dir chos nyid yin no/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal pos gzhon nu bltam nas skyes bu yi/ /mtshan shes bram ze la dris de tshe smras/ /rgyal bu gal te khyim na gnas gyur na/ /nges par 'di ni mi dbang dag tu 'gyur/ /
12a4(mdo sde): brtul bar ldan zhing rgyal po gzhan rnams kyi/ /spyi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ /'di ni gling rnams kun tu mngon rgyal ba'i/ /chos kyi rgyal srid dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /rin chen gyur pa 'di ni rin chen bdun/ /mi mchog bsod nams las kyis
12a5(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang gi mthu yis sa ni ma lus pa/ /'di ni lung mi gcog par spyod par 'gyur/ /gser las legs byas lte ba shin tu zlum/ /rtsibs stong ldan zhing mu khyud ma nyams bzang / /dang por sa la rnam par rgyal 'gyur gang / /'khor lo de 'dis
12a6(mdo sde): dang por thob par 'gyur/ /yan lag thams cad legs skyes sa la ni/ /rab gnas gangs can rtse 'dra'i glang po'i mchog /rgyal po la 'os mkha' la 'gro ba yi/ /rin chen mchog ni gnyis pa 'dis 'thob 'gyur/ /tho rangs dus su phyogs kun ma lus pa'i/ /
12a7(mdo sde): sa rnams bskor nas slar ni ldog gyur gang / /rma bya'i mgrin 'dra spu ni yid 'ong ba'i/ /rin chen rta ni 'di yis 'thob par 'gyur/ /rin chen dri med bai dUr+ya rang bzhin/ /kun tu dpag tshad tsam du snang byed pa/ /dri med mtshan mo ci 'dra nyin de bzhin/ /rin chen mchog ni
12b1(mdo sde): bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig reg dri gzugs dang mdangs ldan pa'i/ /bud med dam pa dregs ldan rnams kyi mchog /lha mo bzhin du yon tan kun ldan pa/ /bud med rin chen de 'dir 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang yang 'di na rgyal la mu tig dang / /
12b2(mdo sde): gser sogs shin tu mang po 'bul ba yi/ /nor ldan mtshungs par nor mang khyim bdag ni/ /rin chen thob nas rnam par spyod par 'gyur/ /'gro dang kun tu gnas dang rnam ldog dang / /ma lus dpung la mkhas par byed pa yi/ /dpa' ldan bdun pa 'byung bar
12b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ni/ /mi yi rin chen blon po zhes bya yin/ /dpa' zhing rtul phod yan lag mchog gzugs ldan/ /bu stong dag ni 'di la 'byung 'gyur zhing / /gang gi gzi brjid shin tu stobs che zhing / /sa bdag gzhan dag 'dud par byed pa 'byung / /gal te
12b4(mdo sde): khyim ni nyes mang gis dkrugs pa/ /rab 'bar shing ni bya yis spong ba ltar/ /nye bar zhi phyir nags su nges song na/ /de 'dir ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /khyod kyi sras 'di deng ni 'di 'dra ba/ /gzhon nu 'gro ba'i rin chen gcig bltam pa/ /'gro ba
12b5(mdo sde): gnyis las gzhan du mi 'gro ba/ /de ltar sngags kyi tshig las mthong ba lags/ /shes ldan dag gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gyi sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar
12b6(mdo sde): gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po ni gang dag yin/ lha gzhon nu'i zhabs shin tu gnas pa lags so/ /zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'bab ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /de'i
12b7(mdo sde): zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu'i sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa
13a1(mdo sde): dang / de'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags te/ phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa ni dper na/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin no/ /lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i
13a2(mdo sde): mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu'i phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa lags te/ de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa ni dper na ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu bzhin no/ /lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu'i zhabs
13a3(mdo sde): long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang / byin pa e na ya'i lta bu dang / sku mdud pa dang / sku bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lha nga gnyis slebs shing reg pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha
13a4(mdo sde): gzhon nu ni mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa lags te/ de'i mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni dper na glang po che cang shes kyi'am/ rta cang shes byung ma thag gi bzhin no/ /lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu'i sku
13a5(mdo sde): ci srid par 'dom yang de srid la/ 'dom ci srid par sku yang de srid pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu'i ro stod kyi spu re re nas skye zhing de'i sku la spu re re nas skye ba yang
13a6(mdo sde): mthing ga la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar skye lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni mdog gser 'dra ba dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / pags pa srab cing mdog gser gyi 'dra ba lags te/ pags pa srab
13a7(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sku la mi gos pa ste/ /lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu'i sku ni bdun mtho ba ste sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang / zhabs gnyis dang / dpung mgo gnyis dang ltag pa lags
13b1(mdo sde): te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni thal gong rgyas pa dang / sku ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / sku drang zhing kho lag che ba dang / dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang / tshems mnyam
13b2(mdo sde): pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / mche ba shin tu dkar ba dang / 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/ /lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu ni ljags shin tu ring zhing srab
13b3(mdo sde): pa lags te/ ljags shin tu ring ba nyid dang / srab pa nyid kyi phyir ljags zhal nas phyang bas skra mtshams nas bzung ste/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du yog par mdzad pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha
13b4(mdo sde): gzhon nu ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ka la ping ka'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / rnga'i dbyangs can lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha gzhon nu'i spyan mthon mthing la ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang / gtsug tor dang ldan
13b5(mdo sde): pa dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha 'di dag ni gang dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma lags pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin
13b6(mdo sde): du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so/ /bdag nyid legs bsgoms sku la ni/ /sku yi tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa'i/ /thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/ /de ni bdag gis brjod par
13b7(mdo sde): bgyi/ /'di zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ /sa la mnyam par 'bab pa yin/ /'di zhabs phyag gi mthil la ni/ /'khor lo shin tu dbyibs legs skyes/ /'di zhabs rting pa yangs pa dang / /de ni sor mo ring zhing mdzes/ /phyag zhabs dra bar 'brel pa
14a1(mdo sde): dang / /shing bal lta bur 'jam pa dang / /'di'i zhabs long bu'i tshigs mi mngon/ /byin pa e ne ya dang mtshungs/ /mi mchog sku yang ma btud par/ /phyag gis pus mo'i lha nga slebs/ /mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub/ /n+ya gro d+ha ltar
14a2(mdo sde): chu zheng gab/ /ro stod spu ni re re nas/ /skye zhing de spu g.yas su 'khyil/ /mdog ni gser sbyangs 'dra ba dang / /kun nas 'dom gang 'od dang ldan/ /bcom ldan de ni pags srab cing / /'di sku bdun ni mtho ba ste/ /bcom ldan thal gong rgyas pa dang / /sku stod
14a3(mdo sde): seng ge 'dra ba dang / /sku drang kho lag che ba dang / /dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / /bcu phrag bzhi yi tshems rnams ni/ /yongs su rdzogs shing ma tshang med/ /mnyam dang thags bzang nyid du ni/ /de yi tshems ni legs par gnas/ /rab dkar 'gram pa seng ge 'dra/ /
14a4(mdo sde): ro bro mchog dang ldan pa dang / /ljags ni shin tu srab pa dang / /bcom ldan tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan/ /rdzi ma ba 'dra spyan mthon mthing / /smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu ni/ /dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil/ /mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis 'di/ /gang
14a5(mdo sde): zhig la ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de ni 'gro ba gnyis 'gyur gyi/ /gsum par 'gyur ba ma lags so/ /'di ni gal te khyim gnas na/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal nyid 'gyur te/ /dran ldan bu ni mang ba dang / gnod pa chung zhing mkhas par 'gyur/ /gal te rab byung
14a6(mdo sde): rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gang zag mnyam pa med par 'gyur/ /bshos dang btung dang na bza' dang / /gzims cha rnams kyang rnyed 'gyur la/ /'di yi 'khor ni mi phyed cing / /lus can kun gyi yid du 'ong / /lha rnams rjes su 'brang ba dang / /mi rnams kyang ni de
14a7(mdo sde): bzhin te/ /chos kyi bdag po mchog 'gyur zhing / /mi yul dag tu'ang de bzhin 'gyur/ /mnyam pa med cing 'dra ba med/ /rnam 'dren mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/ /lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags te/ gang dang ldan na 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi
14b1(mdo sde): gzhan ni ma lags zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltam nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / de skrun pa'i yum nongs par gyur te/ nongs ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris gya nom par skyes so/ /de nas rgyal po zas
14b2(mdo sde): gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' ma ma rnams la gtad nas ma ma khyed kyis gzhon nu 'di dus dus su sku mnye byos shig / dus dus su khrus byos shig /dus dus su zas byin cig /dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig /ma ma dga' ba'i lag pa
14b3(mdo sde): gnyis kyis de blangs nas dus dus su sku mnye byed/ dus dus su khrus byed/ dus dus su zas byin/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed do/ /yang de'i tshe dri shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de rnams byugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab
14b4(mdo sde): zas gtsang la phul ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te dga' bas pang du bzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba skyed do/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las yang
14b5(mdo sde): dag par 'das la lha'i kha dog ma thob pa/ skyes pa dang / bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba 'thob ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser la mgar ba mkhas pas/ rgyan brdungs pa/ la ba dkar po sar pa'i steng du bzhag na shin tu gsal
14b6(mdo sde): zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das shing lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug
14b7(mdo sde): pa dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ /yang 'di skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de phrag pa nas phrag par spo bar byed pa ni dper na ston ka'i pad ma skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de lag pa nas lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te snga ma bzhin
15a1(mdo sde): no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas spyan mi 'dzums par gzugs rnams la lta ste/ de spyan mi 'dzums pa ni dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las
15a2(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan des de nyin dang mtshan du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu gzigs so/ /las bcas las byung dri med spyan gyis ni/ /gzugs chen po dang de bzhin phra rab rnams/ /nyin dang mtshan du khor yug dpag tshad gcig /mdun
15a3(mdo sde): na gnas pa bzhin du'ang gzigs par 'gyur/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin te/ dper na gangs can gyi bya skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad snyan pa dang /
15a4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin no/ /ri bo kun 'dzin la drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying
15a5(mdo sde): rje dang ldan pa/ skye dgu la mnyes gshin pa zhig gnas te de la tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba yod pa dang / de de'i tshe phug tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed pa na byang chub sems dpa' bltam ste/ /'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur pa'i snang ba de mthong ba dang nyon mongs med
15a6(mdo sde): la smras pa/ mkhan po 'dir ni nyi ma thams cad dag /cig car byung bar gyur tam ci/ /'di ltar ri ni phug bcas pa/ /'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur/ /nyon mongs med kyis de la smras pa/ nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun du rno/ /bu gcig snang ba 'di dag ni/ /yan lag reg
15a7(mdo sde): na 'od bsil bas/ /nges par thub pa de yi 'od/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od can ni/ /nges par lhums nas bltam gyur la/ /bltams nas sems dpa' chen po de'i/ /'od zer gser dang 'dra ba ni/ /dri ma med pa 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten gsum ni snang byas yin/ /
15b1(mdo sde): mis byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po bzhud/ ci re zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ram/ 'on te bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba rang nyid kyis blta bar mdzod cig /drang srong nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ da ltar na ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i
15b2(mdo sde): khyim nyi 'og gi rgyal po dang / mkhar gyi rgyal po dang / tshong pa dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon rnams dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag brgya stong dpag tu med pas kun tu khyab nas 'dug gis gang gi tshe de dben par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro
15b3(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du kye ma'o drang srong nyon mongs med rkang gis ser skya'i gzhir 'ongs na ci ma rung snyam du sems so/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i pho brang sgor phyin
15b4(mdo sde): pa dang / ji tsam na sgo srungs kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ drang srong nyon mongs med 'dir mchis so zhes rig par byas pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas thos te dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu rangs pa
15b5(mdo sde): byung nas mchog tu gus pas mchod de 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong chen po legs par 'ongs so/ /dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'dir/ /khyed sras blta ba'i phyir mchis te/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam
15b6(mdo sde): 'dren pa/ /thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na ni gzhon nu gnyid log gis sad kyi bar du re zhig sdod cig /nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni/ /mtshan mo'i bzhi cha nyal ba ltar/ /dgos pa don
15b7(mdo sde): gnyer rnams kyi gnyid/ /mig la yun ring mi gnas so/ /de nas gzhon nu shAkya thub pa ma ma'i pang na 'dug pa drang srong nyon mongs med la byin pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas yud tsam brtags te smras pa/ lha gzhon nu 'di mtshan mkhan
16a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis ji skad lung bstan/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras
16a2(mdo sde): pa/ sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/ /rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung / /bsod nams mchog gis chos kyi mdzod 'di ni/ /nyes las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po/ /gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag
16a3(mdo sde): po dbang phyug 'gyur/ /thub dbang mtshan ni shin tu gsal bas na/ /mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor los sgyur/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis bdag nyid kyi tshe'i mtha'i nges pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byang chub pa brtag pa la zhugs
16a4(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhes nas/ khab nas byung nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod par 'gyur te de nas bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur bar mthong ngo / /bdag ni bar skabs der 'chi ba'i dus byed par mthong nas de mig mchi mas gang ste 'dug pa
16a5(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas dngangs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skyes pa bud med rnams kyis mthong ba na/ /ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/ /lus bzang dge byed de ni 'dir mthong nas/ /drang srong chen po ci slad ngu bzhin gyur/ /
16a6(mdo sde): gang las bdag gi gzhon nu 'jigs pa'am/ /tshe zad 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas grang / /de ni myur du legs par bdag la smros/ /khyod kyi mchi mas bdag ni 'dar bar gyur/ /drang srong nyon mongs med kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'di yi steng
16a7(mdo sde): du nam mkha' las/ /rdo rje ser drag 'phangs pa bab gyur kyang / /thub pa chen po'i sku la ba spu ni/ /nyag ma gcig kyang g.yos par mi nus so/ /me chen rlung gi shugs kyis bdas pa dang / /mtshon cha rnon po shin tu mi bzad dang / /drag po'i dug dang sbrul gyi dug
16b1(mdo sde): rnon yang / /gzhon nu la bab skad cig 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /thugs rje nyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa/ /'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/ /de ni 'jig rten kun gyi 'jigs 'joms na/ /mi dbang 'di la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /
16b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten na ni bdag nyid che rnams kyi/ /gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la/ /tshangs bcas lha yang rtag tu srung byed pa/ /mi dbang de la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /mi dbang bdag gi rgud pa mthong nas ni/ /gang phyir zhi ba mi 'thob bdag tu mod/ /chos
16b3(mdo sde): kyi mchog mdzod 'di dang phrad nas ni/ /don ma thob par bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang dag smra ba dam pa mtshungs med pa/ /'di yi chos thos 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang / /rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol 'gro de dag /skyid cing bsod nams ldan la rims nad bral/ /
16b4(mdo sde): de nas drang srong nyon mongs med byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa'i mthus de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams so/ /nyams pa dang nyon mongs med kyis smras pa/ rkang kho nas grong khyer nas phyir 'byung bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas thos pa dang grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang /
16b5(mdo sde): gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas spos dang / phye mas khyab par byed du bcug go/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med 'byor pa chen pos grong khyer nas byung ste/ rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin du phyin pa dang mis byin la smras pa/ ngas gzhon nu mthong ste/ bla na med pa'i ye
16b6(mdo sde): shes rtogs par 'gyur na ngas ni de sleb par mi 'gyur te nga ni bar skabs su dus byed par 'gyur gyis khyod ni de'i thad du rab tu byung la/ nga rgyal dang dregs pa nges par bcom par gyur pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la spyad par bya ste/ rigs kyis dregs par mi bya/ rus kyis
16b7(mdo sde): dregs par mi bya/ rigs rgyud kyis dregs par mi bya ste/ khyod kyis kyang yun ring po mi thogs par bdud rtsi 'thob par 'gyur gyis zhes smras nas yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod na/ /shar phyogs su ni khyod 'dug dang / /rdzogs
17a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/ /rnyed par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas/ gtsang mas gzhon nu ma ma'i pang na 'dug pa la yang dang yang du lta zhing nga'i bu ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni sa'i steng na su la yang med do snyam du
17a2(mdo sde): sems shing shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring por ma lon par ma ma'i pang du bzhugs nas/ gser gyi gzhong par 'bras dang shar bsres pa'i chan gsol ba na de ma mas bkag kyang ma thub par mang por gsol nas dbrog par
17a3(mdo sde): brtsams pa dang / dbrog ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang / rgyal po btsun mo dang lhan cig gis dbrog par brtsams pa dang des kyang ma nus so/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams dang ser skya na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la bsgo na de rnams kyis
17a4(mdo sde): kyang dbrog par ma nus so/ /de nas glang po che lnga brgya la btags pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ 'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams na mi rung gis ma la bdag gis mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa nas gzung ngo snyam nas des mdzub mo
17a5(mdo sde): bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang / glang po che lnga brgya po de dag kha phyir bsgyur te drangs nas de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong pa dbrog par ma nus so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas glang po
17a6(mdo sde): che lnga brgya drangs pa dang sbyar na gdon mi za bar lag pa gnyis kyis ni glang po che stong thub kyis de bas na gzhon nu'i ming glang po che stong gi stobs can zhes gdags so zhes btags so/ /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnas so/ /
17a7(mdo sde): shAkya rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa ni shAkya su yang rung ba la khye'u'am/ bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du gzhug pa'i phyir 'khrid pa yin pas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel
17b1(mdo sde): gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du chug shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' glang po che la bskyon te dpung gi tshogs dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor te grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa dang / grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi sgra bcu gnyis dang bral bar gyur cing byang chub
17b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin du gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsams pa/ grong khyer 'di 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i sgra dang / rta'i sgra dang / shing rta'i sgra dang / dpung bu chung gi sgra dang / dung gi sgra dang / rnga bo che'i sgra dang /
17b3(mdo sde): be de'i sgra dang / rwa dung gi sgra dang / gar gyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sbyin pa ni byin/ bsod nams ni gyis/ bsnyen gnas la ni nye bar gnas/ /tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te mnos shig ces bya ba'i sgra ste sgra bcu gnyis dang bral zhing
17b4(mdo sde): gzhon nu de nang du zhugs pa na thub pa bzhin du zhi bar gnas pas gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes gdags so zhes byang chub sems dpa'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar btags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi gan du khyer ba dang / gnod
17b5(mdo sde): sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te phyag byas so/ /de mthong ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas smras pa/ lhas kyang
17b6(mdo sde): rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pas 'di ni lha'i yang lha yin pas gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes bya bar btags so/ /de nas de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gis dgos pa'i ched la 'dug nas don zab mo'i tshig dang yi ge dag
17b7(mdo sde): shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go cha la yi ge slob par btang nas yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go chas byang chub sems dpa' la yi ger bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems
18a1(mdo sde): dpas smras pa/ 'di ni ngas shes so/ /de nas des yi ge gnyis dang gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di dag thams cad kyang ngas shes kyis gzhan dag smros shig /srin bu go chas
18a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jig rten na ni yi ge 'di tsam spyod kyi gzhan ni bdag gis ma 'tshal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis yi ge bris te srin bu go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/ yi ge 'di ming ci yin smros shig /des smras pa ma 'tshal to/ /byang chub sems dpas
18a3(mdo sde): gsungs pa/ 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung nas mngon par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' dang 'khor los sgyur ba'o/ /nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/ srin bu go cha byang chub sems dpas ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ yi ge 'di ni
18a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na mngon par 'gyur te byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'o/ /byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bklags la nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas dbang byas pas tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya
18a5(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyin pa dang 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas par bzang len dang / lhar bcas zhes bya ba 'phong gi slob dpon gyi gan du 'phong gi gnas su gtad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gnas lnga po rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra
18a6(mdo sde): grag par phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang / mi 'chor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che ba la byang bar gyur to/ /de nas bzang len dang / lhar bcas 'di snyam du sems te byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad bslab kyi lha sbyin 'di ni gdug
18a7(mdo sde): pa yin pas 'jig rten thams cad du gnod par 'gyur na mi rung gis 'di la gnad du bsnun par bslab par mi bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na lha sbyin gyis ngang pa lcags mdas bsnun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang gzhi la bzhugs pa de'i pang
18b1(mdo sde): par de lhu nga ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpas bzung nas mda' phyung ste sman gyis byugs pas sos so/ /lha sbyin gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ngang pa 'di ni ngas yongs su bzung ba yin gyis bskur cig /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ngas ches sngar
18b2(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ste gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de kho na'i tshe yongs su bzung ngo / /der byang chub sems dpa' la lha sbyin gnod sems dang / bzod pa ma yin pa dang / phebs pa ma yin pa byung bar gyur to/ /de nas lha sbyin la
18b3(mdo sde): sogs pa shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya byung ba dang / lha sbyin gyis ras kyis bcings nas shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya bsgyel to/ /ci tsam na byang chub sems dpa' phyogs der bzhud pa dang / lha sbyin gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ci la sdod/ byang chub sems dpas kyang
18b4(mdo sde): ras bcings te shAkya'i gzhon nu lnga brgya bsgyel to/ /de nas lha sbyin ras kyis bcings pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang bzung ste rkang pa gyen du bstan nas gan rgyal du bsgyel pa dang / der yang byang chub sems dpa' la lha sbyin gnod sems dang / mi bzod pa dang /
18b5(mdo sde): bag mi phebs pa'i sems gnyis pa bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya mda' gzhu thogs te phyi rol du byung nas ta la la tshabs byed pa la zhugs pa dang / la las ni ta la gcig phigs so/ /la las ni gnyis so/ /lha sbyin gyis ni gsum mo/ /byang chub
18b6(mdo sde): sems dpas lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang shing ta la bdun phigs pa las ji srid rlung gis bskyod de thams cad 'gyel ba'i bar du rgya cher sbyar ro/ /de nas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis 'bab chu ro hi ta ka'i 'gram na shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba nyi ma gcig cing khru brgyar skye ba mtshan
18b7(mdo sde): mo ni sen mos kyang gcad du rung la nyin par ni mtshon gyis kyang gcad par mi nus pa zhig yod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma pa'i lha rnams kyis gang gis shing dge ba'i snying po rtsa ba steng du bton nas ro hi ta ka'i nang du bcug pa de lta bu'i rlung dang char drag cig sprul to/ /de rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /
19a1(mdo sde): legs par rab sad kyis thos nas shing 'dis grong khyer brlag par ma gyur tam snyam nas srog chags brgya stong dpag tu med pa dang / shing dge ba'i snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / 'khor brgya stong dpag tu med pas drangs su zin kyang ci tsam du bskyod
19a2(mdo sde): par yang ma nus so/ /'char kas smras pa/ lha byang chub sems dpa' sbron cig /rgyal pos smras pa/ kho bos gzhon nu la bka' stsol bar mi nus so/ /'char kas smras pa/ khyed rnams kyis ca co'i sgra gsang mthon po sgrogs shig /ci nas kyang ngas
19a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gshegs par bya'o/ /de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis sgra gsang mthon po dang chen pos ca co'i sgra bsgrags so/ /'char ka byang chub sems dpa'i thad du song ba dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'char ka ca co'i sgra 'di ci zhig yin/
19a4(mdo sde): 'char kas rnam pa de dag rgya cher gsol to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ gal te de lta na 'byin du 'deng / de nas 'char ka dang / byang chub sems dpa' chas pa dang / ci tsam na khung nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung ngo / /'char kas byang chub sems dpa' zin par
19a5(mdo sde): gyur du 'ong ngo zhes ral gri rnon pos rked pa bcad pa dang / sbrul gyi dug gi dbugs kyis 'char ka la phog ste de nag por gyur nas de'i ming yang 'char ka nag po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing dge ba'i snying po gang na ba der bzhud de phyin pa dang / lha sbyin la
19a6(mdo sde): gsungs pa/ khyod kyi stobs ci tsam pa blta yis bskyod cig /lha sbyin gyis 'bad de cung zad cig bsgul to/ /dga' bos ni cung zad drangs so/ /ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi nyams sad par mdzad cing shing dge ba'i snying po phyag gis blangs te 'bab chu ro hi ta ka'i 'gram
19a7(mdo sde): nas 'phangs te byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag shing dge ba'i snying po 'di ni bsil ba'i rang bzhin yin pas mkhris pa'i nad dang / shu ba dang / phol mig byung ba la byugs na zhi bar 'gyur gyis dum bur byos la khyer te rang rang gi khyim du zhog shig /yang yangs
19b1(mdo sde): pa can du glang po che rin po che zhig skyes pa dang / de nas yangs pa can gyi lid tsa bi rnams kyis glang po che mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i
19b2(mdo sde): mthus glang po che rin po che 'di byung gis dong la de kho na la dbul lo snyam mo/ /de rnams kyis glang po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de dong ba las rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir phyin nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che'i dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang / ma stes te gdug pa'i
19b3(mdo sde): las can lha sbyin phyir byung ba des glang po che'i dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan par mthong nas de des phrag dog chen po skyes te de phrag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes pas dris pa/ glang po che'i dam pa 'di su'i yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu shAkya thub pa mtshan mkhan rnams
19b4(mdo sde): kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pa de la yangs pa can gyi tshogs rnams kyis glang po rin po che 'di skyes su phul lo/ /lha sbyin lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ re zhig de 'khor los sgyur bar ma gyur par je khyed cag glang po rin po che 'bul lam zhes smras nas
19b5(mdo sde): thal lcag gis glang po che bsad do/ /ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs pa des de mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag glang po che bzang po 'di sus bsad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis so/ des bsams pa gdon mi za bar 'di la lha sbyin gyi mthu sad kyis ma la bdag
19b6(mdo sde): gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam nas mjug ma nas bzung ste gom pa bdun du bor ro/ /ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa/ glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /sus bsad/ lha sbyin
19b7(mdo sde): gyis so/ /mgron rnams la mgron gyi mchod pa bya ba yin nam legs pa zhig byas so/ /phyogs gang du bsad/ pha bir ro/ /'dir sus drud/ dga' bos so/ /des dgongs pa 'dir gdon mi za bar de gnyis kyis 'di la mthu sad kyis ma la ngas kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o
20a1(mdo sde): snyam du dgongs nas mjug ma nas bzung ste ra ba'i khar 'phangs pa las ra ba rim pa bdun dang / 'obs rim pa bdun las 'das te bor ro/ /de lhung bas gshong btod pa glang po che'i gshong glang po che'i gshong zhes bya bar gyur to/ /'dir smras pa/
20a2(mdo sde): lha sbyin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsad/ /dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du drud/ /byang chub sems dpas phyag gis bar snang la/ /rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs/ /mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ gal te gzhon nu lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rab tu ma
20a3(mdo sde): byung na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis 'di la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga phal po che byin na de lta na ni de rnams la dga' bas rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa'i
20a4(mdo sde): mdun du gos dang / rgyan gyi phung po bzhag nas smras pa/ deng khyed kyis shAkya'i bu mo rnams la rgyan dang gos rnams byin cig /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis ser skya'i grong khyer du deng gzhon nu gos dang rgyan rnams ster bar 'gyur gyis shAkya'i bu mo thams cad shog shig ces dril
20a5(mdo sde): sgrog tu bcug go/ /de nas shAkya'i gzhon nu ma lnga brgya 'ongs pa dang / thams cad la byang chub sems dpas gos dang rgyan rnams byin no/ /de nas shAkya dbyig pa can la grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i bu mo yod pa dang / des de la smras pa/ khyed la yang gzhon nu gos dang
20a6(mdo sde): rgyan rnams ster bar 'gyur gyis song / de nas grags 'dzin ma ci bdag la byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan su zhig khyor 'gyur snyam du bsams nas byang chub sems dpa'i thad du song ba dang / ci tsam na gos dang rgyan thams cad byin zin nas ci yang ma lus pa dang / des byang
20a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i mgul na shin tu mdzes shing rin che ba'i mu tig phreng gcig lus pa mthong nas de de la dga' bas bag 'khums pa med par rang nyid kyis bkrol te rang gi mgul du btags nas byang chub sems dpa'i thad nas song ngo / /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te bu mo
20b1(mdo sde): 'di phebs shing brtan pa las na 'dis gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstun par nus kyis 'di blang bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas grags 'dzin ma bud med kyi 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ song las
20b2(mdo sde): kyi mtha' ci tsam pa la ltos shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po zas gtsang mas bsgo ba gsan te shing rta bzang po la zhugs nas phyi rol du gshegs te yab rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i las kyi mtha' gzigs shing byang chub sems dpa' las kyi mtha' la zhugs pa rnams kyi gan du
20b3(mdo sde): byon pa dang / gshol lnga brgya dang zhing rmed cing zhing pa'i mi de rnams kyis kyang gshol gnon cing 'dren pas stobs nye bar nyams pa mgo lus rdul gyis yog pa dang / rlung dang than pas lus la gdungs pas lus rtsub cing mdog ngan pa/ rkang pa dang / lag pa gas pa dang / dengs
20b4(mdo sde): shing dri ma can gyi gos gyon pa/ rkang pa dri ma can/ ltogs pa dang skom pas mdog ngan zhing / lkog ma dang / mkhur ba dang / mig gi logs skams pa dang / glang de rnams kyang rmon pa lcags gzer rnon po can gyis lus dral bas rgyab dang / mjug do'i phyogs khrag gis g.yogs
20b5(mdo sde): pa/ ltogs pa dang skom pas dbugs brtsegs shing snying ga'i phyogs nas dbugs brtsegs pa ring du 'dren la gnya' shing gis mnan pa'i rma las rnag khrag 'dzag pa la sbrang bu dang / 'bu'i tshogs kyis za ba/ thong lcags kyis rkang pa la rma byung zhing kha dang sna nas kha chu dang sna chu 'dzag
20b6(mdo sde): pa la sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu yog pa rnams gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsod nams bskyed cing bsags pa'i thugs rjes kun nas bskyod pa'i thugs kyis zhing pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /shes ldan
20b7(mdo sde): dag khyed su'i yin/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lags so/ /des gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag khyed deng phan cad bran du mi bya/ mngag gzhug par mi bya/ rang dbang can gar dga' bar 'gro bar byas/ bde ba la reg par gnas shig /rmon pa
21a1(mdo sde): rnams kyang bkrol nas gsungs pa/ khyed cag kyang deng phan cad rtswa mchog ma nyams pa za zhing chu ma rdul ma brnyogs shing dang bdag la 'thung shig /khyed la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung bsil ba ldang bar gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid byung ba
21a2(mdo sde): de nyid kyis yab shAkya zas gtsang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs nas snum zhing sngo la 'dab ma mthug cing grib ma bzang po dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs te/ 'dod pa las dben pa sdig pa
21a3(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas shing dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba zag pa med pa dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang byang chub sems dpa' spangs te mi 'gro bar shing
21a4(mdo sde): gzhan rnams kyi drung na sdod do/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ring zhig thogs te 'di ltar dro'i dus las yol gyis bltar 'gro'o zhes de shing rtar zhugs nas zhing pa'i grong du song ste phan tshun du byang chub sems dpa' tshol zhing shing 'dzam
21a5(mdo sde): bu'i drung du phyin to/ /de'i tshe nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthus shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ngo / /rgyal po
21a6(mdo sde): zas gtsang gis nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur na/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/
21a7(mdo sde): gzhon nu ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ 'di ltar da nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogs su 'bab/ shar phyogs su bab par gyur na/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba ngo mtshar che'o snyam
21b1(mdo sde): mo/ /de nas dga' ba'i bsti stang byas te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar bltam tshes ni g.yos pa ltar/ /'dzam bu'i grib ma khyod sku mi gtong ba/ /blo chen khyod kyi ya mtshan gnyis 'di ste/ /kun gzigs khyod kyi
21b2(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas shing rtar zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na gter skyong ba skra dang kha spu dang sen mo ring ba gter thogs te byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad
21b3(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /lha gter 'di rnams bzhes shig /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'di gang gi lha skyes bu gang zhig dus las 'das pa de rnams kyi lags so/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'di rnams kyis chog gis re zhig de rnams kyi blun po
21b4(mdo sde): yongs su gzung ba byas nas ci zhig byas khyed nga la dgos pa med kyis song shig / tshigs su bcad pas kyang gsungs pa/ gang gis nga la 'chi ba'i gtam smras pa/ /de dag kyang shi gtam du gyur pa yin/ /bdag kyang shi nas ring por mi thogs par/ /gzhan dag gi yang
21b5(mdo sde): gtam du 'gyur bar 'ong / /de rnams kyis yang sgra phyung ba/ gzhon nu gal te mi bzhes na bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpas ci bde bar zhugs shig ces gsungs pa dang / de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs so/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i
21b6(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu'i stobs can yin mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par bya dgos te 'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po yang rkyen gyi stobs la ltos so snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod kyi nang nas gshegs pa na/ lha
21b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis mi ro rnam par sngos pa dang / rnam par rnags pa dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa dang / rnam par bam pa dang / rnam par zos pa zhig bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpas gzigs nas skyo ba 'khrungs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub
22a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' lam gzhan nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par byas so/ /de nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi'i bud med kyi tshogs skar khung dang / skar khung dra ba can dang / ba gam dag na byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing 'dug pa dang / shAkya dus legs
