64a6(mdo sde): pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos
64a7(mdo sde): dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /bran mo zhig de nyid kyi mtshan mo gnyid log pa las sad na/ gzhon nu grags pa
64b1(mdo sde): mal chen po na mi snang bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig /gzhon nu grags pa ni rang gi mal chen po na mi gda' lags so/ /de nas khyim
64b2(mdo sde): bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam/ g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol tu khrid par ma gyur grang snyam du sems shing phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa dag bkye nas rang nyid mi lag na sgron ma thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'bab chu gnod pa can
64b3(mdo sde): gang na ba de logs su song ba dang / khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig phud pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol du
64b4(mdo sde): ma khrid kyi 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig phud pa las na gzhon nu 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs 'di nyid las rgal bar ma gyur grang / 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig bor
64b5(mdo sde): ro snyam du bsams nas 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs de nyid las rgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo rgyang ring po nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te ci nas kyang ngas rdzu
64b6(mdo sde): 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du
64b7(mdo sde): mdzad pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu mdzad do/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
65a1(mdo sde): ci ga gzhon nu grags pa gzigs sam/ khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang / stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/ gdon mi
65a2(mdo sde): z a bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu grags pa gzigs par gyur te 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do zhes bka' stsal to snyam
65a3(mdo sde): du rig nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag rigs
65a4(mdo sde): kyi gtso bo la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa grags pa yang
65a5(mdo sde): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar brtul nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du ni chos spyad de/ /
65a6(mdo sde): dul zhing yang dag sdom pa tshangs spyod la/ /'byung po kun la chad pa spangs pa ni/ /de ni bram ze dge sbyong dge slong yin/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug dang bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos gzhon nu grags pa stan de nyid la 'dug pa
65a7(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gzhon nu grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu tshur shog /khyod kyi ma lus ngal zhing lus dub pas smre sngags 'don gyis khyim du 'dong / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag ji
65b1(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ gang gis mi slob pa'i shes pa dang mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs pa de ji ga khyim pa khyim na gnas pa'am sogs 'jog gi longs spyod kyis 'dod pa la
65b2(mdo sde): longs spyod par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /khyim bdag ji ltar khyod kyis slob pa'i shes pa dang / slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtog pa de bzhin du
65b3(mdo sde): gzhon nu grags pas mi slob pa'i ye shes dang mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /btsun pa gzhon nu grags pas gang gis na mi slob pa'i shes pa dang mi slob pa'i
65b4(mdo sde): lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das slad bzhin du 'brang ba'i dge sbyong grags pa dang / thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung
65b5(mdo sde): ste rigs kyi gtso bo gang na ba der gshegs na legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
65b6(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs man bas/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos bsnams te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan
65b7(mdo sde): pa grags pa dang / khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du bsu ba'i phyir bar sgo na sdod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis
66a1(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su
66a2(mdo sde): gsol zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das
66a3(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi
66a4(mdo sde): gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i rjes su
66a5(mdo sde): bsngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do/ /gang gi tshe de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par
66a6(mdo sde): nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam de rgya cher bshad do/ /dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog
66a7(mdo sde): med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'jen du btub pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par
66b1(mdo sde): rtogs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi
66b2(mdo sde): bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so/ /bdag cag ni mngon par
66b3(mdo sde): 'phags lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir
66b4(mdo sde): zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das gdan
66b5(mdo sde): la bde bar bzhugs pa dang / gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' bdag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' bdag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
66b6(mdo sde): kyis gsol zin cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i
66b7(mdo sde): gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang
67a1(mdo sde): dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang /
67a2(mdo sde): lag / /rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas ni
67a3(mdo sde): mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar gyi rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa re zhig shin tu gzhon pa/ shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang / kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
67a4(mdo sde): khyim med par rab tu byung gis/ ma la bdag cag gis kyang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang /
67a5(mdo sde): lnga pa gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag / /rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams bA rA Na sI nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs
67a6(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri ma med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag / /rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa legs par
67a7(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba
67b1(mdo sde): dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas so/ /gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na gang gi
67b2(mdo sde): phyir rigs kyi bu de dag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa/ tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do/ /
67b3(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu dang / bcu gcig pa ni bcom
67b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das so/ /bA rA Na sI na grong mi gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcus rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag / /rigs
67b5(mdo sde): kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing / chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma
67b6(mdo sde): yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag / /rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams ni re zhig shin tu gzhon pa/ shin
67b7(mdo sde): tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis/ ma la bdag cag kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam
68a1(mdo sde): mo/ /de nas grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag bA rA Na sI nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas grong
68a2(mdo sde): mi'i gtso bo'i khye'u lnga bcu po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par
68a3(mdo sde): spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtod par
68a4(mdo sde): gnas so/ /gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu de dag snga ma bzhin du ji srid sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug cu dang /
68a5(mdo sde): drug cu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin
68a6(mdo sde): no/ /dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing
68a7(mdo sde): deng la khyed gnyis shig ni gcig tu ma 'gro zhig / nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di bA rA Na sI'i drang srong smra ba kyi nags su 'dug nas de nyan thos rnams la
68b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces chos ston te/ /dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/ /dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya
68b2(mdo sde): ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing 'gro'o zhes zer gyis/ ma la bdag gis de la 'di lta ste/ dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/
68b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ ma grol grol bar 'du shes na/ /ji ltar bdag nyid grol bar sems/ /bdag nyid dge sbyong ma bkrol bas/ /'ching ba chen pos bcings pa yin/ /de nas
68b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te/ 'di lta ste dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi/ /'ching ba gang yin kun las grol/ /bar chad byed
68b5(mdo sde): pa khyod bcom par/ /sdig can de ltar shes par gyis/ /de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sems kyis bdag shes so snyam du rig nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la yid gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
68b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/ /dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/
68b7(mdo sde): dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der gshegs so/ /btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan
69a1(mdo sde): nas ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bA rA Na sIr ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang grong khyer sde can du byon to/ /de nas bcom ldan
69a2(mdo sde): 'das ras bal can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing zhig gi drung du brten te nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol du nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga'
69a3(mdo sde): bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros so/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras bal gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der dong ba dang / drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dad
69a4(mdo sde): par 'os pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul ba/ zhi ba dang / dul ba dang ldan pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur dpal gyis 'bar zhing shing zhig gi drung na brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste
69a5(mdo sde): lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ga bud med gcig gzigs sam/ gzhon nu dag bud med de khyed cag gi cir 'ong / btsun pa 'di na bdag cag drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi slad rol du bud med kyis bgyis
69a6(mdo sde): pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid dga' dgur spyod par bgyid de/ de rnams dang bdag cag rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa na/ bud med gcig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshol lags so/ /gzhon nu dag ji snyam du
69a7(mdo sde): sems/ bud med tshol ba gang yin pa dang / bdag nyid tshol ba gang gdam/ btsun pa bdag cag la bud med kyis ci bgyis/ bdag cag ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags pa de gdam lags so/ /gzhon nu dag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang khyed la chos bshad do/ /
69b1(mdo sde): de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa la
69b2(mdo sde): sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i
69b3(mdo sde): tshogs kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi
69b4(mdo sde): 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag cag bcom
69b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs
69b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs man bas/
69b7(mdo sde): lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas grong khyer sde can der thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las/ de nas bcom
70a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/ de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas gnas pa na 'dis mar gsar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas
70a2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas so snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/ /grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom
70a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol/ zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa
70a4(mdo sde): de nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /
70a5(mdo sde): dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba nas/ mngon par dad nas skyabs su song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
70a6(mdo sde): btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi
70a7(mdo sde): g sung bas gnang bar rig cing bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag rang gi lag nas
70b1(mdo sde): bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te phyag bcabs shing lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu
70b2(mdo sde): mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
70b3(mdo sde): 'das grong khyer sde can nas gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ngas yul ma ga ng+hA 'dir ngang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas na de dbang du gyur pas tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snyam mo/ /de'i tshe lteng
70b4(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas pa 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod pa de ma ga ng+hA'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par bkur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang nai rany+dza nA'i chu klung gi
70b5(mdo sde): 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa 'di ma ga ng+hA'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
70b6(mdo sde): du ste/ ma la ngas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dbang du bya ste 'di dbang du gyur na tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas ga na ba der gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung
70b7(mdo sde): ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po tshur spyon/ dge sbyong chen po byon pa legs so/ /dge sbyong chen po yun ring po zhig lags na
71a1(mdo sde): gang nas 'khor 'dir byon/ dge sbyong chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang / bcom ldan 'das lhan cig
71a2(mdo sde): mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung
71a3(mdo sde): gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi me khang du nga zhag gcig cig 'dug go/ /dge sbyong chen po bdag la mi bde ba ma mchis na/ 'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te des khyod tho btsams par 'gyur du mchi'o/ /'od srung khyod kyis re zhig gnang bar gyis shig
71a4(mdo sde): dang tho btsams par mi 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong chen po gal te khyod la mtho mi 'tsham na dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas me khang gi phyi rol du zhabs bsil
71a5(mdo sde): nas me khang gi nang du zhugs te/ nyid kyis rtswa'i gding ba bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs so/ /klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khros pa'i mthus dud
71a6(mdo sde): pa phyung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dud pa phyung ngo / /klu gdug pas khro ba'i mthus 'bar bar byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
71a7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas sreg par byed do/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ba na me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig
71b1(mdo sde): tu gyur nas sreg pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma 'di ltar mdzes pa klu gdug pas thal bar byas par ma gyur gyur grang / kyi hud nyon mongs bdag gi tshig ma nyan to snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga lteng rgyas
71b2(mdo sde): 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pas phyas spyad kyis ma la ngas rdzu 'phrul ji lta bur mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod par mi byed cing de dul bar byas nas lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/
71b3(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i me zil gyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa de lta bu mngon par
71b4(mdo sde): 'du mdzad de/ de dul bar mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der bsnams te gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
71b5(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhig /'od srung gson no/ /dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na bsnams te byon pa ci/ 'od srung klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su mi ster ba de ngas btul nas lhung bzed du bcug nas
71b6(mdo sde): khyer te 'ongs so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag cag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti
71b7(mdo sde): gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod pa re re'i me thab gsum gsum ste/ /me thab stong lnga brgya yod do/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyod par 'dod
72a1(mdo sde): na me spar bar ma nus so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyod par
72a2(mdo sde): 'tshal na zhugs de spar bar rngo ma thogs lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste
72a3(mdo sde): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na/ me de spar bar rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge
72a4(mdo sde): sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung me spar bar 'dod dam dge sbyong chen po spar du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to/ /de nas lteng
72a5(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyad nas me gsad par 'dod na gsad par ma nus so/ /
72a6(mdo sde): de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig /'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum
72a7(mdo sde): pa'i rngo ma thogs lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge slong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
72b1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ /'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams zhugs la yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ /bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong
72b2(mdo sde): chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung me de bsad dam/ dge sbyong chen po dgum du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid shi'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od
72b3(mdo sde): srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas yang dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang nyid me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na spar bar
72b4(mdo sde): ma nus so zhes bya ba nas/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no snyam mo/ /de bzhin du yongs su spyad nas gsad par 'dod na zhes bya ba nas/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na
72b5(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa de la lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis bsgrims kyang
72b6(mdo sde): gsad par ma nus so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
72b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ dge sbyong chen po 'dir bdag gi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa de la bdag 'khor dang bcas pa
73a1(mdo sde): dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bsgrims na zhugs dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung me de zhi bar bya'am/ dge sbyong
73a2(mdo sde): chen po zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba
73a3(mdo sde): yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das
73a4(mdo sde): gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge
73a5(mdo sde): sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi yod do snyam mo/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das gang
73a6(mdo sde): na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag ma dang sum rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce
73a7(mdo sde): gcig tu gyur te sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod do/ /'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa
73b1(mdo sde): bzhi mchis so snyam mo/ /'od srung cing me la yongs su spyod dam/ nga me la yongs su mi spyod de/ mkhas pa kun nas nyon mongs las/ /sems ni yongs su zlog byed kyi/ /me 'am yang na chu dag la/ /yongs bsten yon tan ci zhig yod/ /de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum
73b2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te lhags nas nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi po lta
73b3(mdo sde): bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
73b4(mdo sde): byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po
73b5(mdo sde): de dag pas ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu
73b6(mdo sde): 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
73b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas/ me'i phung po chen po lnga po de me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba
74a1(mdo sde): lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che
74a2(mdo sde): mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab bo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te gal te mag d+hA'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong
74a3(mdo sde): chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas yod kyis/ kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
74a4(mdo sde): pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do/ /de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung
74a5(mdo sde): ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin pa dang 'di snyam du sems te/ zhag bdun po 'di la bdag la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis kye
74a6(mdo sde): ma da ni dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de la bsod snyoms spyod du gzhug go snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so/ /lteng rgyas 'od
74a7(mdo sde): srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slad du zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du bzhud lags/ 'od srung
74b1(mdo sde): k hyod kyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas 'di snyam du gal te ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no bar shes na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis
74b2(mdo sde): kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam sems pa ma yin nam/ /nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo / /'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin
74b3(mdo sde): nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go
74b4(mdo sde): snyam du sems pa ma yin nam dge sbyong chen po de lta lags so/ /nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas nga 'ongs pa yin no/ /dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar longs spyad du gsol/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po
74b5(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs shig dang bdag gis khyod la
74b6(mdo sde): chos dang 'thun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom
74b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ 'od srung de'i phyir song shig nga yang 'ong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma
75a1(mdo sde): lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas
75a2(mdo sde): gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la
75a3(mdo sde): bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag
75a4(mdo sde): na shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig / dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar
75a5(mdo sde): 'tshal lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa
75a6(mdo sde): de dang / ha cang mi ring ba zhig na a ru ra'i nags dang / bil ba'i nags dang ka pid tha'i nags dang / skyu ru ra 'i nags kyang de bzhin no/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lus lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi
75a7(mdo sde): bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces
75b1(mdo sde): gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so/ /dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i
75b2(mdo sde): 'bras lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig / dge slong chen po ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che
75b3(mdo sde): zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i
75b4(mdo sde): dgos pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang / de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste chu bab pa de
75b5(mdo sde): la bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po byung ste chu bab pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni med na chu 'di da ltar gang nas byung snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
75b6(mdo sde): pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po'i chab cig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/
75b7(mdo sde): chu 'di sngon ma mchis na da ltar chu 'di gang nas bab snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung 'dir khyod las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa na nga la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nga la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar
76a1(mdo sde): shes nas nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i mdun du lag pas sa la bsnun pa las de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ba de la ngas chus chu'i bya ba mdzad de/ /'od srung rdzing 'di ni lag pas brkos pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/
76a2(mdo sde): 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma red du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram
76a3(mdo sde): gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar bzhed pa na shing ardzu na gang na ba de logs su phyag brkyang ngo / /de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud par gyur te/ de la bcom ldan
76a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis gzung nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud pa zhig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga 'di sngon ni dud par ma
76a5(mdo sde): gyur na/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di da su zhig gis btud snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti gnas
76a6(mdo sde): na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ /ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni dud par ma gyur nad su zhig gis btud snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung 'dir phye ma red nang
76a7(mdo sde): du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te lus khrus byas nas/ rdzing lag pas
76b1(mdo sde): brkos pa nas byung bar 'dod nas shing ardzu na 'di dag gang na ba de logs su lag pa brkyang ba dang / de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di dud par gyur te/ de la ngas 'jus nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo / /'od srung 'di ni ardzu na lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas
76b2(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes nas/ de nas bcom
76b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang du bkru snyam mo/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas ri brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
76b4(mdo sde): ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 'di la bkru bar gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar
76b5(mdo sde): khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
76b6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag bkram mo/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag mthong ngo / /
76b7(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni med na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis khyer te 'ongs snyam mo/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
77a1(mdo sde): dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag cig mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ye ma mchis na/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig
77a2(mdo sde): gis 'tshal te mchis snyam bgyid do/ /'od srung 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes so/ /de nas nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag gang du bkru snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes
77a3(mdo sde): nas/ brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so/ /nga 'di
77a4(mdo sde): snyam du dgongs te/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te nga gang na ba der 'ongs te byin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol
77a5(mdo sde): to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkram mo/ /'od srung rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di
77a6(mdo sde): snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe nai rany+dza nA'i chu cher
77a7(mdo sde): zug nas bab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i steng na rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag pas 'chag par mdzad do/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po brug pas khyer
77b1(mdo sde): bar ma gyur gyur grang / ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal snyam du bsams nas shing gcig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yog pa bla
77b2(mdo sde): gab med pa na 'chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po gson nam/ 'od srung gson no/ /dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam/ 'od srung 'jug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
77b3(mdo sde): 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig pa'i gru ji ltar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag nas shing gcig pa'i gru ji lta bar
77b4(mdo sde): chu la 'jug par de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ /'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
77b5(mdo sde): thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung ral pa can khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i
77b6(mdo sde): lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po bdag legs par
77b7(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar ba dag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /'od srung khyod kyi 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so/ /'od srung de'i phyir
78a1(mdo sde): re zhig 'khor la ltos shig / 'dir khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa shes nyen can rnams kyis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yin no/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i
78a2(mdo sde): khye'u dag shes par gyis shig / bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po bdag cag gis cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po la brten nas lags pas gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan
78a3(mdo sde): sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis de'i phyir g.yang gzhi dang shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs gzar 'di da ga chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du 'or cig /
78a4(mdo sde): mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril pa spyi blugs dang / blugs gzar rnams chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram du bor nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lteng rgyas
78a5(mdo sde): 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan po 'di ltar bdag cag gis bdag cag gi bgyi ba gang lags pa de bgyis lags so/ /de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
78a6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po bdag gis 'khor la bltas lags te bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /'od srung
78a7(mdo sde): tshur shog / tshangs par spyod pa spyad cig /de nyid kyis che dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/ /de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi spun chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung gnyis 'khor nyis brgya
78b1(mdo sde): lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / chu klung nai rany+dza nA'i mjug gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/ /chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun gyis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / 'khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs gzar de dag chu klung nai rany+dza nAs khyer
78b2(mdo sde): ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po'am/ chom rkun nam/ me'am chus nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang / ma la bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsal lo
78b3(mdo sde): snyam mo/ /de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun dag lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can tshol zhing lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong ba dang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom
78b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung gis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od
78b5(mdo sde): srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'od srung 'di mchog yin la de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srung dag 'di ni mchog yin te de ni ma yin no/ /de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma
78b6(mdo sde): yin pa ma yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par
78b7(mdo sde): byas shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang lan gnyis kyi bar du dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs kyis ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge
79a1(mdo sde): sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /khyod kyis 'khor la bltas
79a2(mdo sde): sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so/ /'od srung dag de'i phyir re zhig 'khor la ltos shig /'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa/ shes nyen can dag gis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yin no/ /de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / g.yA 'od srung spun rang gi bsti
79a3(mdo sde): gnas gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig /kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po dag bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal ba de
79a4(mdo sde): thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags pas gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus da yin par shes par gyis shig /de nas chu klung
79a5(mdo sde): 'od srung dang / ga yA 'od srung spun 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag cag
79a6(mdo sde): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /'od srung dag tshur sheg /tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /de nyid kyis tshe dang
79a7(mdo sde): ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can stong po de dag rab tu byung ba snyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ ga ya gang na ba
79b1(mdo sde): der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ga yAr byon nas ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon gyi ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de la cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms
79b2(mdo sde): par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyi gdan gyi nang du mi snang
79b3(mdo sde): bar gyur cing shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal bar mdzad do/ /me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge
79b4(mdo sde): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog go/ /cho 'phrul zung du ston par mdzad de
79b5(mdo sde): sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stod las chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do/ /sku'i stod nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /
79b6(mdo sde): nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ /phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul
79b7(mdo sde): gyi cho 'phrul yin no/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag khyod kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o/ /khyod kyi yid ni 'di lta bu'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o/ /'di ni rtog cig /'di ni ma rtog cig /'di ni yid la byos shig /
80a1(mdo sde): 'di ni yid la ma byed cig /'di ni spongs shig /'di ni ma spang zhig /'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs par gyis te mnos shig /'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho
80a2(mdo sde): 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no/ /dge slong dag thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhe na/ dge slong dag mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing mig gi
80a3(mdo sde): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no/ /dge slong dag rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi
80a4(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin
80a5(mdo sde): no/ /gang gis kun tu 'bar ba 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ba/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa ste
80a6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o/ /de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam
80a7(mdo sde): par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba
80b1(mdo sde): yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong
80b2(mdo sde): ser skya'i bsti gnas dang / ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te/ khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba rin po che sna bdun
80b3(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che
80b4(mdo sde): yin no/ /de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpa' ba rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis
80b5(mdo sde): bda' ba med la chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
80b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang ma gad+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ma gad+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen
80b7(mdo sde): par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'dir lha'i yul na rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan pa zhig thos so zhes bya
81a1(mdo sde): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /lha de khum shig /lha ches gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o/ /grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/ grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ lha de khum shig /lha
81a2(mdo sde): ches gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o zhes khyed cag de skad ma smra zhig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ /gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na de'i g.yog bya'o/ /gal te
81a3(mdo sde): skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par gyur na de'i nyan thos su khas blang
81a4(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ /de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang gzhi la 'dug nas smon pa'i gzhi lnga la smon par byed de/ kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
81a5(mdo sde): rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das byung ba dang de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang / nye bar song ba na des kyang bdag la
81a6(mdo sde): chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang / bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
81a7(mdo sde): dag ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po de steng gi khang gzhi la 'dug nas/ smon pa'i gzhi lnga smon par byed de/ kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i bar gong
81b1(mdo sde): ma bzhin no/ /ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho bdag cig ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang / ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin pa de bram ze mtshan
81b2(mdo sde): mkhan dang ltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par
81b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de ga yA na ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/
81b4(mdo sde): srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo
81b5(mdo sde): sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'di na lha'i yul na rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa de zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/
81b6(mdo sde): de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de ga yA na ga yA'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge
81b7(mdo sde): slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ lha de dag la bkur sti mdzod cig dang / de lta na lha gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur ro/ /
82a1(mdo sde): de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kwa'i nang rje tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la song nas kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba
82a2(mdo sde): chung ngam/ 'tsho'am/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang / bde ba dang / sku nyams dang ldan nam/ reg par spyod dam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /
82a3(mdo sde): bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
82a4(mdo sde): can snying po las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mi des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
82a5(mdo sde): la ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam zhes bya ba nas/ reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du ste snyun gsol lags so/ /kye mi khyod dang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
82a6(mdo sde): can snying po bde bar gyur cig / btsun pa ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchid nas/ 'di skad ces bdag bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang /
82a7(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes mchi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das cad
82b1(mdo sde): mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom
82b2(mdo sde): pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs cig tu ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ yul ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa gang na ba der gshegs so/ /
82b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/ ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa na bzhugs so/ /ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge
82b4(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa gang na ba der gshegs te/
82b5(mdo sde): ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa na bzhugs so/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang shing rta bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen pos rta dang shing rta brgya stong snyed dang lhan cig 'khor brgya
82b6(mdo sde): phrag du ma dang rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na/ de'i shing rta'i 'khor lo sa'i nang du bying bar gyur to/ /des bsams pa bdag gis las skyon can cung zad cig byas par ma gyur grang
82b7(mdo sde): snyam mo/ /lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyod pa gang yin pa de dag btson ra na 'dug gis de dag thon cig /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na gdon no zhes rgyal pos btson rnams 'don du
83a1(mdo sde): bcug go/ /yang rgyal po phyir byung bar brtsams pa na de'i dbu rgyan sgo la thug go/ /des yang bsams pa/ bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te des na bdag la ltas ngan pa gzhan sgo la dbu rgyan thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo/ /lha de rnams kyis
83a2(mdo sde): yang smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag kha cig ni 'dus kyang kha cig ni yul ljongs gzhan ga ge mo zhes bya ba dag na las kyi mtha' byed cing 'dug pa de dag sbron cig /rgyal pos yul de na
83a3(mdo sde): gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyang bkug go/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shing rta khri nyis stong dang / zhabs 'bring ba rta pa'i tshogs khri brgyad stong dang / ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ bcom
83a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo / /de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste/ bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ /ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can
83a5(mdo sde): snying pos thag ji tsam nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i bar de nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po ze'u kha dang / gdugs dang / ral gri dang / nor bu'i rnga yab dang / lham khra bo rnams phud do/ /de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan

83a7(mdo sde): gzugs can snying po lags so/ /btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so/ /rgyal po lags so/ /rgyal po de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no rgyal
83b1(mdo sde): po chen po khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no/ /rgyal po yin no/ /rgyal po chen po khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug shig /de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
83b2(mdo sde): byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /

83b4(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dge sbyong chen po lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la
83b5(mdo sde): spyad dam/ 'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa la spyod snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la tshigs su
83b6(mdo sde): bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba rmas pa/ lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dir ci mthong na/ /me spangs nas ni brtul shugs 'di dag spyod/ khyod kyis ji ltar me yi mchod spangs pa/ /don de 'od srung nga la smra bar gyis/ /lteng rgyas 'od srung gis gsol pa/ 'di na
83b7(mdo sde): kha cig zas skom de bzhin ro/ /'dod pa dag dang bud med kho na smra/ /de dag phung po'i dri mar rab mthong ste/ /des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg blugs min/ /khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang / /de bzhin ro la yid ni mi dga' na/ /lha mi 'jig rten la
84a1(mdo sde): ci khyod kyi yid/ /dga' ba yin nam 'od srung dri yis smros/ /phung po ma mchis zhi ba ci ma mchis/ /'dod sred ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis/ /gzhan gyis mi bkri'i go 'phang mchog mthong ste/ /des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg blugs
84a2(mdo sde): min/ /go 'phang mi nyams mchog ni ma mthong bas/ /mchod sbyin brtul zhugs dang ni zhugs dag gis/ /grol snyam bdag gi yid ni rmongs gyur te/ /dmus long gyur nas skye shi'i rjes bzhin mthong / /skyob pa gtso bo mchog gis legs bshad pa/ /go 'phang

84a5(mdo sde): kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdus te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
84a6(mdo sde): btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa
84a7(mdo sde): lags so/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/ /'od srung de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no/ /khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no/ /'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no/ /khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no/ /'od srung khyod rang gi stan ji

84b7(mdo sde): tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o/ /rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par
