106b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/
106b2(mdo sde): thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon
106b3(mdo sde): gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis ni shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag
106b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don de nyid zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
106b5(mdo sde): der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'dir bdag cag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rab tu mang po
106b6(mdo sde): 'dun khang du 'tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi bka' mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/ shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/
106b7(mdo sde): shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams
107a1(mdo sde): kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar
107a2(mdo sde): bgyi'o snyam nas de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di nyid zhu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes lags/ thog ma ni gang lags/ rgyu ni ci zhig lag lags/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
107a3(mdo sde): 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs na/ mu stegs can dang / kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dge slong gau ta ma ni ci 'dod pa de lung ston pas bdag nyid stod par byed do zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i gnas
107a4(mdo sde): 'di yod pas nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs par nus pa su yod snyam mo/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal
107a5(mdo sde): gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu nga ro rgyab bsnyung bas re zhig de bas la gyis khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi
107a6(mdo sde): smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud nas snam sbyar bltab ste sngas su bcug nas/ glo g.yas pas phab ste/ zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang / dran
107a7(mdo sde): pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang /
107b1(mdo sde): rgyu ni ci yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong
107b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang
107b3(mdo sde): yin pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams la smras pa/ gau tam dag 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing 'jig
107b4(mdo sde): rten zhig nas/ sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de rnams de na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po mnyams shing ma tshang ba med pa yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas
107b5(mdo sde): pa/ rang gi 'od can/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur zhing mtsho gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung
107b6(mdo sde): gis pris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do/ /dper na 'o ma bskol ba grang bar gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis pris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs pa de bzhin du sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gis mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis
107b7(mdo sde): pris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do/ /sa'i bcud de ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum tshogs pa yin zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na mar sar lta bu'o/ /ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang
108a1(mdo sde): rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/ /gau ta ma dag 'jig rten gang yin pa 'di 'chags shing 'jig rten chags na/ de nas sems can kha cig tshe zad las zad bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'di lta bur mi rnams
108a2(mdo sde): dang skul ba mnyam par 'ong zhing de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas pa rang gi 'od can/ mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga'
108a3(mdo sde): ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/ rgyu skar rnams kyang med/ skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam yang med/ mtshan mo dang nyin mo yang med/ zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus
108a4(mdo sde): tshigs dang / lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba med do/ /skyes pa dang bud med du mngon pa yang med kyi gzhan du na sems can sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed
108a5(mdo sde): de/ /ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/ /ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/ /sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed de/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred la/ ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de
108a6(mdo sde): ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de rnams kyis kyang mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar rtsom ste/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/ /ji lta ji ltar sred pa de/ lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/ /gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i
108a7(mdo sde): bcud la kham gyi zas rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe/ de rnams kyi lus la mkhrang ba dang lci ba zhugs par gyur to/ /de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de yang nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag chos nyid kyis 'jig rten du
108b1(mdo sde): mun pa byung ba na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de
108b2(mdo sde): rnams de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams las zas la ches nyung zad du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par 'gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi
108b3(mdo sde): rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan no/ /khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod do/ /kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid
108b4(mdo sde): blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag sa'i bcud de nub pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams kyis
108b5(mdo sde): zas zhim po cig zos nas sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa'i bcud de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra
108b6(mdo sde): zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes de'i don ni mi shes so/ /gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi sa'i bcud de nub pa na/ sa'i zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum
108b7(mdo sde): tshogs pa byung bar 'gyur te/ kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na dong ka'i me tog lta bu'o/ /ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ /dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o/ /de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams las kha zas la
109a1(mdo sde): ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to/ /zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can kho
109a2(mdo sde): bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i zhag nub par gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag sa'i zhag de nub par gyur
109a3(mdo sde): pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan gyis sdug bsngal bar byed do/ /dper na da ltar mi rnams sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba 'ba' zhig gis reg pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang /
109a4(mdo sde): tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces e ma'o kyi hud e ma'o kyi hud ces smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa zhag de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi hud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur kyang smras pa
109a5(mdo sde): 'di'i don ni 'di yin smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar mi shes so/ /gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyis zhag de nub pa na/ myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing kha dog ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper
109a6(mdo sde): na shing ka dam pa ka'i me tog lta bu'o/ /ro ni 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o/ /de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to/ /
109a7(mdo sde): kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to/ /zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad
109b1(mdo sde): du gsod par byed do/ /kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ mdun nas phar song /
109b2(mdo sde): mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /dper nad ltar mi rnams 'ga' zhig la drag po'i tshar bcad pas tshar bcad par 'dod pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de dag nyid rjes su zlos shing 'di skad du/ mdun nas
109b3(mdo sde): phar song / mdun nas phar song zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub pa dang / tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces mdun nas phar song mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang / smras pa
109b4(mdo sde): 'di'i don ni 'di yin smras pa/ 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar de'i don ni mi shes so/ /gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi myu gu'i tshal nub nas/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa/ sbun pa med pa/ shun pa med pa/
109b5(mdo sde): dag pa gtsang ma skye ste/ de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas na nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas/ /brngas shing brngas kyang slar skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon no/ /de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /gang nas
109b6(mdo sde): sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu la kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos pa de nas de rnams kyi dbang po tha dad pa byung bar gyur te/ kha cig la ni skyes pa'i dbang po'o/ /kha cig la ni bud med kyi dbang po'o/ /de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang yin pa
109b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / skyes pa'i dbang po can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su blta'o/ /ji lta ji ltar gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su lta ba de lta de ltar kun tu chags so/ /ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar zhen no/ /ji lta ji ltar zhen pa
110a1(mdo sde): de lta de ltar log par zhugs so/ /sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sa dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos gtor nas 'di skad ces/ sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya
110a2(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa byed do/ /sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis/ kwa'e sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra'o/ /dper na da ltar gyi mi rnams bag ma blangs pa na phye ma dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang /
110a3(mdo sde): 'bras yos kyis gtor nas 'di skad ces bag ma bde bar gyur cig ces zer ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ba na sas gtor cing bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams kyis kyang gtor nas kyang 'di skad ces sems can ngan pa tha
110a4(mdo sde): chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do/ /sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed kyis/ kwa'e sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes bya ba smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/ /gau ta ma dag de ltar na sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa dang / sngon
110a5(mdo sde): gyi 'dul ba ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar chos su 'dod do/ /'dul bar 'dod do/ /sngon smad par bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni da ltar bsngags par bya bar 'dod do/ /de rnams kyis de zhag gcig cig spangs pa/ nas zhag gnyis dang / gsum dang /
110a6(mdo sde): bdun du yang spangs so/ /gang na sems can de rnams sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de la lhag par sdig pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de rnams khang pa brtsig pa la brtson par byed do/ /'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do/ /'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin
110a7(mdo sde): pa spyad do zhes zer bas khyim khyim zhes bya bar grags te/ gau ta ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du khang pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no/ /de yang chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni gtso bo yin no/ /
110b1(mdo sde): de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs ka/ nang bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang nang par sA lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do/ /de nas sems can snyom las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis nang par gyi sA lu nub blangs so/ /de nas sems can gzhan zhig gis sems can
110b2(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig /kho bos ni nang par gyi sA lu nub blangs so/ /de nas sems can de 'di
110b3(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni legs so/ /kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis ma la bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blang ngo snyam nas/ des zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu
110b4(mdo sde): blangs so/ /de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de nas sems can des sems can de la skad ces smras so/ /kye sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig /kho bos ni zhag
110b5(mdo sde): gnyis kyi dang / gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blangs zin no/ /de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni legs so/ /kye ma de ni shin tu legs kyis/ ma la bdag gis zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig gi sA lu blang ngo snyam nas/ des zla ba
110b6(mdo sde): phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sA lu blangs so/ /gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru sogs 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang / sbun pa dang / shun pas yog par gyur to/ /brngas shing
110b7(mdo sde): brngas nas nga phyir mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sA lu yang sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to/ /de nas sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas shes ldan dag bdag cag sngon yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing
111a1(mdo sde): ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la/ bdag cag la sa'i bcud kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/
111a2(mdo sde): dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ /bdag cag sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos te/ gang gi tshe bdag cag gis sa'i bcud la kham gyi rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe bdag cag gi lus la rtsub pa nyid dang / lci ba nyid du zhugs par gyur
111a3(mdo sde): te/ kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de ni nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/ /bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur to/ /bdag cag las kha zas la ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog
111a4(mdo sde): bzang por gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'e sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog
111a5(mdo sde): ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/ /sa'i bcud de nub pa nas zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/
111a6(mdo sde): dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha
111a7(mdo sde): dog ngan par gyur te/ zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'e sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /
111b1(mdo sde): bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag de nub par gyur to/ /sa zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za
111b2(mdo sde): zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /bdag cag rnams las kha zas ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha dog
111b3(mdo sde): rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'e sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu
111b4(mdo sde): gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/ /myu gu'i tshal de nub pa na ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa/ sbun pa med pa/ shun pa med pa/ dag pa gtsang ma skye ste/ de nub brngas na nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur bas brngas shing brngas kyang slar
111b5(mdo sde): yang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon te/ bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /gang nas bdag cag gis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru sogs 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma
111b6(mdo sde): dang / sbun pa dang / shun pas yog par gyur to/ /brngas shing brngas na yang slar mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sA lu yang sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur pas/ ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te mtshams
111b7(mdo sde): bcad la/ 'di ni khyod kyi'o/ /'di ni nga'i 'o zhes mu thug bre bar bya'o zhes de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas zhing bgos te mtshams su mu thug bres so/ /gau ta ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du mu thug bre ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no/ /de yang
112a1(mdo sde): chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin pas de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni chos kyi mchog yin no/ /de nas sems can zhig gis rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs so/ /sems can gzhan dag gis sems can des rang
112a2(mdo sde): gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kwa'e sems can khyod/ rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blang zhes de phar drangs tshur drangs nas ci tsam na 'khor mi'i nang
112a3(mdo sde): du khrid de/ shes ldan dag sems can 'di rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par len to zhes spyos so/ /de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kwa'e sems can khyod/ rang gi sA lu yod
112a4(mdo sde): bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par ci'i phyir blang / kwa'e sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig /de nas sems can des sems can de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag sems can 'dis bdag sA lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs
112a5(mdo sde): nas ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas spyos so/ /de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di smras so/ /kwa'e sems can khyod kyis sems can la sA lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs nas ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas ci'i phyir spyo/ /kwa'e
112a6(mdo sde): sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig / de nas sems can de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag sA lu'i phyir phar 'dren tshur 'dren cing ci tsam na 'khor gyi nang du spyo ba yang snang bas/ ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la bdag cag gi nang na
112a7(mdo sde): sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gi zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos dang / des bdag cag chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams ni chad pas
112b1(mdo sde): gcod par 'gyur/ phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur te/ bdag cag gi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las de la chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin par bya'o snyam nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus te/ de rnams kyi nang nas lhag par
112b2(mdo sde): gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te/ 'di skad ces kye sems can khyod tshur shog /kho bo cag las chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas
112b3(mdo sde): chod cig / phan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan thogs shig /kho bo cag gi zhing dag la 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las khyod la kho bo cag gis chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin no/ /de de rnams la chad pas gcad par bya ba la ni chad pas gcod/ phan gdags
112b4(mdo sde): par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed cing de la de rnams kyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thog shas dbul te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur zhing skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bkur bas mang pos bkur ba mang pos bkur ba zhes grags so/ /
112b5(mdo sde): zhing de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na nyams pa las skyob par byed pas rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so/ /chos kyis skye dgu mgu bar byed cing tshul khrims nyams su blangs te gnas/ shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas pas rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so/ /
112b6(mdo sde): gau ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sems can sems can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i bu 'od mdzes zhes bya ste/ gau ta ma dag rgyal po 'od mdzes kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming tshur shog /tshur shog ces bya bar
112b7(mdo sde): gyur to/ /'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba zhes bya ste/ gau ta ma dag rgyal po dge ba'i tshe mi rnams kyi ming sme ba can sme ba can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag dge ba'i bu dge mchog ces bya ste/ gau ta ma dag rgyal po dge mchog gi tshe mi rnams kyi ming sprin mgrin
113a1(mdo sde): sprin mgrin zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ste/ gau ta ma dag rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming ta la'i rkang ta la'i rkang zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bor sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing
113a2(mdo sde): shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
113a3(mdo sde): kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ spyi bo las skyes pas spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo drug khri'i nang du bkri ba dang / de thams cad kyi nu ma la 'o ma zag nas re res nga las nu nga las nu zhes smras pas nga las nu nga
113a4(mdo sde): las nu zhes bya bar grags so/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu gang gi tshe rgyal srid byed pa de'i tshe mi rnams sems par byed/ 'jal bar byed/ nye bar rtog par byed de/ de rnams bsams gzhal nye bar brtags nas bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas tha dad
113a5(mdo sde): pa dag byed du 'jug pas des na/ de rnams yid las skyes yid las skyes zhes bya bar grags so/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po drug po 'di dag ni tshe tshad med cing tshe dpag tu med pa yin no/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu'i brla g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam
113a6(mdo sde): zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
113a7(mdo sde): kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes pa mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes
113b1(mdo sde): pa'i brla g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa skyes
113b2(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes nye mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug
113b3(mdo sde): go/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po nye mdzes kyi rkang pa g.yas par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du kyang gnod pa mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs
113b4(mdo sde): bzang ba/ /blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes ldan mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung du
113b5(mdo sde): yang gling gnyis la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin tu mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du kyang gnod pa
113b6(mdo sde): mi skyed do/ /de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yon pa las skyes pas ming nye mdzes ldan nye mdzes ldan zhes bya bar
113b7(mdo sde): gyur to/ /gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung du yang gling gcig la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ /gau ta ma dag de ltar na rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi bu 'od mdzes so/ /'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba'o/ /dge ba'i bu dge
114a1(mdo sde): mchog / dge mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags so/ /gso sbyong 'phags kyi bu nga las nu'o/ /nga las nu'i mdzes pa'o/ /mdzes pa'i nye mdzes pa'o/ /nye mdzes kyi mdzes ldan dang / nye mdzes ldan dang / bzang po dang / legs dang /
114a2(mdo sde): btang ba dang / btang bzung dang / yan lag dang / yan lag shing rta dang / ngan spong dang / skal ldan shing rta dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho'i bu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / sha ku ni dang / sha ku ni chen po dang / ku sha dang / nye ba'i ku sha dang / ku
114a3(mdo sde): sha chen po dang / legs mthong dang / legs mthong chen po dang / rab thob dang / rab thob chen po dang / rab tu sgra bsgrags dang / rab tu sgra bsgrags chen po dang / 'od byed dang / rtul phod pa dang / lhun po ldan dang / lhun po yod dang / 'od zer dang /
114a4(mdo sde): 'od zer ldan dang / 'od zer yod dang / kun nas 'od zer ro/ /gau ta ma dag kun nas 'od zer gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yul gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung ste/ dgra 'dul bar
114a5(mdo sde): byed pas dgra 'dul dgra 'dul zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po dgra 'dul gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri bzhi stong yul dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ngo / /de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ /
114a6(mdo sde): ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byed pas na ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya bar grags so/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri drug stong yul bA ra Na sIr byung ste/ de rnams
114a7(mdo sde): kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po bzod dka'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong kim pi la'i grong khyer du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshangs byin ces bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma
114b1(mdo sde): de dag rgyal po tshangs byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong glang po che'i grong khyer du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po glang pos byin zhes bya ba 'byung ngo / /gau ta ma dang rgyal po glang pos byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang /
114b2(mdo sde): sum cha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga stong yul rdo 'jog tu byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po bal bu can zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po bal bu can gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer brang gis nyal du byung ste/ de rnams
114b3(mdo sde): kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshan po che 'dul zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po tshan po che 'dul gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgyal byin zhes bya ba byung ngo / /
114b4(mdo sde): gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer kan+ya kub dzar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgyal sde zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal sde'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i
114b5(mdo sde): rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer tsam par byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po klu'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po klu'i lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong grong khyer ta la'i phreng du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal
114b6(mdo sde): po mi'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po mi'i lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri nyis stong grong khyer tam lar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha'i bu dang /
114b7(mdo sde): tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri brgyad stong grong khyer ba so'i grong du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po blo gros bzang po'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal
115a1(mdo sde): po nyi khri lnga stong grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mun sel zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po mun sel gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer bA rA Na sIr byung ste/
115a2(mdo sde): de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya
115a3(mdo sde): ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po stong yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ /de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dka' thub spyod ces bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po dka' thub spyod kyi bu dang /
115a4(mdo sde): tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa'i gdong zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i gdong gi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum
115a5(mdo sde): yang grong khyer bA rA Na sIr byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i bdag po'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum yang grong khyer dmag gis mi tshugs par byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal
115a6(mdo sde): pos 'dzin zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal pos 'dzin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong grong khyer mi thi lar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po lha chen po'i
115a7(mdo sde): bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer mi thi lar drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa la spyad de/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba byung ngo / /mu khyud las 'bying ba dang / sra ba'i mu khyud dang / rko ba
115b1(mdo sde): dang / nye bar rko ba dang rko ba yod dang kun nas rko dang / gya nom snang dang / thos pa'i sde dang / chos kyi sde dang / rtogs pa dang / rtogs pa chen po dang / rtogs pa'i sde dang / mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral dang / brtan pa'i sde dang / rga bas sbyar dang / glen bsad
115b2(mdo sde): dang / skya reng dang / phyogs kyi bdag po dang / rdul can dang / bde byed dang / kun dga' dang / me long gdong dang / skyed pa dang / kun nas skyed pa dang / skye bo'i khyu mchog dang / bza' btung can dang / bza' btung mang po can dang / mi thub pa dang / gzhan
115b3(mdo sde): gyis mi thub pa dang / gnas pa dang / shin tu gnas pa dang / stobs chen dang / stobs chen zhon dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / brtan pa zhon dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / gzhu dgu bcu dang / gzhu rgyal dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu
115b4(mdo sde): sra dang / shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu bcu pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / shing rta sra ba'o/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po shing rta sra ba'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bdun khri bdun stong grong khyer
115b5(mdo sde): kun tu snang bar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po kr-i ki zhes bya ba byung ngo / /de'i tshe ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
115b6(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ma 'ongs pa na byang chub par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab nas
115b7(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skyes so/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po kr-i kA'i bu legs skyes so/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po legs skyes kyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams
116a1(mdo sde): kyi tha ma ni rgyal po rna ba can zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po rna ba can la bu gnyis te/ gau ta ma dang / b+ha ra dwa dza'o/ /de gnyis las gau ta ma ni mngon par 'byung bar dga'o/ /b+ha ra dwa dza ni rgyal srid la mngon par dga'o/ /de pha chos dang chos
116a2(mdo sde): ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa mthong nas des bsams pa/ bdag yab 'das nas rgyal por gyur te/ bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas 'dir ci'i dus la bab ce na/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu
116a3(mdo sde): 'byung bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ rgyal po rna ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba btab pa/ yab mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag ni dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ bu gang gi phyir
116a4(mdo sde): mchod sbyin mchod par byed pa dang sbyin sreg sreg par byed pa dang / dka' thub dka' thub spyod pa de dag ni 'di'i ched yin te/ nga 'das na rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs te rgyal po byed par 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung / des smras pa/ yab bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin
116a5(mdo sde): pas rgyal srid bgyid rngo mi thogs so/ /de lta bas na mkhyen par mdzod cig /rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas rgyal pos gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ngo / /de'i tshe bsti gnas zhig na drang srong mdog gnag ces bya ba gnas so/ /de nas gzhon nu gau ta ma rgyal pos
116a6(mdo sde): gnang nas/ dga' zhing mgu la dga' ba rgya chen po dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ drang srong mdog gnag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / spyod lam dul bas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis bdag rab tu phyung
116a7(mdo sde): shig / des de rab tu phyung ngo / /drang srong mdog gnag ni 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chu 'thung bas de yang drang srong gau ta ma drang srong gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rna ba can shi nas gzhon nu b+ha ra dwa dza pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang
116b1(mdo sde): byed du bcug go/ /ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na drang srong gau ta mas mkhan po la smras pa/ mkhan po dgon pa'i gnas na zas kyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thogs kyis grong 'dab tu gnas par bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu rung gis grong ngam/ dgon pa na gnas pa'i drang srong gis
116b2(mdo sde): ni mdor na dbang po bsrung ba yin gyis/ khyod song la gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byos la 'dug shig /mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ drang srong gau ta ma gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byas te gnas so/ /de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzin na
116b3(mdo sde): smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba gnas te/ des de la dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan dag skur ro/ /des gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las/ yang mi gzhan zhig kA ra ShA pa Na lnga brgya
116b4(mdo sde): thogs pa zhig 'ongs nas/ bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog /des bsams pa/ gal te bdag song na kA ShA pa Na lnga brgya yang mi 'thob la khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te/ gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni legs pa ma yin no snyam nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la
116b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ song la pad ma'i rtsa lag la jo mo'i mchid nas re zhig bdag skabs ma mchis te slad kyis mchi'o zhes smros shig /des de'i gan du song nas smras so/ /mi de yang bya ba mang po zhig yin pas de de dang dga' mgur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo / /des bsams
116b6(mdo sde): pa/ nam tshod ring du yod pas de'i sems kyang bsrung bar nus so snyam nas des yang bu mo de la bsgo ba pad ma'i rtsa lag gi gan du song la jo mo'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags na skyed mos tshal gang du mchi zhes smros shig /des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang /
116b7(mdo sde): des smras pa/ khyod kyi skad cig la skabs med/ skad cig la skabs yod ce'am/ bu mo de de dang regs mi 'phrod pa zhig pas/ des smras pa rje'i sras skabs ma mchis pa ni ma lags mod kyi/ de khyod kyi gos dang rgyan dag gis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig
117a1(mdo sde): dga' mgur spyad do/ /de'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur cing gnod sems kyis kun nas dkris pa skyes te/ de mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ bu mo song la bzang mo pad ma'i rtsa lag na re skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog
117a2(mdo sde): shig ces byos shig / des song nas bzang mo la smras nas/ de nas de skyed mos tshal du song ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag gis smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i gos dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa rigs sam/ des smras pa/
117a3(mdo sde): rje'i sras de ni bdag gis nongs te 'on kyang bud med ni rtag tu skyon can lags pas bzod par mdzod cig /de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsad do/ /de nas bu mo mngag gzhug mas jo mo bsad do/ /jo mo bsad do zhes ku co'i sgra chen po bton
117a4(mdo sde): pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po kun gyis thos nas brgyugs pa dang / de ji tsam na bsti gnas de nyid na drang srong gau ta ma gnas so/ /de nas skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag de skrag nas ral gri khrag can drang srong gau ta ma'i mdun du bor nas skye bo'i tshogs de nyid kyi nang du
117a5(mdo sde): zhugs so/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen po des ral gri khrag can mthong nas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo gsad do zhes de nas drang srong gau ta ma de bskor te/ mi bzod pa bskyed nas smras pa/ kwa'e rab tu byung ba drang srong gi rgyal mtshan thogs nas 'di 'dra ba'i las byed dam/ des
117a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ ci byas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bsad do/ /des smras pa/ kho bo'i sdig pa zhi bas las de mi byed do zhes des zhi bas smras kyang skye bo'i tshogs des lag pa phyin ka log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha rab
117a7(mdo sde): tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bkum lags so/ /rgyal po rnams ni mi rtog pa yin pas/ des smras pa/ gal te de ltar gyur na rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs kyis gsal shing la gshon cig /de rab tu byung ba de me tog
117b1(mdo sde): ka ra bI ra'i phreng ba mgul du btags shing skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su bsgrags pa'i sgor bsgrags te/ grong khyer gyi lho phyogs
117b2(mdo sde): kyi sgor phyung nas gson po nyid du gsal shing la gshon no/ /de'i mkhan po mdog gnag de dus dus su de'i bsti gnas su 'gro ba yin pas ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas des phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na de gsal
117b3(mdo sde): shing la gshon pa mthong nas de skad mi gsal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus smras pa/ kyi hud bu 'di ci zhig /des kyang skad mi gsal zhing yi chad la gnad du bab pa'i gnod pa'i tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/
117b4(mdo sde): mkhan po gzhan ci lags las lags mod/ des smras pa/ bu rma phyung ba'am/ gnod pa zhig ma byas grang / mkhan po bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi sems kyis ni ma yin no/ /bu ji ltar shes/ mkhan po bden pa gsol gyis gson cig /bden pa dang /
117b5(mdo sde): bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi sems kyis ma yin na/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa 'di gser gyi kha dog tu gyur cig /bdag nyid chen po de lhag pa'i bsam pa goms pa yin pas tshig
117b6(mdo sde): smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog nag gi pags pa nag po mi snang zhing gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/ /kun tu drang srong mdog nag gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to zhes sgra grags pas de'i ming gser mdog ces bya bar gyur to/ /de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to/ /de nas drang srong gau ta
117b7(mdo sde): mas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni gang / skye ba ni gang / tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig lag lags/ des smras pa/ bu bram ze rnams khye'u med pa la 'gro ba med do zhes zer na khyod kyis bu 'ga' ba skyed pa lta yod dam/ mkhan po yab kyis rgyal srid
118a1(mdo sde): kyi slad du spro ba bskyed pa na bdag gzhon nu nyid du rab tu byung bas bud med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/ bdag gi bu skye ba lta ga la mchis/ bu gal te de lta na sngon yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par gyis shig /mkhan po tshor ba drag pos nyen pas da ni bdag gi
118a2(mdo sde): gnad rnams chad cing tshigs rnams bye ste/ 'gum pa gcig tu dran par bas na ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/ de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pas des rdzu 'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po sprul nas char pa'i thigs pas de'i lus la phog
118a3(mdo sde): pa dang / de nas char pa dang rlung grang mo reg pas sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas/ des sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so/ /gang gi tshe des 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las khu ba'i thigs pa gnyis khrag dang lhan
118a4(mdo sde): cig lhung ngo / /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ni bzhi ste/ bdag sems pa dang / 'jig rten sems pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o/ /khu ba'i thigs pa de
118a5(mdo sde): gnyis sgo nga gnyis su gyur nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang / khye'u gnyis shig byung nas de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bu ram shing gi tshal gseb der de gnyis zhugs so/ /de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha ba byung ste/ nyi ma'i 'od
118a6(mdo sde): zer gyis drang srong gau ta ma gdungs nas shi'o/ /de nas drang srong gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas des gsal shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na/ sgo nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyis shig 'dug nas/ de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing gi tshal gseb tu zhugs
118a7(mdo sde): pa las ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo / /des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / drang srong gau ta ma'i bu yin par gyur nas/ de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/ des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnun gsos te/ de de
118b1(mdo sde): gnyis kyi ming btags pa nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin par byas pa las 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas de bas na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas des na nyi ma'i rigs nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /drang srong gau ta ma'i bu yin pas ming gnyis pa la ni gau ta ma gau ta
118b2(mdo sde): ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rang gi yan lag las skyes pas ming gsum pa yan lag skyes yan lag skyes bya bar gyur to/ /bu ram shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas ming bzhi pa bu ram shing pa bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na dus gzhan
118b3(mdo sde): zhig na rgyal po b+ha ra dwA dza bu med par shi nas/ blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag su zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de'i gcen po gau ta ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste
118b4(mdo sde): rgyal srid 'di ni de'i rigs rgyud du 'ongs pa yin pas de dbang bskur ro/ /de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song ste phyin pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po gau ta ma gang du mchis/ des smras
118b5(mdo sde): pa/ khyed cag kho nas bsad do/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de mthong bar yang mi dran na ji ltar bsad/ kho bos khyed cag dran par bya'o ma nongs so/ /des de rnams dran par byas pa dang / smras pa/ drang srong
118b6(mdo sde): chen po gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod pa de ming tsam smos pa yang bsgrags pa ma yin gyis zhog shig / des sdig pa'i las ci dang ci byas/ 'di dang 'di'o/ /skyon med pa gnod pa mi byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do/ /de ltar
118b7(mdo sde): ci mngon/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na des ma legs kyi/ bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes de rnams de skad du smra bar byed pa na/ khye'u de gnyis kyang drang
119a1(mdo sde): srong gi drung du 'ongs so/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/ des smras pa/ de kho na'i bu'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis ji ltar skyes/ 'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/ des
119a2(mdo sde): byung ba dang bcas par rgyas par smras pa/ blon po rnams kyis de thos te mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/ de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas de gnyis las gzhon nu phu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las de yang bu med par shi'o/ /de
119a3(mdo sde): nas cig shos nu bo dbang bskur nas de'i ming rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma
119a4(mdo sde): ni rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/ skar mda' gdong dang / lag rna dang / glang po che 'dul dang / rkang gdub can no/ /dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de
119a5(mdo sde): lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing mi
119a6(mdo sde): 'dug / lha gal te de lta na nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na/ ci'i slad du lha'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'di dag yod nang la su zhig bu mo ster bar
119a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ lha dgongs shig dang / bdag cag gis btsal lo/ /ji tsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa btsun mo dam par 'tsham pa yod pa de mi rnams kyis brtags te/ rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas/
119b1(mdo sde): de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyal po de la rig par byas pa dang rgyal pos bsgo ba/ khug shig /de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te thog mar gtam byas nas 'dug go/ /gtam gyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal
119b2(mdo sde): mthong nas smras pa/ lha bkra shis par gyur cig /bkra shis par gyur cig /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed ci gsol/ rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched du sras mo slang ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/
119b3(mdo sde): 'thab rir bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par gyur na de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag pa lta na sbyin no/ /lha bka' bzhin 'tshal mchis la lha la snyan du gdas par gsol lo zhes de rnams dong
119b4(mdo sde): nas/ rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shis ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin no/ /lha don 'di la
119b5(mdo sde): nges pa ma mchis te/ re zhig btsun mo blangs la lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang / dgyes pa dang / dgyes dgur spyod pa mdzod cig /de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/ /spyi ma mchis par 'gyur ba sus 'tshal/ rgyal pos
119b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na deng la longs shig /de rnams dong nas bsu ste/ ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur
119b7(mdo sde): spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /de zla ba brgya dam/ dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes
120a1(mdo sde): pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ltar ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal
120a2(mdo sde): srid dga' zhes bgyi'o/ /khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed drag par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos
120a3(mdo sde): nas/ des de la pho nya btang ste/ tshig rtsub po dang chas pa'i spring yig bskur ba/ khyed kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na legs/ gal te de ltar ma byas na khyod kyi mthu dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des
120a4(mdo sde): sdod cig / kho bo 'o nir 'ongs nas yul 'khor phur mar brlag go/ /rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pas des thos nas skrag ste/ blon po rnams bsogs nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces spring na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de rnams
120a5(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid kyis dbang bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no/ /de
120a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po de ni stobs dang bzhon pa rgya che bas gal te 'dir mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar yul phur mar rlog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par dbang bskur la/ gzhon nu de
120a7(mdo sde): rnams ni spyug tu gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyon med cing gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar spyug /lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/ lha la sman par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas skyon ma mchis pa dang / nongs pa ma mchis pa
120b1(mdo sde): yang spyugs la skyon mchis pa dang / nongs pa bgyis pa ni gzhag go/ /rgyal pos btang snyoms su bzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ des na rgyal po
120b2(mdo sde): gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar 'gyur ba zhig bya'o zhes de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs bris par shin tu dri zhim pa'i pog por nye bar bzhag /dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig
120b3(mdo sde): byed du bcug go/ /de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de'i byi dor byed pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo / /blon po rnams skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang gzhon nu rnams kyis dris
120b4(mdo sde): pa/ 'di su'i skyed mos tshal de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i lags so/ /de rnams slar log par brtsams pa dang blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig /ci'i phyir slar ldog /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i skyed mos tshal yin na 'dir
120b5(mdo sde): 'jug tu ga la rung / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ci mchis/ de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so/ /blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha skyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyis lha gzigs
120b6(mdo sde): pa'i dus la bab lags so/ /rgyal po chas pa dang skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra thos so/ /thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra grag na 'di na su zhig 'dug /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu rnams so/ /
120b7(mdo sde): gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so/ /blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bzod par mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams spang bar gsol/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu de rnams spyug par chad pa dang rgyal po'i rkang
121a1(mdo sde): pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo dang lhan cig mchi na de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa de ltar bka' stsal pa'i rigs so/ /rgyal pos bsgo nas/ de rnams chas pa na/ de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi
121a2(mdo sde): mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te zhag bdun du grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so/ /blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgom bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te
121a3(mdo sde): de lta na sgo chod cig / de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang gi sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram na/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas de rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil bu dag byas te/ gnas btab
121a4(mdo sde): nas bsad cing bsad nas 'tsho ba byed cing dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong bar byed do/ /lang tsho dang dar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen te/ sha bri ngan pa skya bo bseng bseng por gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan
121a5(mdo sde): zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ khyed cag ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng por gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen pas so/ /des smras pa/ rang rang gi sring mo spongs la mas dbyen gyi sring
121a6(mdo sde): mo rnams dang lhan cig 'dug shig / drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyir rung ngam/ shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs rgyal srid stor ba rnams kyis rung ngo / /de nas de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no snyam nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga'
121a7(mdo sde): ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ mas dbyen gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do/ /de rnams dang de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na bu pho dang / bu mo dag btsas te de
121b1(mdo sde): rnams chen por gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas drang srong ser skya sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub nas shes ldan dag mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o/ /drang srong chen po ci'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid
121b2(mdo sde): du ma btub pas so/ /drang srong chen po khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig /bdag cag gzhan du mchi na/ 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag cag la phog shig /shes ldan dag rung ngo / /drang srong bdag nyid chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa
121b3(mdo sde): yin pas des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ chu'i rgyun gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so/ /drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gzhi yongs su btang bas ser skya'i gzhi ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de rnams
121b4(mdo sde): der 'phel bar gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen por gyur te/ dogs pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to/ /lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang / de rnams der dong ste grong khyer cig shos brtsigs nas lhas bstan lhas
121b5(mdo sde): bstan ces bya bar gyur to/ /de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag cag spyugs pa ni rigs mnyam pa las chung ma ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis de lta bas na bdag cag las sus kyang rigs
121b6(mdo sde): mnyam pa las chung ma blang bar mi bya ste gcig kho nas chog shes par bya'o/ /de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma len gyi chun ma ni mi len to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran nas blon po rnams la smras pa/
121b7(mdo sde): kye grong pa dag gzhon nu de rnams da ltar gang na 'dug /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lhas nongs pa 'ga' zhig la spyugs pa las de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa na gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas
122a1(mdo sde): dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste rang rang gi sring mo spangs te/ mas dbyen gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyid do/ /de rnams rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/
122a2(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa na bu pho dang / bu mo dag btsas so/ /grong pa dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed phod dam lha rngo thogs lags so/ /de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes pos ro stod bsrangs nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ ched du brjod pas
122a3(mdo sde): ched du brjod pa/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no/ /kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no/ /kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes byas
122a4(mdo sde): pas de rnams shAkya shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de rnams dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro/ /de yang bu med par shi nas skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go/ /de yang bu med
122a5(mdo sde): par shi nas lag rna rgyal por gyur to/ /de yang bu med par shi nas glang po che 'dul rgyal por gyur to/ /de yang bu med par shi nas rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur to/ /de'i bu gnas 'jog go/ /gau ta ma dag gnas 'jog gi bu sa khyim mo/ /gau ta ma dag rgyal
122a6(mdo sde): pos khyim gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu bcu dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / brtan pa'i
122a7(mdo sde): shing rta dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / gzhu dgu bcu pa dang / gzhu rgyal dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu brtan no/ /gau ta ma dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge'i 'gram dang / seng ge'i sgra'o/ /gau ta ma dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi
122b1(mdo sde): nang na seng ge'i 'gram mchog tu grags so/ /gau ta ma dag seng ge'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste/ zas gtsang dang / zas dkar dang / bre bo zas dang / bdud rtsi'i zas so/ /bu mo gtsang ma dang / dkar mo dang / bye mo ma dang / bdud rtsi ma'o/ /zas gtsang
122b2(mdo sde): la bu gnyis te/ /bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o/ /zas dkar la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no/ /bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o/ /bdud rtsi zas
122b3(mdo sde): kyi bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha sbyin no/ /gtsang ma'i bu ni legs par rab sad do/ /dkar mo'i bu ni phreng ba can no/ /bre bo ma'i bu ni bzang len no/ /bdud rtsi ma'i bu ni dge 'phel lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra gcan 'dzin
122b4(mdo sde): yin te/ gau ta ma dag mang pos bkur gyi rgyud/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin du rdzogs/ srid pa'i breng rgyud chad/ 'khor ba zad de da ni yang srid pa med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen
122b5(mdo sde): nas bzhengs te bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu legs so legs so/ /maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras
122b6(mdo sde): pa yang khyod legs so/ /maud gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang / des ni de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
122b7(mdo sde): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam chongs shig /zung shig /lhogs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos
123a1(mdo sde): kyi gtam ni don dang ldan chos dang ldan pa nas tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing bklag pa'i rigs so/ /
123a2(mdo sde): de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po seng
123a3(mdo sde): ge 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu
123a4(mdo sde): ram shing gi phreng dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo
123a5(mdo sde): legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la
123a6(mdo sde): sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yul gyi bzang mo lum bi nI zhes bya ba yod do/ /lhas bstan na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs
123a7(mdo sde): su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad
123b1(mdo sde): 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas de na dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do/ /lum bi nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ /des smras pa/ lha kun dga' ra ba 'di
123b2(mdo sde): bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ da kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis lum bi nI'i
123b3(mdo sde): ched du de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas/ de'i ming lum bi ni'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po seng ge 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los sgyur ba skye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod
123b4(mdo sde): do/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad la yang yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/ /ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur
123b5(mdo sde): spyod pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas pa de'i gzugs bzang
123b6(mdo sde): pos rgyal po legs par rab sad btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ the tsom du gyur nas ci 'di bu mo yin nam/ 'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo/ /de'i btsas pa'i
123b7(mdo sde): btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo
124a1(mdo sde): rnams su gleng ba kha cig gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo kho na lags te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o/ /gzhan dag gi mchid nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi 'o na ci zhe na las sna
124a2(mdo sde): tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas/ de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de la mtshan
124a3(mdo sde): mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/ /yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta
124a4(mdo sde): na sdug pa mdzes pa/ kha dog bzang mo rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /de btsas pa na grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so/ /de'i btsas
124a5(mdo sde): pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul bas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes btags so/ /de yang bskyed
124a6(mdo sde): bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang / de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /rgyal po legs par rab
124a7(mdo sde): sad kyis rgyal po seng ge 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo gnyis shig btsas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dang / sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcig la ni mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni stobs
124b1(mdo sde): kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /cig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis 'di gnyis las
124b2(mdo sde): gang bzhed pa/ gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig /seng ge 'gram gyis slar spring pa/ gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi/ 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas/ gang la skyes bu chen po'i
124b3(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de re zhig 'dod do/ /cig shos kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o/ /des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o/ /
124b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir rgol ba skya bseng zhes bya ba ri khrod pa cig yod nas shAkya rnams 'dus te/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas/ lha skya ba seng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/ shes
124b5(mdo sde): ldan dag kho bo rgas pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so/ /lha gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa gcig bslangs pa'i dam pa de sbyin pa lta na gtang ngo / /de
124b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gzhon nu zas gtsang la bsngo nas des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom/ rab tu bcom ste rmeg btang ngo / /de nas shAkya rnams mgu nas rgyal
124b7(mdo sde): po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg btang lags pas bdag cag glo ba dga' na/ gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsungs shig dbul lo/ /shes ldan dag shAkya rnams kyi khrims su bcas pa sus
125a1(mdo sde): kyang mnyam pa las chun ma gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bcas so/ /lha ci khrims 'dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin tu bsdam gyi dral bar mi bya na/ 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa gcig slong ba ni mnyam pa las chun ma blang ba yin no/ /
125a2(mdo sde): lha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig /de nas seng ge 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas/ kho bos tshogs brtags zin gyis bu mo cig shos kyang bkri shig /des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri ste/ gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyi ga blangs so/ /
125a3(mdo sde): ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas/ ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du bcug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang /
125a4(mdo sde): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing / nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /de dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo
125a5(mdo sde): sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang lhan cig steng gi khang gzhi skyes pa med par dong nas/ rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed do/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs
125a6(mdo sde): par mdzad do/ /rigs la gzigs pa dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / rgyud la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pa ste/ rgya cher mdo snga ma dang sbyar ro/ /mngon par 'byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po
125a7(mdo sde): A tsar+ya d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+hi k+ShA pra re dzu sU tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dge slong la rab tu gces pa'i
125b1(mdo sde): mdo zhes bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po pad ma rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun
125b2(mdo sde): 'khor stong phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs cig go/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'phags pa nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba dbang po dul ba/ thos pa dang ldan pa/ shes rab zab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par
125b3(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la lhag par mos shing mchog tu 'dzin par gnas pa rang gi stan las langs te/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo snying gar sbyar ba byas te/
125b4(mdo sde): 'dzum dmul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'khor ba'i 'dam nas pad ma ltar byung ba'i/ /skyob mdzad ri bo lta bur mi bskyod thub pa'i sku/ /dpe byad rgyan gyis brgyan cing mtshan gyi me tog mdzes/ /blta bas mi ngoms rab mchog
125b5(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis bdag cag 'dir 'dus 'di dag la/ /dge slong 'ba' zhig gnas pas dge slong gi/ /ngo bo dbye dang sgra 'jug ched bya ba/ /bzhi po 'di dag thub pas gsung du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan bde gshegs rab dgyes te/ /
125b6(mdo sde): nye bar 'khor la spyan gzigs 'di skad gsungs/ /legs par nyon cig bu khyod nye bar 'khor/ /ngas ni khyod kyi sems rangs bya phyir dang / /dge slong rnams la phan phyir de bshad do/ /dge slong zhes bya chos kyi rgyal mtshan te/ /dge slong zhes bya rdo rje srog shing
125b7(mdo sde): yin/ /dge slong zhes bya sdug bsngal spangs pa ste/ dge slong zhes bya rgyal ba'i sras po yin/ /dge slong zhes bya nyon mongs srog bcad de/ /dge slong zhes bya thar pa'i tshal 'gro'o/ /dge slong rang gi ngo bo bsdams pa ste/ /rtsa ba bzhi sogs nyis brgya lnga bcu
126a1(mdo sde): pa/ /ched du bya ba rnam dag tshul khrims yin/ /dbye ba ming gi dge slong gang yin dang / /rtags tsam 'dzin dang yang dag dge slong ste/ /sgra 'jug rnam par zad phyir dang / /dge ba slong dang zas slong dang / /zhi bar gnas dang lam zhugs dang / /legs
126a2(mdo sde): par 'tsho dang chags spangs dang / /yid 'ong phyir na dge slong ngo / /dge slong zhes bya brgyan pa ste/ /rgyan spangs rgyan gyis legs par brgyan/ /chags spangs chags pa chen pos spyad/ /byug pa khrus dang bza' ba dang / /rgyan dang gos dang kha dog dang / /
126a3(mdo sde): rta dang glang po khyogs sogs kyi/ /bzhon pa bla med de yang bzhon/ /de dag 'byor pa dge slong ste/ /de dag mi 'byor dge slong min/ /de nas nye bar 'khor de yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/ /ci de bde bar gshegs pa yis/ /skad byings rtogs par
126a4(mdo sde): dka' ba gsungs/ /de nyid bde bar gshegs pa yis/ /tshig gi mun pa tshig gi ni/ /mar mes gsal bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gser la sogs pa 'jig rten rgyan/ /rab tu spangs pas snying rje yi/ /rgyan gyi mchog
126a5(mdo sde): gis brgyan par bya/ /'jig rten ma yin bslab pa yi/ /gos gyon gos mchog bzang po yin/ /ga pur la sogs ma yin pa'i/ /tshul khrims byug pa mchog gis byug /dkar dmar la sogs ma yin pa'i/ /dad pa'i kha dog rnam par mdzes/ /'jig

126a7(mdo sde): ni yang dag dge slong yin/ /gtso bo gsum dang 'khor lngar ldan/ /drang srong snod bcas 'khar gsil ldan/ /lus ngag yid gsum rnam par bsdams/ /rang gi spyod pa brtul zhugs bstan/ /de yang yang dag dge slong yin/ /de gnyis thar pa'i grong khyer

127a1(mdo sde): phyi mar skye ba ste/ /tshul khrims phyi nas de ltar min/ /de bas nye bar 'khor sogs kyis/ /'di nyid la ni brtan par zung / /de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te/ nye bar 'khor la sogs pa dge slong de de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
