193b6(mdo sde): rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes so/ /mi slob pa'i
193b7(mdo sde): chos bcu po de dag skyes shing thob ste ldan na 'phags pa yan lag lnga spangs pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa bsrung ba gcig pa/ rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ so so'i bden pa bsal ba/ bsal ba spangs pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med par rnyed do// //
194a1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ad b+hu ha d+ha rma pa r+yA ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
194a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
194a3(mdo sde): bo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar chags su bsod snyoms spyod pa'i tshe phyogs shig na khang pa brtsegs pa sgo brgyad cu yod la/ byug pas byugs pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba dar gyi lda ldi mang po dpyangs pa zhig mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu'am
194a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu byas te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i
194a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu tsam byas la/ khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de gnyis las bsod nams shin tu che ba gang yin snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du
194a6(mdo sde): sems te/ ston pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis don 'di nyid gsol te/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gzung bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
194a7(mdo sde): dga' bo rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms blangs te/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas bsod snyoms kyi zas phyi ma spangs te/ chos gos dang lhung bzed bzhag nas rkang pa bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
194b1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag 'dir snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi slad du zhugs te/
194b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar chags su bsod snyoms spyod pa'i tshe phyogs shig na khang pa brtsegs pa chab sgo brgyad cu mchis la byug pas byugs pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba/ gyi lda ldi mang po dpyangs pa dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ rigs
194b3(mdo sde): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu bgyis te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru
194b4(mdo sde): ra'i 'bras bu tsam bgyis la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs bgyis la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel stsal na de gnyis bsod nams shin tu che ba gang lags snyam mo/ /bdag gis yang 'di
194b5(mdo sde): snyam du bsams te/ ston pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis don 'di nyid gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gzung bar bgyi snyam nas/ bcom
194b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la bdag don 'di nyid zhu lags na thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la don 'di nyid legs par bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun
194b7(mdo sde): dga' bo khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs nas lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid 'dri bar sems pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /kun
195a1(mdo sde): dga' bo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu gling gi gling ni chur dpag tshad bdun stong / rgyar yang dpag tshad bdun stong / byang du ni kha tshon che ba/ lhor ni sog kar 'dug pa de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
195a2(mdo sde): mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas
195a3(mdo sde): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par na nga / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam
195a4(mdo sde): gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta zhog gi/ /kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling yod de chur ni dpag tshad brgyad stong / rgyar yang dpag tshad
195a5(mdo sde): brgyad stong ste/ kun nas zla gam lta bur grub pa de/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom
195a6(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu
195a7(mdo sde): tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta
195b1(mdo sde): 'ang zhog / shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta 'ang zhog ste/ kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling yod de chur ni dpag tshad dgu stong / zheng yang dpag tshad dgu stong ste/ kun nas zla ba nya ba lta bur grub pa de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna
195b2(mdo sde): bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin
195b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs
195b4(mdo sde): byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta'ang zhog /shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta'ang zhog /nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling lta'ang zhog ste/ kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan ces bya
195b5(mdo sde): ba'i gling yod de/ chur ni dpag tshad khri/ rgyar yang dpag tshad khri ste/ kun nas gru bzhi lham par grub pa de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba
195b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
195b7(mdo sde): mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /
196a1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta'ang zhog /shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta'ang zhog /nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling lta'ang zhog /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta'ang zhog ste/ kun dga' bo lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba yod de/ de
196a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs
196a3(mdo sde): bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug
196a4(mdo sde): gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta yang zhog /shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta yang zhog /nub
196a5(mdo sde): kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling lta yang zhog / byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta yang zhog /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba lta yang zhog ste/ kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de rigs kyi bu'am
196a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i
196a7(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma
196b1(mdo sde): tsam gyi gdugs byas nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis dpag tu med pa/ tshul khrims kyis
196b2(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa/ bzod pas dpag tu med pa/ brtson 'grus kyis dpag tu med pa/ bsam gtan gyis dpag tu med pa/ shes rab kyis dpag tu med pa/ byams pas dpag tu med pa/ snying rjes dpag tu med pa/ dga' bas dpag tu med pa/ btang snyoms
196b3(mdo sde): kyis dpag tu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma 'dres pa gsum dang snying rje chen pos dpag tu med pa ste/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
196b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo
196b5(mdo sde): mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya bar zung shig /de
196b6(mdo sde): bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba'i tshig so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
196b7(mdo sde): bstod do/ / //'phags pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
197a1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga ta pra ti bim+ba pra tiSh+Tha a nu shaMs sam+ba dan+ti nA ma d+harma par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
197a2(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig rim gro'i gnas su lhags te 'dug nas bar skabs der gtam 'di lta bu zhig glengs
197a3(mdo sde): so/ /khyed cag la bram ze'am/ khyim bdag dad pa can thos pa na nga / 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ dge ba ji ltar bya zhes tshol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid par spro ba skyed pa dag snang la de dag gal te bdag cag gi drung du lhags nas btsun pa
197a4(mdo sde): dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par bgyi zhes rmed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa la phan yon ji tsam zhig yod pa bdag cag gis mi shes te/ de'i tshe de dag la
197a5(mdo sde): bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang 'thun par lan gdab par bya/ gang don 'di dag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ the tshom thams cad
197a6(mdo sde): gcod par mdzad pa/ ston pa de la bdag cag gis zhu'o/ /'on ta nga bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag la lung ston par mdzad de/ bdag cag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la rgya cher phye ste lan gdab par bya'o zhes
197a7(mdo sde): bgros so/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
197b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag rim gro'i gnas der lhags te 'dus pa dang / bar der bka' mchid 'di lta bu zhig glengs te/ khyed cag la bram ze'am/ khyim bdag dad pa can thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/
197b2(mdo sde): dge ba ji ltar bgyi zhes tshol ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi bar spro ba skyes pa dag gda' la/ de dag gal te bdag cag gi drung du mchis nas/ btsun pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig
197b3(mdo sde): mchis par rig par bgyi zhes rmed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis pa bdag cag gis ma 'tshal na/ de'i tshe de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang 'thun par lan gdab par bgyi/ gang don de dag
197b4(mdo sde): nyid ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ ston pa de la bdag cag gis zhu bar bgyi'o/ /'on tang bcom ldan
197b5(mdo sde): 'das de bdag cag la lung ston par mdzad de/ bdag cag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la rgya cher phye ste lan gdab par bgyi'o snyam bgyid do/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das don de dag nyid bdag cag zhu zhing mchis na/
197b6(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang snying brtse ba dang
197b7(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhus te/ khyed gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de nyid zhu bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig
198a1(mdo sde): dang bstan par bya'o/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon 'di lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ gzhal med khang chen por gnas pa dang / bong sted bzang por grags pa dang / spro ba mang ba dang / tshe
198a2(mdo sde): ring ba dang / grags pa dang ldan pa dang / bde ba mang ba ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon dang po yin no/ /gzhan yang phyug po dang / nor mang ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / nor rdzas dang / yo
198a3(mdo sde): byad mang ba dang / bdag dbang ba bdag gir bya ba mang ba dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / /gser dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs mang ba dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / lug dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba
198a4(mdo sde): mang ba dang / blon po dang / mdza' bshes dang / gnyen dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams mang por 'gyur te/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon gnyis pa yin no/ /dge slong dag gzhan yang gzugs bzang
198a5(mdo sde): po dang / blta na sdug pa dang / mdzes pa dang / mdog gser ltar bzang ba dang / mgo gdugs ltar zlum pa dang / lag pa ring ba dang / dpral ba dbyes che ba dang / smin mtshams bar ma chad pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang rgyan thams
198a6(mdo sde): cad kyis brgyan par 'gyur te/ dge slong dag 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon gsum pa yin no/ /dge slong dag gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor bzang po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa dang /
198a7(mdo sde): bu stong gis bskor bar 'gyur te/ de'i bu'am/ chung ma'am/ bran nam/ nye bar 'tsho ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad de la gus par nyan pa dang / bka' nyan par byed de/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa
198b1(mdo sde): po'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no/ /dge slong dag gzhan yang de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ der skyes nas lha'i rgyal po khyad par can lha dang / lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo rnams kyi rten du 'gyur la/ gnas bcu po lha'i
198b2(mdo sde): tshe dang / lha'i mdog dang / lha'i stobs dang / lha'i bde ba dang / lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed pa dang / lha'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyis dga' bar byed de/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang
198b3(mdo sde): zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon lnga pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge ba slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan
198b4(mdo sde): yon yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha rmA ka ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa// //
198b5(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsai t+ya pra dak+Shi Na gA thA/ bod skad du/ mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab blo ldan 'jig rten na/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba/ /shes rab chen po shA ri'i bus/ /
198b6(mdo sde): ston pa la ni zhu ba zhus/ /mchod rten bskor ba bgyis pa yis/ /rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur ba/ /skal ba chen po'i 'jig rten mchog /rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsungs/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /ston pas de la bka' stsal
198b7(mdo sde): pa/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pa yi/ /yon tan gang yin phyogs tsam bstan/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pa yis/ /lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang / /lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci/ /lto 'phye che rnams mchod byed 'gyur/ /dal ba rnyed dka' thob gyur nas/ /
199a1(mdo sde): skad cig gcig tsam bar du yang / /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mi khom brgyad rnams spong bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing mdzangs pa dang / /thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur/ /
199a2(mdo sde): mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyis/ /tshe ring ba yang de yis 'thob/ /grags pa chen po'ang 'thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'dzam bu'i gling du rus kyi mchog /cho rigs yongs su dag par yang / /blo ldan
199a3(mdo sde): de ni skye bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /kha bzhin dag kyang bzang ba dang / /mdog sdug pa dang mkhas pa dang / /bde bar gnas pa thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /phyug cing nor yang mang ba dang / /ser sna med
199a4(mdo sde): cing gtong phod dang / /sbyin pa dag la dga' bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug /mdog bzang mthong na dga' ba dang / /longs spyod rgya chen spyod par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'du
199a5(mdo sde): byed stong par mthong nas kyang / /de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur/ /myur du dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /rgyal rigs mchog tu skye bar 'gyur/ /bu smad 'khor dang ldan pa dang / /stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan par 'gyur/ /
199a6(mdo sde): mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bram ze che zhing mtho bar skye/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing thos dang ldan/ /rig byed gsang sngags ldan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho bar skye/ /phyug cing nor yang mang ba dang / /nor
199a7(mdo sde): dang 'bru rnams ldan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi mnga' bdag rje/ /sa steng mtha' dag dbang byed pa'i/ /chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /rin chen bdun dang ldan pa yi/ /
199b1(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /chos bzhin 'khor lo skor bar byed/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'di nas 'phos nas mtho ris 'gro/ /sangs rgyas bstan la dga' ba dang / /rnal 'byor ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas
199b2(mdo sde): pas ni/ /lha yul dag nas 'phos nas kyang / /de ni mi yi nang du skye/ /rmongs pa med par mngal du 'jug /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mngal gyi skyon gyi dri ma yis/ /de la gos par mi 'gyur te/ /de ni nor bu dag pa bzhin/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas
199b3(mdo sde): pas ni/ /ma ltor bde bar gnas par 'gyur/ /de ni bde bar btsa' ba dang / /bde bar nu zho 'thung bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /phas kyang g.yog 'khor mang po yis/ /de la gso zhing gnas par 'gyur/ /ma mas rtag tu rim gro byed/ /
199b4(mdo sde): mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /nye du rnams kyi snying du sdug /de bzhin pha ma lhag par byams/ /skyes nas longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /sha za dang ni srin rnams kyis/ /de la gnod par mi 'gyur te/ /longs spyod
199b5(mdo sde): dag la skyon med spyod/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang de dag rnams/ /zhar ba grum por yong mi 'gyur/ /lus kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mig kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /dkyus
199b6(mdo sde): ring mthon mthing sdug pa dang / /lha yi mig kyang de yis 'thob/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /lus bde sems kyang brtan pa dang / /de bzhin brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / /dpung mgo zlum zhing brtan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /
199b7(mdo sde): stobs dang byad gzugs phun sum tshogs/ /yan lag thams cad mtshan rnams kyis/ /legs par brgyan cing ldan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug rje/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i brgya byin du/ /lha yi
200a1(mdo sde): dbang po chen por 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'thab bral lha yi rgyal po dang / /de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan dang / /'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor byas pas ni/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa
200a2(mdo sde): yi/ /dbang phyug nyid du de 'gyur zhing / /lha rnams bye ba snyed kyis mchod/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bskal pa bye ba stong dag dang / /khrag khrig phrag brgya dag tu yang / /shes rab ldan pa rtag tu mchod/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /bskal pa bye
200a3(mdo sde): ba stong dag tu/ /lus gtsang gos kyang gtsang ba dang / /dkar po'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs/ /de ni le lo med pa dang / /shin tu bsgrub pa thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor
200a4(mdo sde): ba byas pas ni/ /brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu yang brtan/ /rtsal brtan cis kyang mi tshugs shing / /don rnams myur du 'grub par byed/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /gdangs snyan gsang yang mtho ba dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro can/ /gnod pa med cing
200a5(mdo sde): nad med 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /nga nyid kyis ni bstan pa yi/ /gnas der myur du de 'gro zhing / /shas cher skye ba thob par 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ /sems kyi tshad med bzhi po dang / /
200a6(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i dbang yang 'thob/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dang / /dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang / /byang chub yan lag 'bras bu 'thob/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /mngon shes drug ldan zag pa
200a7(mdo sde): med/ /nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yi/ /dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'dod chags zhe sdang spangs pa dang / /'khor rnams thams cad spangs pa yi/ /rang rgyal byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /mchod
200b1(mdo sde): rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ /'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs/ /mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang / /gser gyi sku mdog 'thob par 'gyur/ /lus kyi las kyang bskor ba yin/ /ngag gi las kyang bskor ba yin/ /yid kyi las kyang bskor ba yin/ /smon
200b2(mdo sde): lam btab pa'ang bskor ba yin/ /'dir ni bskor ba byas pa yis/ /bgrod dka' bde dgur don rnams 'grub/ /'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la/ /bskor ba byas pa'i yon tan gang / /de ni tshig tsam nyi tshe yis/ /legs par bstan par mi nus so/ /sems
200b3(mdo sde): can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /sha ri'i bus ni zhus nas kyang / /mchod rten phyag byas yon tan gang / /'jig rten mgon pos bstan pa yin/ /rta brgya dang ni gser srang brgya/ /drel mo'i shing rta brgya dag dang / /rgod ma brgya yi shing rta rnams/ /rin chen sna
200b4(mdo sde): tshogs bkang ba yang / /bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /kam po dza yi bu mo brgya/ /nor bu rna cha gdub 'khor thogs/ /gser gyi dpung rgyan 'chang ba dang / /mgrin pa gser gyis legs brgyan pa/ /bskor ba'i gom pa gcig
200b5(mdo sde): bor ba'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /gangs kyi glang chen brgya snyed dag /lus chen nam tshong yangs pa dang / /sna yang gshol mda' 'dra ba'i glang / /gser dang nor bus brgyan pa yang / /bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /
200b6(mdo sde): mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa gcig bor ba/ /'dzam bu'i chu klung gser srang 'bum grangs snyed/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis
200b7(mdo sde): 'jim gong gcig bor ba/ /'dzam bu'i chu klung gser gyi pho brang 'bum/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog sil ma spungs/ /'dzam bu'i chu klung gser snod 'bum bzhag pa/ /
201a1(mdo sde): de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba thogs/ /'dzam bu'i chu klung gser khal bye ba gnyis/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas
201a2(mdo sde): mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis spos chus dbang bskur ba/ /'dzam bu'i chu klung gser gyi phung po 'bum/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis mar me 'bul byed pa/ /'dzam bu'i
201a3(mdo sde): chu klung gser srang bye ba 'bum/ /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs thogs/ /gser gyi ri bo lhun po tshad 'bum yang / /de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma
201a4(mdo sde): yin/ /'di ni dpag med de bzhin gshegs/ /rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ded dpon bla na med pa la/ /phul ba'i phan yon bstan pa yin/ /bzhugs pa'i tshe na gang gis mchod/ /mya ngan 'das 'og gang gis mchod/ /sems dge ba ni mtshungs
201a5(mdo sde): 'gyur na/ /bsod nams la ni khyad par med/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi khyab la dad rnams kyis/ /rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //
201a6(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pra se na dzi ta gA thA/ bod skad du/ gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po gsal rgyal gdugs dang cod pan dang / /rnga yab ral gri nor bu lham bzhag ste/ /thal mo sbyar te legs
201a7(mdo sde): par phyag 'tshal nas/ /'jig rten mgon po la ni zhu ba zhus/ /phan par dgongs pa thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams mya ngan 'das pa na/ /mchod pa bgyis pas blo mchog ji lta bur/ /srid pa gzhan du mi rnams bde ba 'thob/ /bcom ldan
201b1(mdo sde): mi yi seng ge snga phyi'i mtha'i/ /chos rnams kun la mngon sum spyad gyur pas/ /kun dga' bzang po yi ni mngon sum du/ /gsal rgyal zhus lan 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ /ji ltar rgyal ba dag la mi rnams kyis/ /mchod pa byas pas srid pa gzhan dag tu/ /rnam smin 'dod
201b2(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs ci thob pa/ /zhus pa'i don de rgyal pos mnyan par gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten rnams dang ni/ /sku gzugs rnams la rdul phran ci song ba/ /de yi grangs snyed de byed mi rnams kyis/ /lha yul sa stengs nges par rgyal srid 'thob/ /gzugs dang
201b3(mdo sde): gzugs med khams kyi ting nge 'dzin/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i sa mchog kun myong nas/ /tha mar skye dang rgal sogs pa yi/ /sdug bsngal med pa'i sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob/ /su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs byed pa/ /de dag gzugs bzang yid 'ong yon
201b4(mdo sde): tan ldan/ /dbang po bsdams shing 'od 'bar nyi ma bzhin/ /'jig rten dag na mig tu sdug par 'gyur/ /su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa/ /de yi lus ni dri ma med pa dang / /pad ma'i snying po lta bur 'jam zhing yangs/ /nad dang mya ngan sdug bsngal 'jigs
201b5(mdo sde): las thar/ /su zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs byed pa/ /bran du mi skye mngag gzhug skye mi 'gyur/ /dbul bor mi 'gyur rigs dman mi 'gyur zhing / /dbang po rnams kyang nyams par yang mi 'gyur/ /thub dbang mchod rten byed pa'i mi rnams ni/ /mya ngan yongs
201b6(mdo sde): med lus kun brtan pa dang / /longs spyod mchog ldan rin chen mdzod mang ldan/ /dgra yi tshogs rnams kyang ni thub par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten srog shing phul ba yis/ /chos dang rjes 'thun chos la sgrub pa dang / /tshul khrims thos dang bzod pa'i mchog dang ldan/ /
201b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten dag na don kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchod rten mchog la gdugs brtsegs phul ba yis/ /lha dang mi yi nang na skye ba dang / /sred med bu yi lus 'dra lus kun brtan/ /bkur sti bya ba'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur/ /thub dbang mchod rten rdo thal byugs pa yis/ /lha
202a1(mdo sde): mi'i 'jig rten dag na tshe ring zhing / /lus sems nad dang mya ngan byed spangs te/ /rtag tu skyid cing nor gyis phyug par 'gyur/ /gser dngul spa ba'i glegs mos g.yogs pa yi/ /thub pa'i dbang po'i mchod rten byas pa yis/ /mi rnams srid pa'i khyad par gzhan
202a2(mdo sde): dag tu/ /lus mkhregs 'od kyang 'bar zhing mdzes par 'gyur/ /su dag la la mchod rten sku gzugs la/ /dad pa'i sems kyis bla re 'bul byed pa/ /de dag sa steng rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa/ /ma lus gnod med rgyal gcig dbang byed 'gyur/ /bde gshegs
202a3(mdo sde): mchod rten dag la dga' bzhin du/ /rnam mang rgya chen gdugs ni btags pa yis/ /lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na gdugs 'dra bar/ /lha dang mi yi dbang po lta bur 'gyur/ /mi rnams su dag sku gdung snying po can/ /dri med bsod nams 'byung gnas gyur pa la/ /ba dan
202a4(mdo sde): mdzes pa sna tshogs 'dogs pa dag / mthu dang ldan zhing srid gsum mchod gnas 'gyur/ /bde gshegs mchod rten cod pan btags pa yis/ /mi dbang dpal dang lha dbang dpal thob cing / /bde ba'i mchog kyang nyams su myong gyur nas/ /rnam par grol ba'i cod
202a5(mdo sde): pan khyad par 'thob/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la dril phul bas/ /tshig btsan grags pa chen po dag dang ldan/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong skye ba dran/ /de dag gis ni rgyan rnams sna tshogs 'thob/ /mkhas pa su dag bde gshegs mchod rten la/ /dad
202a6(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis phreng ba 'dogs byed pa/ /gser phreng rin chen mang pos legs spras pa/ /bsod nams las ldan de yi mgo la thogs/ /ston pa'i mchod rten dag la rgyan 'phyang 'dogs/ /de dag do shal rgyan phreng nor bu dang / /gdu bu dag dang dpung rgyan mchog
202a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ /lus brgyan 'jig rten dag na rgyu bar 'gyur/ /su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /sa dang lci bas nyug pa de dag ni/ /lha dang mir skye lus mdog sdug pa dang / /rnam dag rma med bde dang ldan par 'gyur/ /thub dbang mchod rten byi dor byas pa yis/ /
202b1(mdo sde): shin tu blta na sdug cing mig tu mdzes/ /byad bzhin bzang zhing pad mo'i mdog dang ldan/ /srid pa'i skyon rnams dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur/ /su dag spos mchog sbyar ba'i 'bru mar gyis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten nyug byed pa/ /de dag spos kyis mchod cing tsan dan
202b2(mdo sde): gyis/ /lus byugs nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag thub dbang mchod rten la/ /spos chu gtsang zhing dang bas khrus gsol ba/ /de dag lus la dri ma med pa dang / /gdung ba med cing mdog 'jam mya ngan med/ /su zhig sangs rgyas mchod rten sku gzugs khang / /
202b3(mdo sde): tshon rtsi sna tshogs dag gis mdzes byed pa/ /de ni bde gshegs mnga' ba'i yon tan rnams/ /sna tshogs ldan pa kun gyis brtsegs par 'gyur/ /su dag dpyid ka'i dus su gtsang ma'i chus/ /mchod rten nye 'khor rdul rnams zhi byed pa/ /de la bud med rnams ni dga' bzhin du/ /
202b4(mdo sde): rdul yab gser gyi yu ba can gyis g.yob/ /dkon mchog gsum phyir mi rnams gang dag gis/ /'phags pa dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pas ni/ /rkang lag sor mo dra bar 'brel ba dang / /yan lag thams cad kyang ni skyon med 'gyur/ /su dag dkon mchog gsum
202b5(mdo sde): la me tog dang / /'bras bu gsar thog byung ba 'bul byed pa/ /de dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /ro mchog kun thob mi rdzi stobs dang ldan/ /phreng ba me tog rgya chen char rnams kyis/ /su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs la mchod/ /de dag lha dang mi yi 'jig rten du/ /
202b6(mdo sde): cha byad yid 'ong sna tshogs legs par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la dri zhim phul/ /bdug spos rgya chen mang po ldan sbyar dang / /a ga ru yi bdug spos phul ba yis/ /de yi lus kun spos ngad ldan par 'gyur/ /su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /dga' bzhin rnga
202b7(mdo sde): yab rnams ni 'bul byed pa/ /thugs dga' rgyal rnams snying rje rnga yab thogs/ /che ba de la cher yang g.yob par byed/ /shin tu dri med zla ba nya 'dra ba'i/ /me long sdu gu thams cad mkhyen la 'bul/ /de dag tshe rabs brgyud pa rnams su yang / /lha mi rnams kyis blta bar 'os par
203a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ /mchod pa'i khyad par ci yod ci 'byor pa/ /'tsham par 'bul byed de dag dri med cing / /mya ngan med pa'i bla med byang chub 'thob/ /mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs dag la mgos btud
203a2(mdo sde): gus phyag 'tshal/ /de dag lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyis/ /cher yang che bar bkur ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /su zhig dad pas thub pa'i mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs dag la skor ba byed pa de/ /phyi ma'i tshe la dgra chen rnams kyis btud/ /bzang po'i snod 'gyur yon tan
203a3(mdo sde): rnams dang ldan/ /mi rnams su dag dga' bzhin gus pa yis/ /bla med mchod rten rnams dang sku gzugs la/ /lus kyi las rnams byed pa de dag ni/ /srid pa kun tu mdzod rnams shin tu rgyas/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten rol mo'i sgra phul bas/ /zab cing rigs pa'i spobs pa phun
203a4(mdo sde): sum tshogs/ /yan lag lnga rdzogs yid 'ong tshig dang ldan/ /sgra skad dag gis 'jig rten 'gengs par byed/ /su dag rgyal ba'i gdung ldan stod byed pa/ /de dag gling bu'i sgra dang glu snyan dang / /sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba thob pa dang / /so so yang dag rig pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /mi
203a5(mdo sde): rnams gang dag rtswa shing so phag gis/ /'jig rten bla ma'i spyi gab rig pas byed/ /yang na gzhan dag byed du 'jug kyang rung / /de dag 'gro ba rnams kyi skyabs 'drar 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag rgyal ba'i gtsang khang byed/ /de dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /lha dbang gnas
203a6(mdo sde): 'dra'i khang khyim 'od 'bar ba/ /dus tshigs kun tu bde ldan thob par 'gyur/ /mtho ris las bzang 'bras bu'i gnas rnams su/ /bskal par dga' byed rtag tu dga' bzhin du/ /rtsen par byed cing mya ngan med pa dang / /tha mar zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /gang dag
203a7(mdo sde): 'ja' khugs 'dra ba'i rta babs mdzes/ /thub pa'i chab sgor sbreng byed de dag ni/ /srid pa gzhan du khang khyim sgo dang bcas/ /rnam par brgyan pa rnams ni thob par 'gyur/ /mi rnams gang dag ston pa'i sku gdung khang / /bsrung phyir dad pas 'obs dang sgo 'dzugs
203b1(mdo sde): pa/ /de dag tshe rabs gzhan du dgra rnams kyis/ /dpal yon rnams dang dbral bar yong mi nus/ /mi rnams su dag mchod rten rnying pa rnams/ /gzhan gyi ngor byed ma yin rang gi blos/ /ral tshems byed pa'i skye bo de dag ni/ /lus bzang yon tan dam pas brgyan par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i
203b2(mdo sde): mchod rten me tog rnying bsal bas/ /'dod chags chags med zhe sdang sdang mi 'gyur/ /gti mug rmongs med lta ngan chags mi 'gyur/ /mi rnams rab tu dga' zhing skyid par 'gyur/ /su dag glang chen dril spyangs spa bar brgyan/ /dul ba'i rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rta dag /ston pa dang ni
203b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i tshogs la 'bul/ /de dag bla med theg chen thob par 'gyur/ /skye bo su dag 'jig rten mgon po la/ /rin chen 'bar ba yid dang 'thad pa rnams/ /'bul ba de dag rin chen bdun po dang / /byang chub yan lag rin chen dri med 'thob/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten la
203b4(mdo sde): ni gos phul bas/ /bsod nams byams pa'i ngo tsha'i gos gyon te/ /dga' zhing yon tan kun ldan ser sna med/ /mdog kyang 'jam zhing kha dog gser 'drar 'gyur/ /dpe med mchod rten mar me phul ba yis/ /ud pal sngon po kha bye 'dab 'dra'i mig /gsal zhing sdug la
203b5(mdo sde): mig gi dkyus ring mdzes/ /dri ma med pa'i lha yi mig dang ldan/ /su dag mchod rten mar me dang rab 'bul/ /de dag mig tu sdug cing mdzod rab rgyas/ /mig gi dkyus ring mthon ka'i mdog dang ldan/ /skyes pa bud med dag gis blta bar 'os/ /mtshan mo thub chen spyan sngar
203b6(mdo sde): thal sbyar 'khod/ /'byor dang mtshan ma mar me'i sdong bu 'bu 'bul/ /de dag srid pa gzhan du 'bras bur ldan/ /rin chen rags pa'i 'od ldan lus kyang 'thob/ /rgyal la phul ba'i mar me 'chi ba na/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis 'dir ni dga' bzhin du/ /snying po skul bar byed
203b7(mdo sde): pa de dag ni/ /spyan lnga dag kyang nges par 'thob par 'gyur/ //mi rnams gang dag dge ba'i sems ldan pas/ /rgyal ba'i mchod rten gzhan gyis byas pa la/ /rjes su yi rangs don de ma byas kyang / /mdor na de dag gis kyang byas par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims ldan pa phyogs
204a1(mdo sde): nas lhags pa la/ /su dag dga' bzhin mal stan sbyin byed pa'i/ /mi rnams 'gro ba dag tu 'khor ba na/ /gser gyi khri dang stan gyi mchog rnams 'thob/ /su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi/ /kha zas bzang po dge 'dun sbyin byed pa/ /de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par
204a2(mdo sde): gnas pa na/ /kha zas kha dog ro la sogs ldan 'thob/ /su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi/ /btung ba rgya chen dge 'dun sbyin byed pa/ /de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par gnas pa na/ /btung ba kha dog ro la sogs pa 'thob/ /su dag 'jig rten bla mas gsungs pa yi/ /dam chos tshul bzang
204a3(mdo sde): thos nas nyams su len/ /de dag nyon mongs chu rlabs rab 'jigs pa'i/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho myur du rgal bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po dge ba'i las 'di thams cad ni/ /'khor ba'i bde ba sna tshogs smin gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub dam pa yi/ /'bras bu bde blag kho nar thob par 'gyur/ /de nas
204a4(mdo sde): rgyal po dga' mdangs ldan pa yis/ /drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas kyang / /thub dbang zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ /rgyal po rgyal byed tshal nas byung bar gyur/ /gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ e ka gA thA/ /bod skad du/
204a5(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dra'i dge sbyong chen po gzhan dag lha yul sa la med/ /'jig rten 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin rnam thos bu yi gnas na'ang yod ma yin/ /lha yi pho brang gnas mchog dag na'ang yod min phyogs
204a6(mdo sde): dang phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med/ /ri dang nags su bcas pa'i sa steng rgyas pa kun tu yul zhig ga la yod/ /tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsa tur gA thA/ /bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
204a7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /skur gyur pa ni thams cad la/ /mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis mnga' ba/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa'i/ /rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs sangs gang du bltams pa dang / /gang du byang chub la reg dang / /zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /zag med
204b1(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das pa dang / /bde gshegs gang du bzhugs pa dang / /'chag pa dang ni bzhengs pa dang / /seng ge lta bur gzims pa yi/ /gnas de la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /steng dang 'og dang bar dag dang / /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang / /sku bcas sku ni med pa
204b2(mdo sde): yi/ /mchod rten la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rkang gnyis dam pa shar dang ni/ /byang gi phyogs char bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal ba bsten dka' zhes bya ba/ /des ni tshigs bcad 'di gsungs so/ /gang gis tshigs bcad 'di bzhi yis/ /de bzhin gshegs la stod byed pa/ /de ni tshe
204b3(mdo sde): rabs stong du yang / /ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ nA ga rA dza b+he rI gA thA/ /bod skad du/ klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
204b4(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab bstan pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyes pa'i rabs/ /thams cad legs par 'dus nas su/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis nyon/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha yi lha/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/ /
204b5(mdo sde): dge slong rnams ni gcig la gcig /kha stobs la sogs rnams kyis 'gying / /dge slong tshig ngan 'don pa da ga /drang srong chen pos gsan pa na/ /de phyir thub pas dge 'dun rnams/ /bsdus nas 'di skad bka' stsal te/ /khyed cag kha stobs la sogs pas/ /
204b6(mdo sde): gcig la gcig ni 'tshe byed pa/ /khyim nas khyim med rab byung dang / /de dag 'thun pa ma yin no/ /rtag tu yang dag dga' byed pa'i/ /chos drug gang yin la 'jug pa/ /'di ni khyim nas khyim med par/ /rab tu byung ba rnams dang 'thun/ /sems
204b7(mdo sde): can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /'tshe ba med par ngas bsgoms nas/ /ji ltar byang chub don gnyer ba/ /dge slong nga las 'di nyon cig /shes rab ldan pa'i mi yis 'di/ /thos nas sdig pa rnam spongs la/ /grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir/ /dge ba'i chos la spyad par gyis/ /sngon gyi
205a1(mdo sde): spun drung gyur pa yi/ /klu yi rgyal po gnyis byung ba/ /gcig gi ming ni rnga zhes bya/ /gnyis pa nye rnga zhes bya'o/ /gnyis ka srog gcod las ldog cing / /tshul khrims ldan zhing dbang chen grags/ /klu yi skye gnas la smod cing / /mi yi srid pa 'dod par
205a2(mdo sde): gyur/ /tshul ldan mang du thos pa yi/ /dge sbyong bram ze mthong ba dang / /mi yi tshul du bsgyur nas ni/ /bsnyen bkur dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed dang tshes brgyad dang / /bcu bzhi bco lnga gang yin pa/ /de la yan lag brgyad pa yi/ /gso sbyong la ni legs mnyam
205a3(mdo sde): 'jog / de gnyis sngon gyi gnas spangs nas/ /yul gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / /de dang nye ba'i gnas de na/ /rnga sgra zhes bya'i klu gnas so/ /klu yi skyes mchog spun gnyis po/ /de gnyis 'ong bar des shes nas/ /khengs shing khros pa'i yid kyis su/ /du ba can gyi dbugs
205a4(mdo sde): 'byin cing / /khyed gnyis chos spyod ma yin te/ /g.yon can tshul ngan 'chos pa'o zhes/ /rnga sgras tshig ni rtsub mo yis/ /yang dang yang du skrod par byed/ /dman pas bskrad pa thos pa dang / /nye rnga rab tu khros gyur te/ /de tshe phu bo rnga la ni/ /tshig rnams kyis ni go byas pa/ /kye rnga mi yi
205a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten dag 'di na/ /tshig ngan mngon du smra bas gdung byed cing / /sbal zan chu yi 'gram na skyes pa yis/ /mche ba gdug pas bdag cag skrod par byed/ /'di ni chu nang dud 'gro rnams la 'tshe/ /thang la mi rnams la yang 'tshe bar byed/ /gtso bo gal te bdag la bzod mchis
205a6(mdo sde): kyang / /tshig ngan smra la yid ni bzod mi nus/ /deng ni 'di yi grong khyer dang / /pho brang gnyen 'dun bcas brlag ste/ /rnga sgra gtan nas blangs nas su/ /'di nas bdag cag 'dong bar bya/ /klu yi rgyal po stobs po che/ /de yis nu bo'i tshig thos nas/ /yid la 'bab par byed pa
205a7(mdo sde): yi/ /tshigs bcad 'di skad smras te bsgo/ /gang gis khyim du nyin zhag 'ga' gnas shing / /bza' dang btung ba legs par blangs gyur pa/ /de la yid kyis gnod par mi bsam ste/ /byas pa gzo ba skyes bu dam pas bsngags/ /ljon shing gang gi grib ma yis/ /yud tsam
205b1(mdo sde): zhig kyang legs 'gebs de'i/ /lo ma'ang bcad par mi bya na/ /yal ga ljon shing smos ci dgos/ /nags tshal shing ni bcad dam bsregs kyang rung / /slar yang skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /lag pa rlon bcad phyir yang mi skye ltar/ /grogs la 'khu bas yun ring bde mi thob/ /
205b2(mdo sde): skye bo ngan pa yun ring mchod byas shing / /bza' btung zhim po mang pos phan btags kyang / /des ni nges par grogs po spong 'gyur te/ /glang chen gyis ni ko'u shi'i spyil bu bzhin/ /ji ltar chu 'gram shing ni 'gyel 'gyur ltar/ /mi gang blo ni g.yo zhing 'gyur byed pa/ /de yi mdza'
205b3(mdo sde): bshes brtan par mi 'gyur te/ /shing shun tshon gyis ras dkar btsos pa bzhin/ /gal te mkhas pas dgra bo dag /mi dga' bar ni byed 'dod na/ /sems la skyon ni med byas dang / /de nyid kyis ni der gnod 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang / /sa rnams bdag gi khur min gyi/ /byas
205b4(mdo sde): pa mi gzo gang yin pa/ /de ni bdag gi khur chen yin/ /mi gang sems ni mi rgod cing / /byas pa gzo dang byas pa tshor/ /byas pa chud gzon mi byed pa/ /de dag mkhas pas rab tu bsngags/ /chos bde byams pa bde ba ste/ /'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bzhin/ /grogs la 'khu ba med
205b5(mdo sde): pa dang / /nga snyems nga rgyal zad pa bde/ /khengs dang zol byed nga rgyal che/ /sdig pa'i grogs po sten pa dang / /stobs ldan rnams la rgol byed pa/ /de dag rnams kyi grags pa 'jig /de phyir khengs par mi bya ste/ /khro ba rnam par spang bar bya/ /khengs dang khro ba 'ongs
205b6(mdo sde): 'gyur na/ /grags pa mtha' dag 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rgan dang byis pa nad pa dang / /nyam chung thabs stor de bzhin dman pa dang / /rgyal pos spangs dang skyabs med pa dag la/ /snying brtse med pa de dag mir mi rung / /rang gi yul 'khor gnas spangs
205b7(mdo sde): te/ /gzhan gyi ljongs su phyin pa na/ /tshig ngan so sor zlog pa la/ /bzod pa chen po bya dgos so/ /rang gi yul na brnyas bzhin 'dug pa bas/ /mi rnams gzhan gyi yul na gnas kyang rung / /gang na mi rnams gzhan gyis mi brnyas te/ /rang gi yul
206a1(mdo sde): yin de dag rang gi mi/ /mi mchog rnams ni brnyas thabs byas pa'i tshe/ /chung ma sdug dang longs spyod rgya chen gtong / /ngan pa rnams ni de na'ang yongs su 'khyam/ /brnyas thabs byas pa de yang chu bzhin 'thung / /dar ba rnyed pa dga' ba ste/ /rgud pa mod pa yin
206a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ /sems can dmas par gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /gal te nor med phyogs nyung ngam/ /mdza' bshes phyogs kyi stobs chung ngam/ /dgra bo phyogs kyi stobs ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams chos min
206a3(mdo sde): byed pa dang / /'dod pa'i longs spyod mngon dga' zhing / /dad chung ngo tsha med pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams khro bar byed pa dang / /gnod sems mang por gyur pa dang / /gzhan la'ang gdug pa'i tshul ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /
206a4(mdo sde): mi rnams dad pa med pa dang / /khwa bzhin mu cor smra ba dang / /sgyu dang g.yo dag byed pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /mi rnams tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / /gtum zhing gzu lums byed pa dang / /bden pa'i chos dang mi ldan tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba
206a5(mdo sde): 'thob/ /mi rnams ngang tshul ngan pa dang / /log pa'i lta bas bcom pa dang / /gtum zhing sdang bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /ngo tsha med cing du smra/ /don med phra ma tshig rtsub dang / /dbyen dang khyal pa smra ba'i tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /ya
206a6(mdo sde): rabs tshul med shin tu khengs/ /nga rgyal gyis ni 'gying ba dang / /phrag dog brkam dang tshul nyams tshe/ /kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob/ /gang tshe mi yi rus rnams dang / /rigs rnams shes pa ma yin pa'i/ /mi dang lhan cig 'dug pa na/ /de tshe nga rgyal byar mi rung / /gzhan
206a7(mdo sde): gyi yul na 'dug pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /yul gyi phyir dang bde ba'i phyir/ /gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya/ /gzhan gyi yul na gnas pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /sdang bas 'khrug par gyur pa na/ /gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya/ /
206b1(mdo sde): gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang / /gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /dman pas bskrad par gyur kyang rung / /shes rab ldan pas de bzod bya/ /kye ma yul log bdag gnas shing / /mdza' bshes ngan dang phrad pa na/ /byis pa rnams dang 'grogs pa yi/ /gnas su mi ngan rten
206b2(mdo sde): byed med/ /shes rab ldan pas de bas mas/ /mi shes mi dang 'grogs byed kyang / /mkhas pas nor dang longs spyod phyir/ /gzu lums kho nar khro mi bya/ /ji ltar thal bas bkab pa'i me/ /rtswa dang shing gis g.yogs pa la/ /rlung rnams kyis ni legs bus na/ /shin
206b3(mdo sde): tu rab tu 'bar 'gyur te/ /rtswa dang shing de bsregs nas su/ /chen por mched cing 'bar ba yis/ /rtswa dang gel pa mang po dag /ljon shing chen po sreg pa ltar/ /de bzhin rnam rtog bud shing las/ /byung ba'i khro ba me 'dra bas/ /bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag la/ /phung
206b4(mdo sde): khrol chen po byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir khro ba byung ba na/ /zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi/ /byams pa'i sems la bsgoms nas su/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis zlog par byed/ /bstod pa byas na mdza' byed la/ /ma bstod mdza' bar mi byed cing / /mod la yongs su spong byed pa/ /
206b5(mdo sde): de ni byis pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /gal te 'di na byis pa dag /sgro gshog btogs pa'i bya lta bur/ /blo spangs shes rab ma 'chal na/ /mkhas pa ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir byis pa phal cher ni/ /blo gros spangs shing shes 'tshal ba/ /
206b6(mdo sde): de phyir mkhas pa shes rab can/ /khyad par du ni bde bar 'tsho/ /mkhas pa nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la/ /phongs par gyur kyang mi 'khrul 'khrug pa med/ /rjes su gzung phyir phan pa de smra na/ /legs smra yin zhes gzhan gyis cis
206b7(mdo sde): mi rtogs/ /mkhas pa gzu lums med par gyur pa de/ /de nyid dpyad pa legs par mnyan nas su/ /de ltar rnam par bsams nas rang don dang / /gzhan gyi don dag legs par spyod par byed/ /mkhas pa rnams ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu tsam
207a1(mdo sde): gyis/ /sdig pa'i las rnams kun tu spyod mi 'gyur/ /gal te bde dang sdug bsngal ldan gyur kyang / /rtag tu chos don yongs su gtong ba med/ /blo ldan g.yo sgyu can du mi 'gyur te/ /rmongs par mi 'gyur tshig rtsub khro mi 'gyur/ /
207a2(mdo sde): phongs pa'i gnas na mya ngan mi byed pa/ /gzhan gyis gnad la 'bebs par byed re skan/ /ha cang thal dang ha cang zhum pa yi/ /dman pa'i mi rnams la yang ma yin te/ /bar ma'i gnas la sten par byed pa dag /de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi mtshan
207a3(mdo sde): nyid yin/ /ha cang thal ba rtag tu 'khon/ /ha cang zhum pa rtag tu brnyas/ /de phyir de gnyis spangs nas su/ /go 'phang bar ma bsten par bya/ /res 'ga' lkugs pa'am 'on pa lta bur gyis/ /dus la bab nas bdag bzhin du smros/ /res
207a4(mdo sde): 'ga' gangs ri bzhin du bsil bar gyis/ /dus la bab na me lce bzhin du spor/ /res 'ga' rtswa dang 'dra bar zhum par bya/ /dus la bab na ri rab lta bur gyis/ /res 'ga' rgyal po lta bur 'gyur bar bar bya/ /dus la bab na thub 'dra nags su
207a5(mdo sde): song / /res 'ga' bkres dang skom pa'ang bzod par bya/ /dus su bde dang sdug bsngal dang du blang / /nor phyir bran bzhin bkol par mi bya ste/ /khro ba'i dbang du gyur par mi bya'o/ /res 'ga' dga' ba'i glu dang sil snyan gyis/ /rtse zhing sha
207a6(mdo sde): dang chang yang spyad par bya/ /res 'ga' lta bur 'jigs bzhin song / /dus su gcan gzan bzhin du nyams rtsal bstan/ /dang por dus dang dus min dang / /bdag nyid stobs ldan stobs med dang / /dar dang rgud pa brtags nas su/ /de
207a7(mdo sde): nas don rnams legs par brtsam/ /bzod med rnams la bzod pa dang / /bzod ldan rnams la'ang bzod par gyis/ /nyam chung rnams la'ang bzod pa dang / /stobs ldan rnams la rtag bzod gyis/ /'khon gyis 'khon zhir nams kyang mi 'gyur
207b1(mdo sde): bas/ /bzod med rnams la'ang bzod par byas na legs/ /khros pa rnams la rtag tu dang ba dang / /gzhan gyi skyon rnams rtag tu bcab par gyis/ /gtso bo rnams kyi tshig ni 'jigs phyir dang / /'thab zla'i tshig dag 'thab gcugs gyur phyir bzod/ /gang
207b2(mdo sde): zhig 'og ma'i tshig dag bzod byed pa/ /de ni bzod pa'i mchog ces dam pas gsungs/ /gshe dang gya tshom smra ba dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /blo gros chung ngu mi bzod de/ /pad ma la ni rdo char bzhin/ /gshe dang gya tshom smra ba dang / /tshig
207b3(mdo sde): ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /mkhas pa shin tu bzod byed de/ /glang chen me tog char pa bzhin/ /khro ba dang ni dag dang / /tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la/ /mkhas pa shes rab ldan gyur pa/ /gang yin de ni thams cad bzod/ /rdo ba bsregs
207b4(mdo sde): kyang 'ju mi 'gyur/ /char pa bab kyang 'jig pa med/ /de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal gyis/ /mkhas pa nyams par 'gyur ba med/ /gang zhig bden pas gshe byed pa/ /de la mkhas pas bzod par byed/ /bden pa ma yin pa yang
207b5(mdo sde): bzod/ /de las gzhan pa bstan du med/ /'di ltar skyes bu mkhas pa nor gyi phyir/ /sdug bsngal bzod bya bzod par 'gyur bar bar bya/ /gal te mi bzod mya ngan rnam spangs te/ /gzhan du song na stong phrag rnyed dang 'dra/ /yal ga
207b6(mdo sde): snyegs la 'ju bar mi bya zhing / /chags bral sems la chags par mi bya ste/ /bzang zhing sdug pas sa steng gang bas na/ /'jig rten yangs pa gzhan du 'gror zad mod/ /gang na brnyas byed bkur sti mi byed dang / /smod par byed cing stod
207b7(mdo sde): par mi byed na/ /mkhas dang blun 'grogs ched ka mi che bas/ /rang rgyal bzhin du ma smra de 'gro rigs/ /gang na skyes bu 'thab la dga' gyur nas/ /g.yo sgyu'i bsam ldan rtag tu glags kyang byed/ /kyal pa dbyen tshig rtsub smra byed pa/ /de
208a1(mdo sde): tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song / /gang na mi rnams 'tsho bar byed gyur nas/ /phan tshun gnod la 'bebs par dga' ba dang / /lus dang ngag yid sdom pa med gyur pa/ /de tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song / /gang na mi
208a2(mdo sde): rnams phrag dog byed gyur nas/ /gzhan gyi rnyed la rtag tu mi bzod cing / /sdang ba'i bsam pas rnam rmongs tshul 'chos pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang na mi rnams sdig byed 'dod gyur nas/ /bkur sti 'dod cing
208a3(mdo sde): tshul 'chos g.yo sgyu byed/ /nang yang ma dag phyi yang ma dag pa/ /de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang na mi rnams zhe sa med gyur nas/ /ya rabs tshul med khengs shing nga rgyal la ldan/ /byis pas mkhas pa rtag tu brnyas byed pa/ /de tshe
208a4(mdo sde): bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis/ /gang dang gang du bza' btung dang / /gang du gos rnams rnyed pa dang / /gang du 'tsho ba der song la/ /chags 'gyur gnas su ma 'dug cig /lan 'ga' rtsod 'gyur sred pa gang yin spongs/ /rtag khengs
208a5(mdo sde): mchod med nga rgyal gang yin spongs/ /'bras bu ngan pa'i khro ba gang yin spongs/ /phongs dus mi lta'i grogs po gang yin spongs/ /me yis gang ba'i lam 'dra'i ma rig spongs/ /byas gzo med pa'i gnyen 'dra'i 'dod chags spongs/ /mche ba mi bzad klu 'dra'i
208a6(mdo sde): chags pa spongs/ /dgra bo mtshon thogs lta bu'i sdug bsngal spongs/ /klu mo lta bu mi bzad chung ma spongs/ /mgo la me 'bar lta bu'i bu rnams thong / /'go ba'i nad bcas lta bu'i khyim rnams thong / /btung ba dug chen lta bu'i 'dod pa thong / /khyim gyi phyir ni
208a7(mdo sde): gcig btang ste/ /grong khyer don du khyim btang ngo / /ljongs kyi phyir ni grong khyer te/ /bdag gi don du sa btang ngo / /mi yi yan lag phyir ni nor btang zhing / /srog gi don du yan lag gtang bar bya/ /nor dang yan lag rnams dang de bzhin srog /thams cad btang gi
208b1(mdo sde): 'dir ni chos srung ngo / /chos spyod pa la 'jigs skrag med pa nyid/ /chos spyod pa dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/ /chos spyod pa ni 'dod pa'i 'gro bar 'gro/ /chos mi spyod pa shi nas gdung bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa nor rnyed dga' bar mi 'gyur la/ /nor zad na yang blo gros mi 'khyim par/ /
208b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten dag na ci dgar legs rgyu ba/ /sems can nang na mi yi snying por chud/ /gang zhig dga' bas gzhan la nor sbyin zhing / /nga rgyal 'tshe ba rnam spangs bden la gnas/ /rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sems ldan de dag ni/ /dpa' bo rtul phod ya rabs thabs ldan yin/ /gang zhig de
208b3(mdo sde): dang de la legs bslabs pas/ /don rnams kun la mkhas par gyur pa dang / /des la 'grogs na bde ba de dag ni/ /dam pas legs pa yin zhes bsngags pa mdzad/ /nye rngas smras pa/ rnga khyod la ni phyi phyir zhing / /'di bdag ni rab tu dad/ /bdag gi lus
208b4(mdo sde): 'di bskams pa'am/ /yang na sems ni med kyang sla/ /sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad par/ /lhung yang phyin chad sdig mi bgyid/ /tshul khrims nyams pa gson pa bas/ /tshul khrims ldan pa shi yang sla/ /skye ba gcig tu 'di yi phyir/ /ji lta bur ni mi zad sbyang / /bcom ldan
208b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sngon tshe gang du rab gnas shing / /de dang der ni skyes pa na/ /mi dge'i grogs dang 'grogs pa yis/ /nga yi mi dge las rnams byas/ /dge ba'i bshes dang phrad pa na/ /mi dge'i las rnams spangs pa yis/ /bdag gis mi dge'i las rnams bsal/ /
208b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams mngon mkhyen nas/ /de phyir dge slong rnams la ni/ /thub pas lung yang bstan par mdzad/ /sngon tshe nga ni rngar gyur te/ /kun dga' bo ni nye rnga yin/ /lha sbyin rnga sgrar gyur to zhes/ /skyes rabs de ltar gzung bar gyis/ /
208b7(mdo sde): chos rnams sdud par byed pa yi/ /don rgyas mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /dge slong thams cad gus bcas par/ /chos la spyad pa nyid du gyis/ /klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //
209a1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ u dA na brga/ bod skad du/ ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/ bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra shis par gyur cig /rgyal bas ched du brjod gsungs pa/ /bdag gis rab tu bshad par bya/ /gnyid dang
209a2(mdo sde): rmugs pa rnams sol la/ /yid la dga' ba bskyed de nyon/ /thams cad mkhyen pa skyob pa po/ /thub pa rjes su thugs brtse ba/ /sku yi tha ma 'dzin pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /skye zhing 'jig pa'i
209a3(mdo sde): chos can yin/ /skyes nas 'jig par 'gyur ba ste/ /de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/ /de ltar rab tu 'bar ba la/ /ci zhig dgar yod mgur ci yod/ /mun pa'i nang zhugs gnas pa dag /ci phyir sgron ma tshol mi byed/ /rus pa thi ba'i mdog 'dra ba/ /bor ba
209a4(mdo sde): gang yin 'di dag ni/ /phyogs dang phyogs su rnam 'thor ba/ /de mthong 'di la ci zhig dga'/ /gang gi nub mo kho nas/ /mngal du dang por 'jug pa'i mi/ /de ni sdod med 'gro 'gyur zhing / /song ba las kyang ldog pa med/ /snga dro skye bo mang mthong
209a5(mdo sde): ba/ /phyi dro kha cig mthong mi 'gyur/ /phyi dro skye bo mang mthong ba/ /snga dro kha cig mthong mi 'gyur/ /skyes pa bud med mang po dang / /dar la bab pa'ang 'chi 'gyur na/ /de la mi 'di gzhon zhes te/ /gson pa'i gdeng drod ci zhig yod/ /kha cig mngal du 'chi
209a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin kha cig btsas pa'i sar/ /de bzhin kha cig gog tsam na/ /de bzhin kha cig yongs rgyug na/ /la la rgan dang la la gzhon/ /la la dar la bab pa'i mi/ /rim gyis rab tu 'gro 'gyur te/ /'bras bu smin pa ltung ba bzhin/ /
209a7(mdo sde): dper na 'bras bu smin pa rnams/ /ltung bas rtag tu 'jigs pa ltar/ /de bzhin skyes par gyur pa'i mi/ /rtag tu 'chi bas 'jigs par 'gyur/ /dper na rdza ma'i mkhan po yis/ /'jim pa las ni snod byas pa/ /thams cad tha mar 'jig pa ltar/ /
209b1(mdo sde): mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/ /dper na thags ni brkyang ba la/ /spun ni gang dang gang bcug pa'i/ /spun gyis rting la gtugs pa ltar/ /mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/ /dper na nges par bsad pa dag /gom pa gang dang gang bor bas/ /gsad
209b2(mdo sde): sa'i drung du bsnyen pa ltar/ /mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no/ /chu klung drag tu 'bab pa'i rgyun/ /ldog pa med pa ji lta bar/ /de bzhin mi yi tshe 'gro ba/ /slar ni ldog par 'gyur ba med/ /dka' ba nyid dang thung ba dang / /de yang sdug bsngal ldan pa dag /
209b3(mdo sde): myur ba kho nar 'jig 'gyur te/ /chu la dbyug gus bris pa bzhin/ /dper na phyugs rji dbyug thogs kyis/ /phyugs rnams gnas su phyin byed ltar/ /de bzhin nad dang rga ba yis/ /mi rnams 'chi bdag drung du skyel/ /chu bran gyi ni chu lta bur/ /nyin dang
209b4(mdo sde): mtshan mo 'das pa yis/ /mi rnams tshe yang zad 'gyur zhing / /srog kyang nye bar 'jig par 'gyur/ /mel tse byed la mtshan mo ring / /lam gyis du ba la rgyang grags ring / /dam chos rnam par mi shes pa'i/ /byis pa rnams la 'khor ba ring / /bdag
209b5(mdo sde): la bu yod de bzhin du/ /nor yod ces pas byis pa brlag /phyi rol nang na bdag med na/ /su yi bu yin ci zhig nor/ /skyes pa bud med rnams kyi rigs/ /brgya dang stong phrag mang po dang / /longs spyod legs par bsgrubs pa yang / /'chi bdag
209b6(mdo sde): dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing / /bslang ba'i mtha' ni 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/ /gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/ /gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pas na/ /sems can thams cad 'chi
209b7(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / /dge sdig 'bras bur nyer 'gro ba'i/ /ji bzhin las kyi rjes su 'brang / /sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal ba dang / /bsod nams byas pas bde 'gro ste/ /gzhan dag gis ni lam bsgoms pas/ /zag med mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/ /
210a1(mdo sde): gang yang sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos kyang / /sku lus 'di ni spong mdzad na/ /skye bo phal pa smos ci dgos/ /gang du gnas kyang 'chi bas mi tshugs pa'i/ /sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/ /bar
210a2(mdo sde): snang la med rgya mtsho'i nang na med/ /ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu zhugs na'ang min/ /byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa/ /kun gyis lus 'di btang nas 'gro ba dang / /de kun 'jig par mkhas pas rtogs gyis te/ /chos la gnas gyis tshangs par
210a3(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod/ /rga ba mthong zhing nad kyis sdug bsngal dang / /sems dang bral ba'i shi ba mthong nas ni/ /brtan pas btson ra 'dra ba'i khyim spangs kyi/ /'jig rten phal pas 'dod spang nus re skan/ /rgyal po'i shing rta shin tu bkra ba'ang 'jig /de
210a4(mdo sde): bzhin lus kyang nye bar rga bar 'gyur/ /dam pa rnams kyi chos 'di dam pa ste/ /mi mchog gzhan rtogs byed cing rga mi 'gyur/ /rga ba khyod ni blun zhing ngang na/ /khyod ni mi rigs byed pa ste/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs 'di yang / /khyod kyis mngon
210a5(mdo sde): par bcom par gyur/ /gang zhig lo ni brgyar 'tsho ba/ /de yang 'chi bdag nyid kyis khrid/ /'di dag rga bar 'gyur ba'am/ /yang nan ba'am 'chi bas 'joms/ /rtag tu ldog pa med par 'gro 'gyur zhing / /nyin dang mtshan du rab tu 'jig pa dang / /
210a6(mdo sde): skye dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa/ /chu tshan nang du gdungs pa'i nya dang 'dra/ /tshe 'di nyin dang mtshan mo dang / /'gro ba dang ni 'dug pa na/ /chu klung chen po'i rgyun bzhin du/ /phyir mi ldog par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /chu chung nang gi nya lta bur/ /
210a7(mdo sde): gang zhig nyin mtshan 'da' ba yis/ /tshe 'di shin tu thung 'gyur na/ /de la dga' bar byar ci yod/ /gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pa'i phyir/ /lus 'di yongs su rga ba dang / /nad kyi tshang 'di myur 'jig cing / /snag gi tshogs kyang 'jig par
210b1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /kye ma lus 'di mi thogs par/ /stong zhing rnam shes dang bral nas/ /dur khrod bor ba'i mgal dum ltar/ /sa yi steng du 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /rgyun du nad kyis mngon gdung zhing / /rtag tu mi gtsang 'dzag pa dang / /rga dang 'chi bas 'tsher
210b2(mdo sde): 'grib pa'i/ /lus 'di dor ba cir mi rung / /myur du 'jig cing na ba dang / /rnag dang ldan pa'i lus 'di yis/ /grub dang bde ba bla twa med pa/ /zhi mchog don du gnyer bar gyis/ /dgun ka dang ni dpyid ka dang / /dbyar ka 'di dag bya'o zhes/ /byis
210b3(mdo sde): pa rnam par sems byed pas/ /bar chad mthong bar ma gyur to/ /bu dang nor phyugs 'byor pa la/ /mi yid ni rnam chags pa/ /'chi bdag gis ni blangs nas 'gro/ /nyal grong chu bos bdas pa bzhin/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na/ /bu rnams
210b4(mdo sde): skyabs su mi 'gyur zhing / /pha yang ma yin gnyen 'dun min/ /khyod la skyabs su 'gyur ba med/ /'di ni bya ba byas zin don 'di bya/ /de dag byas nas bdag gis 'di bya zhes/ /de ltar mi ni yongs su shom pa na/ /rga dang nad bcas 'chi bas mngon
210b5(mdo sde): du bcom/ /de ltas rtag tu ting 'dzin la dga' mnyam par zhog /brtson pa skyed la skye dang rga ba'i mtha' ma ltos/ /bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa mngon par zil non la/ /dge slong dag go skye shi'i pha rol 'gro bar gyis/ /mi rtag pa'i tshoms te
210b6(mdo sde): dang po'o/ / //kun rtog las ni 'dod skyes pas/ /'dod pa'i rtsa bar shes gyis te/ /khyod ni kun rtog ma byed dang / /des na khyod la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa rnams las mya ngan skyes/ /'dod pa rnams las 'jigs pa 'byung / /
210b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa dag ni rnam spangs na/ /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /dga' ba rnams las mya ngan skyes/ /dga' ba rnams las 'jigs pa 'byung / /dga' ba dag ni rnam spangs na/ /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /'dod dga'i rnam smin sdug
211a1(mdo sde): bsngal te/ /dang po mngar la 'bras bu tsha/ /me sgron lag nas ma bor ba/ /mjug tu byis pa sreg byed bzhin/ /nor bu'i rna cha bu dang bu mo la/ /yongs su chags sems gang yin la ltos na/ /lcags shing gres ma las byas ching ma gang / /
211a2(mdo sde): de dag dam po min zhes 'phags pa gsung / /'dod pa'i ching ma gang yin de lhod kyang / /rab tu dgrol bar dka' zhes 'phags pa gsung / /brtan rnams 'dod pa'i bde la mi lta bar/ /de dag gtubs nas myur du 'gro bar byed/ /'jig rten sna tshogs
211a3(mdo sde): gang de 'dod min gyi/ /skyes bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'dod pa yin/ /'jig rten sna tshogs de bzhin gnas kyang ni/ /'on kyang brten rnams 'di la 'dun pa 'dul/ /mi rnams la ni rtag pa'i 'dod pa med/ /'dod can gang la chags de mi rtag pas/ /
211a4(mdo sde): yang srid med phyir sems kyis rab spongs la/ /'chi ba'i gnas mi 'gyur bar byos shes gsungs/ /'dun pa skyes shing zad par mi byed dam/ /sems la skyon med pa dang dran pa dang / /'dod pa rnams la so sor ma chags gang / /de ni gong du 'pho
211a5(mdo sde): ba yin zhes gsungs/ /mgar ba yis ni dngul bzhin du/ /blo gros ldan pas rim pa bzhin/ /skad cig skad cig cung zad tsam/ /rang gi dri ma bsal bar bya/ /lham mkhan gyis ni ko ba dag /yongs su sbyangs nas lham byed ltar/ /'dod pa gang dang gang
211a6(mdo sde): spangs pa/ /de de bde ba phun sum ldan/ /gal te bde ba kun 'dod na/ /'dod pa thams cad yongs su spongs/ /'dod pa thams cad yongs spangs pas/ /mchog tu bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /ji srid 'dod pa'i rjes 'brang ba/ /de srid bar du ngoms mi
211a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /de las gang dag shes rab kyis/ /ldog byed de dag tshim pa thob/ /'dod pas ngoms par mi 'gyur bas/ /shes rab kyis ni ngoms pa skyid/ /shes rab kyis ni ngoms pa'i mi/ /srid pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod la chags pa'i mi gang
211b1(mdo sde): yin/ /de dag kye ma chos min dga'/ /gson por 'dug pa na/ /bar chad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /blo ngan longs spyod kyis bcom pas/ /pha rol tshol bar mi byed cing / /bsam brlag 'dod la sred pa yis/ /bdag dang gzhan yang phung
211b2(mdo sde): bar byed/ kar Sha pa Na'i char bab kyang / /'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa mnog chung nyes mang bar/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis khong du chud/ /lha yi 'dod pa rnams la yang / /lhag par dga' bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas
211b3(mdo sde): dang nyan thos rnams/ /sred pa zad pas dgyes par 'gyur/ /gangs can dang ni mnyam pa yi/ /gser gyi ri bo yod gyur kyang / /nor des gcig kyang mi tshim par/ /rtogs par gyis la legs par spyod/ /gang dag sdug bsngal de yi rgyu shes pa/ /
211b4(mdo sde): de dag nam yang 'dod la dga' mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na zug rngu'i rgyur shes nas/ /de dag gdul phyir bstan pa slob par byed/ /'dod pa'i tshoms te gnyis pa'o// //lus can rnam par rtog pas rab bcom pa/ /'dod chags mi
211b5(mdo sde): bzad gtsang bar rjes lta bas/ /'dod chags phyir zhing rab tu 'phel 'gyur te/ /rang gi 'ching ba de yis dam por byed/ /gang dag rnam rtog nye bar zhi dga' zhing / /mi sdug sgom pa rtag tu dran byed de/ /de yi sred pa rab tu spangs pa yis/ /rang gi 'ching
211b6(mdo sde): ba de dag rul bar byed/ /'dod pa mun nag 'dra bas g.yogs/ /sred pa'i dgab pas bkab pa dang / /bag med 'ching bas bcings pa dag /tshe dmar chud pa'i nya dang 'dra/ /skyes bu bag med rab tu spyod byed pa/ /'khri shing bzhin du sred pa 'phel 'gyur zhing / /
211b7(mdo sde): rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te/ /ma drung nu zho 'dod pa'i be'u dang 'dra/ /mi dag dran par byed dang chags byed dang / /yid bde ba la rtog par byed pa dag /de yis yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khyams/ /tshal nang 'bras bu 'dod pa'i spre'u dang mtshungs/ /mi
212a1(mdo sde): gang rtag tu bde ba 'dod byed pa/ /skye dang rga bar nye bar 'gro 'gyur zhing / /skye dgu sred pa rnams kyis mdun du bdar/ /rgya nang ri bong yongs su rgyug pa bzhin/ /sred pa rnams kyis mdud pa'i sems can dag /srid dang srid min dag la sems chags
212a2(mdo sde): shing / /kun sbyor ro la dga' ba'i byis pa rnams/ /yang dang yang du sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur/ /skye bo grub dang bde rnams dang bral zhing / /bdud kyi sbyor ba dag dang ldan pa de/ /rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te/ /ma drung nu zho 'dod pa'i be'u dang 'dra/ /'di
212a3(mdo sde): na sred pa de 'dra spong byed pa/ /srid dang srid min dag la sred bral zhing / /dge slong srid pa zil gyis gnon byed pa/ /lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan 'da'/ /gang zhig 'jig rten spang dka' ba'i/ /sred pa'i bud med 'dis bkol ba/ /de yi mya ngan 'phel
212a4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ /rtswa la char pa bab pa bzhin/ /gang zhig 'jig rten spang dka' ba'i/ /sred pa'i bud med 'di spong ba/ /de yi mya ngan ldog 'gyur te/ /pad ma las ni chu thigs bzhin/ /de phyir ji snyed 'dir lhags pa/ /khyed la smra yis khyed bde shig /u shir phyir
212a5(mdo sde): ni rtswa bzhin du/ /sred pa rtswar bcas drungs nas phyung / /skyes bu sred pa dang 'grogs na/ /yun ring dus su 'khyam 'gyur bas/ /sred pa drungs nas phyung shig dang / /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /yang dang yang du nyer len cing / /yang dang yang du mngal du
212a6(mdo sde): 'jug / gnas skabs 'gyur dang gzhan 'gyur bas/ /sems can 'ong dang 'gro bar byed/ /'dir ni spang dka'i sred pa de/ /spongs la sa bon chod cig dang / /de la sred pa med 'gyur zhing / /de ni yang du 'khor mi 'gyur/ /dal 'byor chud ni ma gzan par/ /
212a7(mdo sde): gang gis lha dang mi rnams su/ /don gnyer bcings nas 'jog byed pa/ /yul la sred pa de las rgol/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes na yang / /dal 'byor thal bas 'gyod par 'ong / /gang phyir srid mtsho rgyur gyur pa/ /yul la sred pa 'bras kyi gzhi/ /'khri
212b1(mdo sde): shing dra bas khebs byed pa/ /gdung bar byed pa ma btul na/ /sdug bsngal 'di ni yang dang yang / /rnam pa kun du ldog mi 'gyur/ /dper na ljon shing rtsa nas ma bton na/ /bcad kyang phyir zhing skye ba kho nar zad/ /de bzhin sred pa'i phra rgyas ma bton na/ /yang
212b2(mdo sde): dang yang du sdug bsngal 'di mi ldog / dper na bdag nyid kyis ni byas pa'i mtshon/ /de yis rkun po'i mthu yis bdag gsod ltar/ /de bzhin nang gi sems las byung ba yi/ /sred pas lus can nye bar gsod par byed/ /de ltar sred las sdug bsngal
212b3(mdo sde): dag / 'byung ba'i nyes dmigs shes gyis te/ /sred spongs nye bar len med dang / /dran ldan dge slong kun du rgyus/ /sred pa'i tshoms te gsum pa'o// //bag yod 'chi med gnas yin te/ /bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas/ /
212b4(mdo sde): bag yod 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ /bag med pa ni rtag tu 'chi/ /de yi khyad par de rig pas/ /mkhas pa rnams ni bag dang bcas/ /bag yod pa la rab dga' ba/ /'phags pa'i spyod yul dga' ba yin/ /de la rgyun du bsgoms pa dang / /rtag tu pha rol
212b5(mdo sde): gnon brtan pa'i/ /brtan pas grub bde bla med pa/ /mya ngan 'das la reg pa yin/ /gang tshe mkhas pas bag yod pas/ /bag med bcom pa de yi tshe/ /shes rab khang steng 'dzegs nas/ /mya ngan med pas gdung bcas dang / /brtan rnams ri bo'i
212b6(mdo sde): spo dag las/ /sa stengs byis pa rnams la blta/ /brtson 'grus dang ni bag yod dang / /yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis/ /mkhas pas gling du byas nas ni/ /chu bo chen po mngon du zlog /brtson 'grus ldan zhing dran dang ldan pa dang / /spyod pa gtsang zhing brtags nas
212b7(mdo sde): byed pa dang / /yang dag sdom dang chos kyis 'tsho ba dang / /bag yod rnams kyi grags pa mngon par 'phel/ /lhag pa'i sems la bag bya ste/ /thub pa'i thub gzhi rnams la bslab/ /nyer zhi rtag tu dran ldan pa'i/ /skyong ba mya ngan med pa yin/ /dman pa'i
213a1(mdo sde): chos la mi rten cing / /bag med pa la bsten mi bya/ /log par lta la 'dod med dang / /'jig rten 'phel bar mi bya'o/ /'jig rten pa yi yang dag lta/ /chen po su la yod gyur pa/ /de ni tshe rabs stong du yang / /ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
213a2(mdo sde): bag med pa la sbyor byed pa/ /skye bo byis pa bsam brlag yin/ /tshong dpon nor rnams srung ba ltar/ /mkhas pa bag dang ldan par bya/ /bag med pa la mi sbyor zhing / /'dod la dga' ba mi sogs dang / /rtag tu bag yod sems byed pa/ /zag pa zad pa thob par
213a3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /zag pa zad pa ma thob kyang / /dus 'dir bag med mi bya ste/ /ma yin seng ge ltar/ /bag med pa dag bsad par 'gyur/ /bag med pha rol bud med sten byed pa'i/ /mi gang yid la gnas skabs 'di bzhi 'byung / /bsod nams mi 'thob bde
213a4(mdo sde): bar mi nyal dang / /gsum pa smad 'gyur bzhi pa dmyal bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams ma thob sdig pa'i 'gro ba dang / /'jigs dang bag tsha lhan cig bde ba chung / /rgyal po'i chad pa chen pos gcod 'gyur zhing / /lus zhig sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'tshed/ /
213a5(mdo sde): gang zhig bdag bde lta 'dod pa/ /des ni gong ma bzhin du bya/ /byis pa'i shing rta bzhin 'gyur bas/ /brtan pas brtson 'grus zhan mi bya/ /dper na byis pa'i shing rta dag /lam chen bzang po bor nas su/ /lam ngan dag tu 'gro byed pas/ /mig chag sems khongs
213a6(mdo sde): chud pa ltar/ /de bzhin chos ni spangs nas kyang / /chos min rjes su 'jug byed pa'i/ /byis pa 'chi bdag dbang 'gro zhing / /mig chag bzhin du bcom pa thob/ /gang zhig bya ba rnam spangs nas/ /mi bya ba dag byed pa dang / /bag med pa yis rlom byed pa/ /de dag
213a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi zag pa 'phel/ /gang gis zag pa 'phel 'gyur ba/ /de yi zag med rgyang ma na/ /gang zhig lus gtogs dran pa dag /rtag tu legs par brtsams pa dang / /bya ba ma yin mi byed cing / /rgyun du bya ba byed pa dang / /dran dang shes bzhin ldan pa de'i/ /
213b1(mdo sde): zag pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur/ /gang gi zag pa zad gyur pa/ /des ni zag med thob par 'gyur/ /ji tsam mang du smra byed pa/ /de dag dam chos 'dzin ma yin/ /gang dag 'di na thos nyung yang / /lus kyis chos dag mngon sum byas/ /gang dag chos la bag byed pa/ /de
213b2(mdo sde): dag dam chos 'dzin pa yin/ /gal te rigs bcas mang du smras kyang ni/ /bag med mi dag de ltar byed mi 'gyur/ /dper na phyugs rdzis gzhan gyi phyugs bgrangs ltar/ /de dag dge sbyong skal ba thob ma yin/ /gal te rigs bcas nyung ngu smra byed kyang / /chos kyi rjes
213b3(mdo sde): su chos la spyod pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spong byed pa/ /de dag dge sbyong skal ba thob pa yin/ /bag yod bsngags pa rjod byed cing / /rtag tu bag med la smod pas/ /bag yod mchod sbyin brgya pa yang / /lha rnams nang na gtso bor gyur/ /bya ba
213b4(mdo sde): byas rung ma byas rung / /mkhas pa bag yod bsngags pa rjod/ /bag dang chas pa'i mkhas pa yis/ /don gnyis rab tu len par byed/ /tshe 'di'i don ni gang yin dang / /phyi ma'i don ni gang yin pa/ /de dag brtan pas rtogs pas na/ /mkhas pa zhes ni
213b5(mdo sde): brjod pa yin/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /bdag nyid ngan 'gro las 'drel te/ /'dam rdzab las ni glang chen bzhin/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /sdig pa'i chos rnams
213b6(mdo sde): sprug par byed/ /rlung gis ljon shing lo ma bzhin/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /kun tu sbyor ba phra sbom dag /me yis bsregs pa bzhin du 'gro/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs
213b7(mdo sde): lta bas/ /kun tu sbyor ba kun zad pa/ /rim gyis nyams su rmyang bar 'gyur/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas/ /'du byed nyer zhi zhi ba yi/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang so sor rtogs/ /dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing / /bag
214a1(mdo sde): med pa la 'jigs lta ba/ /mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir/ /yongs su nyams 'gyur mi srid do/ /brtson 'grus ldan zhing bag yod dang / /chos spyad legs par spyod byed pa/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /chos spyad pas ni bde ba 'thob/ /
214a2(mdo sde): zhi phyir bslab pa la rten dang / /rtsol ba dang ni brtson 'grus skyed/ /mi dran pa dang bag med dang / /brtson 'grus chung dang kun sdom med/ /gnyid dang snyom dang g.yeng ba ste/ /'di dag bslab pa'i bar chad pas/ /khyed kyis yan lag de rtogs la/ /dran pa chud
214a3(mdo sde): ni ma gzan cig / dge slong tshul khrims bzang ba dang / /bag yod pa la dga' ba yis/ /kun rtog legs par mnyam zhog ste/ /rang gi sems ni rjes su srungs/ /brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang
214a4(mdo sde): chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la/ /bag dang ldan par spyod byed pa/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/ /bag yod pa'i tshom sa te bzhi pa'o// //sdug pa
214a5(mdo sde): rnams las mya ngan skye/ /sdug pa rnams las 'jigs pa skye/ /sdug pa dag ni rnam spangs na/ /mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med/ /sdug gu ma las mya ngan skye/ /sdug las sdug bsngal sdug las 'jigs/ /sdug gu ma dag gzhan gyur na/ /yi mug 'gyur ba thob
214a6(mdo sde): par byed/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang / /mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa ji snyed pa/ /de dag sdug pa dag las rten te 'byung / /sdug pa spangs na de dag yod mi 'gyur/ /gang phyir 'jig rten 'ga' na'ang sdug med pa/ /gang yin de dag bde zhing mya ngan
214a7(mdo sde): med/ /de bas gdung med rdul bral don gnyer bas/ /nam yang sdug par byed pa mi bya'o/ /sdug pa ma mthong sdug bsngal la/ /mi sdug mthong na'ang de bzhin pas/ /nam yang sdug dang phrad mi bya/ /mi sdug dang yang phrad mi bya/ /sdug pa dang ni bye bral dang / /mi sdug
214b1(mdo sde): pa dang phrad pa yis/ /gang gis mi dag rgas byed pa'i/ /mya ngan mi bzad skye bar 'gyur/ /sdug pa shi bar gyur pa na/ /gnyen 'dun mdza' bshes mang po dag /yun ring dus su mya ngan dang / /sdug dang bral bas sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /gang la sdug dang sdug min med/ /
214b2(mdo sde): de la mdud pa yod min pas/ /de ltas sdug nyid sdig can la/ /sdug par byed pa mi bya'o/ /sdug la bltas te don btang nas/ /bde sbyor rnams la mi 'jug cing / /bdag nyid mi bde'i sbyor ldan dag /bde sbyor don ldan rnams la smon/ /gzugs sdug bde bas
214b3(mdo sde): bsdams pa dag / lha mi so so'i ris dag tu/ /sdig pa byed cing yongs nyams nas/ /rga dang 'chi ba'i dbang du 'gro/ /gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /bag yod gzugs sdug spong byed pa/ /des ni spang dka' bdud zas dang / /sdig pa'i rtsa ba'ang drungs nas
214b4(mdo sde): phyung / /legs min legs pa'i tshul dang ni/ /sdug min sdug pa'i tshul gyis dang / /sdug bsngal bde ba'i tshul gyis su/ /bag med rnams ni mngon du 'joms/ /gal te bdag la dga' byed na/ /nyes par byed pas bde ba dag /bde blag kho nar mi 'thob pas/ /
214b5(mdo sde): 'di ni sdug la gzhug mi bya/ /gal te bdag la dga' byed na/ /legs par byed pas bde ba dag /bde blag kho nar thob 'gyur bas/ /'di ni sdig la gzhug mi bya/ /dper na dgon pa'i grong khyer dag /brtan pa'i 'obs kyis bskor ba ltar/ /gal te bdag
214b6(mdo sde): la dga' byed na/ /'di ni bsrung bas legs par bsrung / /gal te bdag la dga' byed na/ /thun gsum gang yang rung ba la/ /mkhas pas mel tse bya ba yis/ /'di ni sba bas legs par sba/ /dper na dgon pa'i grong khyer dag /tra phyi nang srung bar byed pa ltar/ /dal
